English Sentences: Now king David was old and stricken in years; and they covered him with clothes, but he gat no heat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Daawiti cimidi wodiyaa keehippe sugiis. Yaatidaagau ashkkarati maayuwaa a bolli kuurinkka a ho77ennan ixxiis.

English Sentences: Wherefore his servants said unto him, Let there be sought for my lord the king a young virgin: and let her stand before the king, and let her cherish him, and let her lie in thy bosom, that my lord the king may get heat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, a oosanchchati a, "Kawuwaa achchan de7ana malanne a heemmana mala, issi geela7o na7iyo nuuni neeyyo koyana; nu godaa kawuwaa ho7ettanau a a lanqqen zin77anau danddayausu" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: So they sought for a fair damsel throughout all the coasts of Israel, and found Abishag a Shunammite, and brought her to the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi eti Israa7eela biittan ubban koyidi Abishaago giyo issi puulanchcha geela7iyo SHuneema giyo katamaappe demmidosona. Demmidi o kawuwaassi ehiidosona.

English Sentences: And the damsel was very fair, and cherished the king, and ministered to him: but the king knew her not.
Wolaitta Sentences: He geela7iyaa keehippe puulanchcha na7a. A kawuwaa heemmaasunne ayyo oottaasu; shin kawoi iira inddan gaitti erenna.

English Sentences: Then Adonijah the son of Haggith exalted himself, saying, I will be king: and he prepared him chariots and horsemen, and fifty men to run before him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haggiiti na7ai Adoonee, "Taani kawotanau koyais" yaagidi denddiis; denddidi paraa gaaretanne parata ba sinttan woxxiya ishatamu asaara giigissiis.

English Sentences: And his father had not displeased him at any time in saying, Why hast thou done so? and he also was a very goodly man; and his mother bare him after Absalom.
Wolaitta Sentences: A aawai aban gelidi, "Aissi hagaa oottai?" giidi mulekka a oichchi erenna. Adooneekka qassi meraa keehippe lo77o asa; i Abeselooma kaallidi yelettiis.

English Sentences: And he conferred with Joab the son of Zeruiah, and with Abiathar the priest: and they following Adonijah helped him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Adoonee Xaruuyi na7aa Yoo7aabanne qeesiyaa Abiyaataara ha yohuwaa zoretaa bessiis; bessin eti a maaddanau maayidosona.

English Sentences: But Zadok the priest, and Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, and Nathan the prophet, and Shimei, and Rei, and the mighty men which belonged to David, were not with Adonijah.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin qeesiyaa Xaadooqi, Yoodaahe na7ai Banaayi, hananabaa yootiya Naataani, SHim77i, Ree7inne Daawita naagiyaageeti Adooniyaara de7okkona.

English Sentences: And Adonijah slew sheep and oxen and fat cattle by the stone of Zoheleth, which is by Enrogel, and called all his brethren the king's sons, and all the men of Judah the king's servants:
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi Adoonee Eniroogeela katamaa matan Zoheleeta Zaallaa giyo sohuwan dorssata, mehetanne anqqara marata yarshshiis. Kawo naata ba ishata ubbaanne kawuwaassi oottiya Yihudaa asata ubbaa ba yarshshiyo sohuwaa xeesiis;

English Sentences: But Nathan the prophet, and Benaiah, and the mighty men, and Solomon his brother, he called not.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin hananabaa yootiya Naataana, Banaaya, kawuwaa naagiyaageetanne ba ishaa Solomona xeesibeenna.

English Sentences: Wherefore Nathan spake unto Bathsheba the mother of Solomon, saying, Hast thou not heard that Adonijah the son of Haggith doth reign, and David our lord knoweth it not?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Naataani Solomona aayyiyo Berssaabo hagaadan yaagidi oichchiis; "Nu godai Daawiti erennan de7ishin, Haggiiti na7ai Adoonee kawotidoogaa neeni siyabeikkiiyye?

English Sentences: Now therefore come, let me, I pray thee, give thee counsel, that thou mayest save thine own life, and the life of thy son Solomon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatikko, ha77i neeni ne shemppuwaanne ne na7aa Solomona shemppuwaa waatada ashshanaakko nena taani ane zorais.

English Sentences: Go and get thee in unto king David, and say unto him, Didst not thou, my lord, O king, swear unto thine handmaid, saying, Assuredly Solomon thy son shall reign after me, and he shall sit upon my throne? why then doth Adonijah reign?
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawuwaa Daawitakko gelada hagaadan yaaga; Ta godau kawuwau, taassi ne ashkkareessi, "Tuma, taappe guyyiyan ne na7ai Solomoni kawotana; ta kawotaa araatan i uttana" yaagada caaqqabeikkii? Yaatin, Adoonee aibissi kawotidee? yaaga.

English Sentences: Behold, while thou yet talkest there with the king, I also will come in after thee, and confirm thy words.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni kawuwaara haasayaidda yan de7ishin taani gelada, ne haasayaa maizzada haasayana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Bathsheba went in unto the king into the chamber: and the king was very old; and Abishag the Shunammite ministered unto the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Berssaaba cimida kawuwaa haasayissanau i de7iyo ilppinniyaa gelaasu; SHuneema katamaappe yiida Abishaaga kawuwaa heemmausu.

English Sentences: And Bathsheba bowed, and did obeisance unto the king. And the king said, What wouldest thou?
Wolaitta Sentences: Berssaaba kawuwaa sinttan lichchi gaada gufannaasu. Gufannin kawoi, "Ai koyadii?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And she said unto him, My lord, thou swarest by the LORD thy God unto thine handmaid, saying, Assuredly Solomon thy son shall reign after me, and he shall sit upon my throne.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin a, "Ta godau, taassi ne ashkkareessi, Taappe guyyiyan ne na7ai Solomoni kawotana; ta kawotaa araatankka i uttana gaada GODAN, ne Xoossan, neeni ne huuphen caaqqadasa.

English Sentences: And now, behold, Adonijah reigneth; and now, my lord the king, thou knowest it not:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ha77i Adoonee kawotiis; neeni ta godai kawoi hegaa erakka.

English Sentences: And he hath slain oxen and fat cattle and sheep in abundance, and hath called all the sons of the king, and Abiathar the priest, and Joab the captain of the host: but Solomon thy servant hath he not called.
Wolaitta Sentences: I keehi daro meheta, anqqara maratanne dorssata yarshshiis. Yarshshiiddi kawuwaa naata ubbaa, qeesiyaa Abiyaataaranne ola gadaawaa Yoo7aaba xeesiis; shin ne ashkkaraa Solomona xeesibeenna.

English Sentences: And thou, my lord, O king, the eyes of all Israel are upon thee, that thou shouldest tell them who shall sit on the throne of my lord the king after him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta godau kawuwau, ta godaappe kawuwaappe guyyiyan ooni ne kawotaa araatan uttanaakko eranau Israa7eela asaa ubbaa aifee nena xeelli uttiis.

English Sentences: Otherwise it shall come to pass, when my lord the king shall sleep with his fathers, that I and my son Solomon shall be counted offenders.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hinna xayikko, ta godai kawoi haiqqidi ba maizzan gaittiyo wode, taaninne ta na7ai Solomoni daafabaa oottida asadan qoodettana" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And, lo, while she yet talked with the king, Nathan the prophet also came in.
Wolaitta Sentences: Berssaaba biron kawuwaara haasayishin, hananabaa yootiya Naataani kawo keettaa gakkiis.

English Sentences: And they told the king, saying, Behold Nathan the prophet. And when he was come in before the king, he bowed himself before the king with his face to the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gakkin kawuwaayyo, "Hananabaa yootiya Naataani yiis" yaagidi yootidosona. Yaatin, Naataani kawuwaa sintti aadhdhidi, ba som77uwaa sa7aa gattidi ziggiis.

English Sentences: And Nathan said, My lord, O king, hast thou said, Adonijah shall reign after me, and he shall sit upon my throne?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Naataani, "Ta godau kawuwau, neeppe guyyiyan Adoonee kawotanaadaaninne ne kawotaa araatan uttanaadan odadiiyye?

English Sentences: For he is gone down this day, and hath slain oxen and fat cattle and sheep in abundance, and hath called all the king's sons, and the captains of the host, and Abiathar the priest; and, behold, they eat and drink before him, and say, God save king Adonijah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hachchi i duge biidi keehi daro meheta, anqqara maratanne dorssata yarshshiis. Yarshshiiddi kawuwaa naata ubbaa, ola gadaawatanne qeesiyaa Abiyaataara xeesiis. Eti ha77i aara miiddinne uyiiddi, Kawoi Adoonee merinau de7o! yaagiiddi de7oosona.

English Sentences: But me, even me thy servant, and Zadok the priest, and Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, and thy servant Solomon, hath he not called.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin tana ne ashkkaraa, qeesiyaa Xaadooqa, Yoodaahe na7aa Banaayanne ne ashkkaraa Solomona xeesibeenna.

English Sentences: Is this thing done by my lord the king, and thou hast not shewed it unto thy servant, who should sit on the throne of my lord the king after him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagee ta godaa kawuwaappe guyyiyan a kawotaa araatan ooni uttanaakko ba ashkkarata erissennan de7iiddi ta godai kawoi oottidobeeyye?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then king David answered and said, Call me Bathsheba. And she came into the king's presence, and stood before the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Kawoi Daawiti, "Berssaabo tau xeesite" yaagiis; yaagin kawoi de7iyoosaa gelada a sinttan eqqaasu.

English Sentences: And the king sware, and said, As the LORD liveth, that hath redeemed my soul out of all distress,
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode kawoi iyyo hagaadan yaagidi caaqqiis; "Tana meto ubbaappe ashshida GODAI ero!

English Sentences: Even as I sware unto thee by the LORD God of Israel, saying, Assuredly Solomon thy son shall reign after me, and he shall sit upon my throne in my stead; even so will I certainly do this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAN, Israa7eela Xoossan taani neeyyo caaqqido caaquwaa tumu hachchi polana; taappe guyyiyan ne na7ai Solomoni kawotana; ta kawotaa araatan, ta sohuwan i uttana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Bathsheba bowed with her face to the earth, and did reverence to the king, and said, Let my lord king David live for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Berssaaba ba som77uwaa sa7aa gattada kawuwaa sinttan ziggaasu; ziggada kawuwaa, "Ta godai, Kawoi Daawiti merinau de7o!" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And king David said, Call me Zadok the priest, and Nathan the prophet, and Benaiah the son of Jehoiada. And they came before the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Kawoi Daawiti, "Tau qeesiyaa Xaadooqa, hananabaa yootiya Naataananne Yoodaahe na7aa Banaaya xeesidi gelissite" yaagiis. Yaagin eti gelidi, kawuwaa sintti aadhdhidosona.

English Sentences: The king also said unto them, Take with you the servants of your lord, and cause Solomon my son to ride upon mine own mule, and bring him down to Gihon:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aadhdhin i eta, "Ta ashkkarata inttenaara ekkidi biidi, ta na7aa Solomona taani toggiyo baquluwaa togissidi, duge Giyoona pulttuwaa efiite.

English Sentences: And let Zadok the priest and Nathan the prophet anoint him there king over Israel: and blow ye with the trumpet, and say, God save king Solomon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efin qeesiyaa Xaadooqinne hananabaa yootiya Naataani a tiyidi Israa7eela asaa bollan kawoyona. Hegaappe guyyiyan malkkataa punnidi, intte qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, Kawoi Solomoni merinau de7o! yaagite.

English Sentences: Then ye shall come up after him, that he may come and sit upon my throne; for he shall be king in my stead: and I have appointed him to be ruler over Israel and over Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan intte a ajabidi aara pude biite; bin i yiidi ta kawotaa araatan uttidi, ta sohuwan kawoto. Taani Israa7eelanne Yihudaa haariyaagaa oottada a sunttaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada answered the king, and said, Amen: the LORD God of my lord the king say so too.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoodaahe na7aa Banaayi kawuwaayyo zaaridi, "Amin77i! GODAI, ta godaa kawuwaa Xoossaikka hegaa go!

English Sentences: As the LORD hath been with my lord the king, even so be he with Solomon, and make his throne greater than the throne of my lord king David.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ta godaara kawuwaara gididoogaadan Solomonaarakka gido; yaatin, a kawotaa araataa ta godaa Kawuwaa Daawita kawotaa araataappekka aattidi gitayo" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Zadok the priest, and Nathan the prophet, and Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, and the Cherethites, and the Pelethites, went down, and caused Solomon to ride upon king David's mule, and brought him to Gihon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, qeesiyaa Xaadooqi, hananabaa yootiya Naataani, Yoodaahe na7ai Banaayinne kawuwaa naagiyaageeti Solomona Kawoi Daawiti toggiyo baquluwaa togissidi, Giyoona efiidosona.

English Sentences: And Zadok the priest took an horn of oil out of the tabernacle, and anointed Solomon. And they blew the trumpet; and all the people said, God save king Solomon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeesiyaa Xaadooqi Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaappe zaitiyaa kaciyan tigi ekkidi, Solomona tiyidi kawoyiis. Hegaappe guyyiyan eti malkkataa punnin, asai ubbai ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Kawoi Solomoni merinau de7o!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And all the people came up after him, and the people piped with pipes, and rejoiced with great joy, so that the earth rent with the sound of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ubbaikka a kaallidi pude biis; eti pulaaliyaa punni punnidi kaa7iiddi keehippe ufaittidosona. He hombbocettan biittai qaaxxiis.

English Sentences: And Adonijah and all the guests that were with him heard it as they had made an end of eating. And when Joab heard the sound of the trumpet, he said, Wherefore is this noise of the city being in an uproar?
Wolaitta Sentences: Adooneenne aara de7iya imattati gibiraa mi wurssiiddi hagaa siyidosona. Malkkataa punettaa siyidi Yoo7aabi, "Ha kataman wocamiya wocamai ubbai aibabee?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And while he yet spake, behold, Jonathan the son of Abiathar the priest came; and Adonijah said unto him, Come in; for thou art a valiant man, and bringest good tidings.
Wolaitta Sentences: I biron haasayishin qeesiyaa Abiyaataara na7ai Yonaataani gakki wodhdhiis. Gakkin Adoonee, "Ane haa gela. Ne mala lo77o asi lo77o odo eheennan aggenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jonathan answered and said to Adonijah, Verily our lord king David hath made Solomon king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yonaataani, "CHii, taani lo77o odo ehabeikke! Nu godai Kawoi Daawiti Solomona kawoyiis.

English Sentences: And the king hath sent with him Zadok the priest, and Nathan the prophet, and Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, and the Cherethites, and the Pelethites, and they have caused him to ride upon the king's mule:
Wolaitta Sentences: A ajabana mala kawoi qeesiyaa Xaadooqa, hananabaa yootiya Naataana, Yoodaahe na7aa Banaayanne kawuwaa naagiyaageeta aara yeddiis; eti kawoi toggiyo baquluwaa a togissidosona.

English Sentences: And Zadok the priest and Nathan the prophet have anointed him king in Gihon: and they are come up from thence rejoicing, so that the city rang again. This is the noise that ye have heard.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeesiyaa Xaadooqinne hananabaa yootiya Naataani, Giyoona SHaafan a tiyidi kawoyidosona; hegaappekka eti hombbociiddi pude biidosona; hegau katamaikka kooshimmees. Ha77i intte siyiyo wocamai hegaa.

English Sentences: And also Solomon sitteth on the throne of the kingdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa bollikka Solomoni kawotaa araatan uttiis.

English Sentences: And moreover the king's servants came to bless our lord king David, saying, God make the name of Solomon better than thy name, and make his throne greater than thy throne. And the king bowed himself upon the bed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi kawo oosanchchatikka nu godaa Kawuwaa Daawita, Ne Xoossai Solomona woriyaa neegaappekka aatti woreyo! A kawotaa araataa neegaappekka aatti gitayo! yaagidi anjjidosona. Anjjin kawoi ba arssan de7iiddi hokkidi Xoossaassi goinniis.

English Sentences: And also thus said the king, Blessed be the LORD God of Israel, which hath given one to sit on my throne this day, mine eyes even seeing it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Goinnidi, Ta kawotaa araatan uttidi ta sohuwan kawotiyaabaa tana hachchi ta aifiyan bessida GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai galatetto! yaagiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And all the guests that were with Adonijah were afraid, and rose up, and went every man his way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa siyidi, Adooniyaa imattati ubbai dagammi denddidi, laalettidosona.

English Sentences: And Adonijah feared because of Solomon, and arose, and went, and caught hold on the horns of the altar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laalettin Adoonee Solomonayyo yayyidi biidi, yarshshiyoosaa kaceta oiqqiis.

English Sentences: And it was told Solomon, saying, Behold, Adonijah feareth king Solomon: for, lo, he hath caught hold on the horns of the altar, saying, Let king Solomon swear unto me today that he will not slay his servant with the sword.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oiqqin asai Solomona, "Adoonee Kawuwaa Solomonayyo yayyidi, yarshshiyoosaa kaceta oiqqiis; oiqqidi, Kawoi Solomoni tana ba ashkkaraa bisuwan worennaadan taayyo hachchi caaqqo yaagees" yaagidi yootidosona.

English Sentences: And Solomon said, If he will shew himself a worthy man, there shall not an hair of him fall to the earth: but if wickedness shall be found in him, he shall die.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Solomoni zaaridi, "I ba hanuwaa loittanabaa gidikko, harai attin a huuphiyaappe issi binnaaninne boshettenna; shin an iitatetti beettikko, i haiqqana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So king Solomon sent, and they brought him down from the altar. And he came and bowed himself to king Solomon: and Solomon said unto him, Go to thine house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Kawoi Solomoni asaa kiittin, eti yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoosaappe duge a wottidosona. Wottin Adoonee yiidi, Solomonayyo ziggiis; yaatin, Solomoni a, "Ne soo ba" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now the days of David drew nigh that he should die; and he charged Solomon his son, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti haiqqiyo wodee matin, ba na7aa Solomona hagaadan yaagidi azaziis;

English Sentences: I go the way of all the earth: be thou strong therefore, and shew thyself a man;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani haiqqiyo wodee matiis. Hegaa gishshau, minna; yeeqenna asa gida.

English Sentences: And keep the charge of the LORD thy God, to walk in his ways, to keep his statutes, and his commandments, and his judgments, and his testimonies, as it is written in the law of Moses, that thou mayest prosper in all that thou doest, and whithersoever thou turnest thyself:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ne Xoossai azazidobaa naaga; a ogetun hemetta; Muuse Higgiyan xaafettidoogaadan a awaajuwaa, a azazuwaa, a higgiyaanne a wogaa naaga. Yaatikko, neeni oottiyoobai ubbainne neeni biyo soho ubbai neeyyo injjetana.

English Sentences: That the LORD may continue his word which he spake concerning me, saying, If thy children take heed to their way, to walk before me in truth with all their heart and with all their soul, there shall not fail thee (said he) a man on the throne of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi GODAI tana, Ne zerettati bantta de7uwan naagettidi de7ikko, eti ta sinttan bantta kumetta wozanaappenne bantta kumetta shemppuwaappe ammanettidi hemettikko, Israa7eela kawotaa araatan uttiya asi neeyyo mulekka xayenna yaagido ufaissaa qaalaa taayyo polana.

English Sentences: Moreover thou knowest also what Joab the son of Zeruiah did to me, and what he did to the two captains of the hosts of Israel, unto Abner the son of Ner, and unto Amasa the son of Jether, whom he slew, and shed the blood of war in peace, and put the blood of war upon his girdle that was about his loins, and in his shoes that were on his feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassi Xaruuyi na7ai Yoo7aabi Israa7eela ola gadaawata naa77aa, Neera na7aa Abaneeranne Yetera na7aa Amaasa woridi, i tana oottidobaa neeni akeekaasa. Hegeenne, eti olaa wode woridoogaa haluwaa eta sigaa wode woridi, he suuttan ba xeessaa qabattuwaanne ba gediyaa caammaa alleeqiis.

English Sentences: Do therefore according to thy wisdom, and let not his hoar head go down to the grave in peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni a ne aadhdhida eratettaadan ootta; bau mati i ceeggidi saro haiqqanaadan oottoppa.

English Sentences: But shew kindness unto the sons of Barzillai the Gileadite, and let them be of those that eat at thy table: for so they came to me when I fled because of Absalom thy brother.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin Gala7aade giyo biittan de7iya Barzzillaaya naatuyyo keha; eti ne maaddan miya asaara mona. Aissi giikko, taani ne ishaa Abeseloomappe baqatiyo wode, eti taayyo miyye gididosona.

English Sentences: And, behold, thou hast with thee Shimei the son of Gera, a Benjamite of Bahurim, which cursed me with a grievous curse in the day when I went to Mahanaim: but he came down to meet me at Jordan, and I sware to him by the LORD, saying, I will not put thee to death with the sword.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani Maahinaima katamaa biido wode, tana iita qanggettaa qanggida Biniyaama biittan Baahuriima katamaappe yiida Geera na7aa SHim77i nenaara de7iyoogaa hassaya. I tanaara gaittanau Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa duge yiido wode, Taani nena worikke gaada GODAN ayyo caaqqaas.

English Sentences: Now therefore hold him not guiltless: for thou art a wise man, and knowest what thou oughtest to do unto him; but his hoar head bring thou down to the grave with blood.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ha77i neeni a xillo asadan qoodoppa. Neeni aadhdhida erai de7iyo asa; neeni a waatanaakko erana. Neeni he cima bitaniyaa suuttaara mooga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So David slept with his fathers, and was buried in the city of David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Daawiti haiqqidi, ba maizzan gaittiis; yaatidi Daawita Kataman moogettiis.

English Sentences: And the days that David reigned over Israel were forty years: seven years reigned he in Hebron, and thirty and three years reigned he in Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Israa7eela bolli oitamu laitta kawotiis; Kebroonan laappun laitta, Yerusalaamen hasttmanne heezzu laitta kawotiis.

English Sentences: Then sat Solomon upon the throne of David his father; and his kingdom was established greatly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoninne ba aawaa Daawita kawotaa araatan uttiis; a kawotettaikka keehippe minniis.

English Sentences: And Adonijah the son of Haggith came to Bathsheba the mother of Solomon. And she said, Comest thou peaceably? And he said, Peaceably.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haggiiti na7ai Adoonee, Solomona aayee Berssaabikko biis; bin Berssaaba, "Neeni taakko saruwan yaadii?" yaagada a oichchaasu. Oichchin i, "Ee; saruwan yaas" yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: He said moreover, I have somewhat to say unto thee. And she said, Say on.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan gujjidikka, "Taani nena oichchiyoobi de7ees" yaagiis. Yaagin a, "Oichcha" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And he said, Thou knowest that the kingdom was mine, and that all Israel set their faces on me, that I should reign: howbeit the kingdom is turned about, and is become my brother's: for it was his from the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin i hagaadan yaagiis; "Kawotanau bessiyai tana gididoogaanne Israa7eela asai ubbai tana bantta kawodan xeellidoogaa neeni ne huuphen eraasa. SHin yohoti laamettin kawotettai ta ishaayyo yuuyiis; hegeenne, ayyo GODAAPPE yiis.

English Sentences: And now I ask one petition of thee, deny me not. And she said unto him, Say on.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i taani nena issibaa oichchana. Hayyanaa taayyo ixxoppa" yaagiis. Yaagin a, "Oichcha" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And he said, Speak, I pray thee, unto Solomon the king, (for he will not say thee nay,) that he give me Abishag the Shunammite to wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin i, "Kawoi Solomoni neeyyo ixxis geenna; hegaa gishshau, SHuneema katamaappe yiida Abishaago giyo geela7iyo taani machchanau i o taayyo immana mala, hayyanaa a taayyo oichcharkkii" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Bathsheba said, Well; I will speak for thee unto the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Berssaaba, "Daro lo77o; taani hegaa neeyyo kawuwaassi odana" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Bathsheba therefore went unto king Solomon, to speak unto him for Adonijah. And the king rose up to meet her, and bowed himself unto her, and sat down on his throne, and caused a seat to be set for the king's mother; and she sat on his right hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Berssaaba Adooniyaa kiitaa odanau Solomonakko gelin, kawoi o mokkanau denddi eqqidi, iyyo ziggiis; ziggi simmidi ba kawotaa araatan uttiis. Qassi ba aayeessi hara kawotaa araataa ehiissidi, an baappe ushachcha baggaara utissiis.

English Sentences: Then she said, I desire one small petition of thee; I pray thee, say me not nay. And the king said unto her, Ask on, my mother: for I will not say thee nay.
Wolaitta Sentences: Uttidoogaappe guyyiyan, "Nena taani issi guuttabaa oichchiyoobi de7ees. Hayyanaa taayyo ixxis gooppa" yaagaasu. Yaagin kawoi zaaridi o, "Ta aayee, oichcha. Taani ixxis giikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And she said, Let Abishag the Shunammite be given to Adonijah thy brother to wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin a, "SHuneema katamaappe yiida Abishaago ne ishai Adoonee machchana mala ayyo immarkkii" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And king Solomon answered and said unto his mother, And why dost thou ask Abishag the Shunammite for Adonijah? ask for him the kingdom also; for he is mine elder brother; even for him, and for Abiathar the priest, and for Joab the son of Zeruiah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Kawoi Solomoni zaaridi ba aayyiyo, "SHuneema katamaappe yiida Abishaago neeni Adooniyaayyo aissi oichchai? I ta bairaa gidennee? Neeni ayyo kawotettaakka oichchanaagaa shin aggadasa! Ee, neeni ayyo, qeesiyaa Abiyaataarayyoonne Xaruuyi na7aa Yoo7aabayyo kawotettaakka oichchanaagaa aggadasa!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then king Solomon sware by the LORD, saying, God do so to me, and more also, if Adonijah have not spoken this word against his own life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi Kawoi Solomoni GODAN caaqqidi, "Adoonee hagaa oichchido gishshau taani a worana xayikko, GODAI tana woro!

English Sentences: Now therefore, as the LORD liveth, which hath established me, and set me on the throne of David my father, and who hath made me an house, as he promised, Adonijah shall be put to death this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i simmi tana ta aawaa Daawita kawotaa araatan utissidi, ta kawotettaa mintti essidi, ta zareti de7i be7anaadan oottida GODAI ero! Adooniyaa hachchi worana!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And king Solomon sent by the hand of Benaiah the son of Jehoiada; and he fell upon him that he died.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi Kawoi Solomoni Yoodaahe na7aa Banaaya azazin, i biidi Adooniyaa shocidi woriis.

English Sentences: And unto Abiathar the priest said the king, Get thee to Anathoth, unto thine own fields; for thou art worthy of death: but I will not at this time put thee to death, because thou barest the ark of the LORD God before David my father, and because thou hast been afflicted in all wherein my father was afflicted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Kawoi Solomoni qeesiyaa Abiyaataara hagaadan yaagiis; "Neeni Anatootan de7iya ne gade guyye ba. Neeni haiqqanau bessaasa; shin nena taani ha77i worikke. Aissi giikko, neeni ta aawaa Daawita sinttan Ubbaa Haariya GODAA Taabootaa tookkadasa; qassi ta aawaa metuwaa ubbaa aara metootadasa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Solomon thrust out Abiathar from being priest unto the LORD; that he might fulfil the word of the LORD, which he spake concerning the house of Eli in Shiloh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi Solomoni Abiyaataara GODAA qeese gidiyoosaappe diggidi, GODAI Seelon Eela keettaa asaabaa yootidoogaa poliis.

English Sentences: Then tidings came to Joab: for Joab had turned after Adonijah, though he turned not after Absalom. And Joab fled unto the tabernacle of the LORD, and caught hold on the horns of the altar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeselooma maaddana xayikkonne Adooniyaa maaddida Yoo7aabakko ha odoi gakkiis. Gakkin GODAA Dunkkaaniyau i baqati biidi, yarshshiyoosaa kaceta oiqqiis.

English Sentences: And it was told king Solomon that Joab was fled unto the tabernacle of the LORD; and, behold, he is by the altar. Then Solomon sent Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, saying, Go, fall upon him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoo7aabi GODAA Dunkkaaniyau baqatidi biidi, yarshshiyoosaa lanqqen de7iyoogaa Kawuwaa Solomonassi yootidosona. Yootin Solomoni Yoodaahe na7aa Banaaya, "Ba, baada a wora!" giidi azaziis.

English Sentences: And Benaiah came to the tabernacle of the LORD, and said unto him, Thus saith the king, Come forth. And he said, Nay; but I will die here. And Benaiah brought the king word again, saying, Thus said Joab, and thus he answered me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Banaayi GODAA Dunkkaaniyaa giddo gelidi Yoo7aaba, "Kawoi nena, Hagaappe kiya yaagees" yaagiis. SHin i zaaridi, "Kiyikke! Taani hagan haiqqana" yaagiis. Yaagin Banaayi kawuwaayyo, "Yoo7aabi taayyo hagaa hagaa giidi zaariis" giidi odiis.

English Sentences: And the king said unto him, Do as he hath said, and fall upon him, and bury him; that thou mayest take away the innocent blood, which Joab shed, from me, and from the house of my father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Banaaya, "I giidoogaadan a ootta; a worada mooga! Yaatikko, Yoo7aabi xillo asatu suuttaa gussido daafaappe tananne ta aawaa keettaa asaa geeshshaasa.

English Sentences: And the LORD shall return his blood upon his own head, who fell upon two men more righteous and better than he, and slew them with the sword, my father David not knowing thereof, to wit, Abner the son of Ner, captain of the host of Israel, and Amasa the son of Jether, captain of the host of Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: I gussido suuttaa acuwaa GODAI ayyo qanxxana. Aissi giikko, i ta aawai Daawiti erennan de7ishin naa77u asata bisuwan woriis; Israa7eela ola gadaawai Neera na7ai Abaneerinne Yihudaa ola gadaawai Yetera na7ai Amaasi, eti naa77aikka appe kehaanne suuriyaa daro asa.

English Sentences: Their blood shall therefore return upon the head of Joab, and upon the head of his seed for ever: but upon David, and upon his seed, and upon his house, and upon his throne, shall there be peace for ever from the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoo7aabi ha asata worido gishshau, eta suuttaa daafai merinau Yoo7aaba huuphiyaaninne a zerettatu huuphiyan wodhdho. Daawita bollinne a keettaa asaa bolli, a zerettatu bollinne a kawotaa araataa bolli merinau GODAA saroi gido" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Benaiah the son of Jehoiada went up, and fell upon him, and slew him: and he was buried in his own house in the wilderness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yoodaahe na7ai Banaayi pude kiyidi, Yoo7aaba shocidi woriis; worin i bazzon de7iya ba gaden moogettiis.

English Sentences: And the king put Benaiah the son of Jehoiada in his room over the host: and Zadok the priest did the king put in the room of Abiathar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Yoodaahe na7aa Banaaya Yoo7aaba sohuwan ola gadaawa oottidi sunttiis; qassi Abiyaataara sohuwan qeesiyaa Xaadooqa sunttiis.

English Sentences: And the king sent and called for Shimei, and said unto him, Build thee an house in Jerusalem, and dwell there, and go not forth thence any whither.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Kawoi Solomoni SHim77ayyo kiittidi hagaadan yaagiis; "Neessi Yerusalaamen keettaa keexxada, yan de7a; harasaa awanne booppa.

English Sentences: For it shall be, that on the day thou goest out, and passest over the brook Kidron, thou shalt know for certain that thou shalt surely die: thy blood shall be upon thine own head.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni katamaappe kiyada, Qediroona Zanggaaraa pinnido gallassi haiqqanaagaa era. Ne suuttaa gomee nena oiqqana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Shimei said unto the king, The saying is good: as my lord the king hath said, so will thy servant do. And Shimei dwelt in Jerusalem many days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin SHim77i zaaridi kawuwaa, "Neeni giyoogee lo77o; taani ne ashkkarai neeni ta godai kawoi giidoogaadan oottana" yaagiis. SHim77i Yerusalaamen daro wodiyaa de7iis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass at the end of three years, that two of the servants of Shimei ran away unto Achish son of Maachah king of Gath. And they told Shimei, saying, Behold, thy servants be in Gath.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin heezzu laittaappe guyyiyan, SHim77a ashkkaratuppe naa77ati betidi, Maa7ika na7aa, Gaate Kawuwaa Akiishakko biidosona; bin, "Ne ashkkarati Gaaten de7oosona" giidi SHim77ayyo yootidosona.

English Sentences: And Shimei arose, and saddled his ass, and went to Gath to Achish to seek his servants: and Shimei went, and brought his servants from Gath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yootin i ba hariyaa kooridi, ba ashkkarata koyanau Akiishakko Gaate biis; biidi Gaateppe ba ashkkarata zaaridi ehiis.

English Sentences: And it was told Solomon that Shimei had gone from Jerusalem to Gath, and was come again.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHim77i Yerusalaameppe Gaate katamaa biidi simmidoogaa Solomoni siyido wode,

English Sentences: And the king sent and called for Shimei, and said unto him, Did I not make thee to swear by the LORD, and protested unto thee, saying, Know for a certain, on the day thou goest out, and walkest abroad any whither, that thou shalt surely die? and thou saidst unto me, The word that I have heard is good.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHim77a xeesissidi hagaadan yaagiis; "Neeni yaappe denddada harasaa awanne biido gallassi, haiqqiyoogaa era gaada taani nena GODAN caaqettada seerabeikkinaa? He wode neeni Ne giyoogee lo77o; eeno, taani azazettana gaadasa.

English Sentences: Why then hast thou not kept the oath of the LORD, and the commandment that I have charged thee with?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, GODAAYYO caaqqido caaquwaanne ta azazuwaa aissi naagabeikkii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The king said moreover to Shimei, Thou knowest all the wickedness which thine heart is privy to, that thou didst to David my father: therefore the LORD shall return thy wickedness upon thine own head;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka kawoi SHim77a, "Ta aawaa Daawita bolli neeni oottido iita oosuwaa ubbaa ne wozanai erees. Ha77i simmi ne iita oosuwaa GODAI neeyyo zaarana.

English Sentences: And king Solomon shall be blessed, and the throne of David shall be established before the LORD for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Kawoi Solomoni anjjettana; Daawita kawotaa araataikka GODAA sinttan merinau saro de7ana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So the king commanded Benaiah the son of Jehoiada; which went out, and fell upon him, that he died. And the kingdom was established in the hand of Solomon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi kawoi Yoodaahe na7aa Banaaya azaziis; azazin Banaayi biidi, SHim77a shocidi woriis. Yaatin, kawotettai Solomona kushiyan minnidi eqqiis.

English Sentences: And Solomon made affinity with Pharaoh king of Egypt, and took Pharaoh's daughter, and brought her into the city of David, until he had made an end of building his own house, and the house of the LORD, and the wall of Jerusalem round about.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni Gibxxe Kawuwaara zuppetidi, a na7iyo baayyo machcho ekkiis; ekkidi ba kawo keettaa, GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaanne Yerusalaame yuushuwaa dirssaa gimbbidi polanaashin, o Daawita Katamaa ehiis.

English Sentences: Only the people sacrificed in high places, because there was no house built unto the name of the LORD, until those days.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA sunttaayyo Beeta Maqidasee biron keexettiichchibeenna gishshau, asai he wode goinniyo xoqqa sohotun yarshshiiddi takkiis.

English Sentences: And Solomon loved the LORD, walking in the statutes of David his father: only he sacrificed and burnt incense in high places.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni GODAA siiqiyoogaa ba aawaa Daawita wogan hemettiyoogan erissiis; shin goinniyo xoqqa sohotun yarshshiisinne ixaanaa cuwayiis.

English Sentences: And the king went to Gibeon to sacrifice there; for that was the great high place: a thousand burnt offerings did Solomon offer upon that altar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi yarshshuwaa yarshshanau Gabaa7oona biis; aissi giikko, he sohoi hara ubbaappe aadhdhi koshshiya goinniyo xoqqa soho. Solomoni sha7u mehiyaa ehiidi, he yarshshiyoosan xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa yarshshiis.

English Sentences: In Gibeon the LORD appeared to Solomon in a dream by night: and God said, Ask what I shall give thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Solomonayyo Gabaa7oonan qammi aimuwan qoncciis. Qonccidi Xoossai a, "Taani neeyyo ai immanau koyai?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Solomon said, Thou hast shewed unto thy servant David my father great mercy, according as he walked before thee in truth, and in righteousness, and in uprightness of heart with thee; and thou hast kept for him this great kindness, that thou hast given him a son to sit on his throne, as it is this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Solomoni, "Ne ashkkarai ta aawai Daawiti neeyyo ammanettiya xillonne suure asa gidiyo gishshau, neeni aggenna siiquwan a siiqadasa. Neeni ha gita siiquwaa aggennan siiqaidda, hachchi ha gallassi a kawotaa araatan uttiya attuma na7aa ayyo immadasa.

English Sentences: And now, O LORD my God, thou hast made thy servant king instead of David my father: and I am but a little child: I know not how to go out or come in.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha77ikka abeet GODAU, ta Xoossau, neeni tana ne ashkkaraa, ta aawaa Daawita sohuwan kawoyadasa. SHin taani guutta na7a gidiyo gishshau, asaa waata kaalettanaakko taani erikke.

English Sentences: And thy servant is in the midst of thy people which thou hast chosen, a great people, that cannot be numbered nor counted for multitude.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne ashkkarai neeni doorido asaa giddon, qoodai bainna asaa giddon de7ais.

English Sentences: Give therefore thy servant an understanding heart to judge thy people, that I may discern between good and bad: for who is able to judge this thy so great a people?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani ne asaa aissanaunne lo77uwaanne iitaa shaakkada eranau taayyo ne ashkkaraayyo akeeka wozanaa imma. Hegee xayikko, ha ne gita asaa ooni kaalettanau danddayii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the speech pleased the LORD, that Solomon had asked this thing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni hegaa oichchido gishshau, GODAI ufaittiis.

English Sentences: And God said unto him, Because thou hast asked this thing, and hast not asked for thyself long life; neither hast asked riches for thyself, nor hast asked the life of thine enemies; but hast asked for thyself understanding to discern judgment;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Xoossai a hagaadan yaagiis; "Neeni neeyyo baree aduqqanau, woikko dure gidanau, woikko ne morkketi haiqqanau oichchennan aggada, hagaa asaa suure pirddan aissiyo aadhdhida eratettaa oichchido gishshau,

English Sentences: Behold, I have done according to thy words: lo, I have given thee a wise and an understanding heart; so that there was none like thee before thee, neither after thee shall any arise like unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: neeni oichchidoogaa taani oottana. Be7a, neeppe kase ne mali bainnaagaadan neeppe simminkka ne mali denddennaagaadan, aadhdhida eratettaanne akeeka wozanaa taani neeyyo immana.

English Sentences: And I have also given thee that which thou hast not asked, both riches, and honour: so that there shall not be any among the kings like unto thee all thy days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi neeni oichchabeennabaakka taani neeyyo immana; neeni de7ido laitta ubban kawotu giddon ne keena kawoi de7ennaadan, duretaanne bonchchuwaa taani neeyyo immana.

English Sentences: And if thou wilt walk in my ways, to keep my statutes and my commandments, as thy father David did walk, then I will lengthen thy days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne aawai Daawiti hemettidoogaadan ta ogiyan hemettikko, ta wogaunne ta azazuwau azazettikko, taani ne bariyaa adussana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Solomon awoke; and, behold, it was a dream. And he came to Jerusalem, and stood before the ark of the covenant of the LORD, and offered up burnt offerings, and offered peace offerings, and made a feast to all his servants.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Solomoni beegottiis; beegottidi hegee aimo gidiyoogaa akeekiis. I Yerusalaame simmidi biidi, GODAA Maachchaa Taabootaa sinttan eqqiis; eqqidi xuuggiyo yarshshuwaanne issippetettaa yarshshuwaa yarshshiis. Yaatidi ba oosanchchatu ubbaayyo gibiraa kessiis.

English Sentences: Then came there two women, that were harlots, unto the king, and stood before him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi naa77u shaaramuxati Kawuwaa Solomonakko yiidi, a sinttan eqqidosona.

English Sentences: And the one woman said, O my lord, I and this woman dwell in one house; and I was delivered of a child with her in the house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eqqin etappe issinniyaa hagaadan yaagaasu; "Ta godau, taaninne ha mishiriyaa issi keettan de7oos. Yan a tanaara issippe de7ishin, taani issi na7a yelaas.

English Sentences: And it came to pass the third day after that I was delivered, that this woman was delivered also: and we were together; there was no stranger with us in the house, save we two in the house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta na7ai yelettido heezzantto gallassi ha mishiriyaakka issi na7a yelaasu. He keettan nu naa77aappe hara asi ooninne baawa.

English Sentences: And this woman's child died in the night; because she overlaid it.
Wolaitta Sentences: gallassi qammi a a bolli zin77ido gishshau, ha mishiree na7ai haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And she arose at midnight, and took my son from beside me, while thine handmaid slept, and laid it in her bosom, and laid her dead child in my bosom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haiqqin a qamma bilahe denddada, taani ne ashkkariyaa xiskkidaashin, ta na7aa ta miyyiyaappe ekkaasu; ekkada a ba kiyuwan wottada, ba haiqqida na7aa ta kiyuwan wottaasu.

English Sentences: And when I rose in the morning to give my child suck, behold, it was dead: but when I had considered it in the morning, behold, it was not my son, which I did bear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttin guuran taani ta na7aa xanttanau denddido wode, haiqqiichchiis! SHin taani maallado poo7uwan tishshi oottada xeelliyo wode, hekko taani yelido na7aa gidenna" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And the other woman said, Nay; but the living is my son, and the dead is thy son. And this said, No; but the dead is thy son, and the living is my son. Thus they spake before the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin hankko maccaasiya hagaadan yaagaasu; "CHii! Paxa de7iyaagee ta na7aa; haiqqidaagee neegaa" yaagaasu. SHin koiro maccaasiyaa zaarada, "CHii, haiqqidaagee ne na7aa; paxa de7iyaagee ta na7aa" yaagaasu. Hegaadan giidi eti kawuwaa sinttan palamettidosona.

English Sentences: Then said the king, The one saith, This is my son that liveth, and thy son is the dead: and the other saith, Nay; but thy son is the dead, and my son is the living.
Wolaitta Sentences: Palamettin Kawoi Solomoni hagaadan yaagiis; "Ha maccaasiyaa, Paxa de7iya na7ai taagaa; haiqqidaagee neegaa yaagausu; hankkorakka, CHii! Ne na7ai haiqqidaagaa; ta na7ai paxa de7iyaagaa yaagausu" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the king said, Bring me a sword. And they brought a sword before the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi kawoi, "Tau bisuwaa ekki yiite" yaagiis; yaagin eti ayyo bisuwaa ehiidosona.

English Sentences: And the king said, Divide the living child in two, and give half to the one, and half to the other.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ehin kawoi, "Paxa de7iya na7aa naa77u kessidi phalqqite; phalqqidi issi baggaa hannissi immite; issi baggaa hinnissi immite" yaagidi azaziis.

English Sentences: Then spake the woman whose the living child was unto the king, for her bowels yearned upon her son, and she said, O my lord, give her the living child, and in no wise slay it. But the other said, Let it be neither mine nor thine, but divide it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Azazin ha paxa de7iya na7ai ibaa gidiyo maccaasiyaa ba na7aassi mishettada kawuwaa, "Hai ta godau, paxa de7iya na7aa iyyo imma! A woroppa!" yaagaasu. SHin hankkoriyaa, "Taayyookka neeyyookka gidoppo; naa77u kiyidi phalqqetto" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Then the king answered and said, Give her the living child, and in no wise slay it: she is the mother thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan kawoi, "Ha paxa de7iya na7aa ha koiro maccaaseeyyo immite; na7aa woroppite. Hanna na7aa aayyiyo!" yaagidi pirddiis.

English Sentences: And all Israel heard of the judgment which the king had judged; and they feared the king: for they saw that the wisdom of God was in him, to do judgment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai ubbai kawoi pirddido pirddaa siyido wode, eti kawuwaa keehippe bonchchidosona. Aissi giikko, asaayyo xillotettan pirddanau ayyo aadhdhida eratettai Xoossaappe imettidoogaa be7idosona.

English Sentences: So king Solomon was king over all Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Solomoni Israa7eela biittaa ubbaa bolli kawotiis.

English Sentences: And these were the princes which he had; Azariah the son of Zadok the priest,
Wolaitta Sentences: I sunttido halaqati hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta. Xaadooqa na7ai Azaariyaasi qeese;

English Sentences: Elihoreph and Ahiah, the sons of Shisha, scribes; Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, the recorder.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHiishsha naati Elihoreefinne Akiiyi waanna xaafeta; Ahiluuda na7ai Yoosaafixi hanidabaa xaafiyaagaa;

English Sentences: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the host: and Zadok and Abiathar were the priests:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoodaahe na7ai Banaayi ola gadaawaa; Xaadooqinne Abiyaataari qeeseta;

English Sentences: And Azariah the son of Nathan was over the officers: and Zabud the son of Nathan was principal officer, and the king's friend:
Wolaitta Sentences: Naataana na7ai Azaariyaasi deriyaa heemmiyaageetu halaqaa; Naataana na7ai Zaabudi qeesenne kawuwaa dumma zoriyaagaa;

English Sentences: And Ahishar was over the household: and Adoniram the son of Abda was over the tribute.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ahishaari kawo keettaa halaqaa; Abdda na7ai Adooniraami gabbaaratu halaqaa.

English Sentences: And Solomon had twelve officers over all Israel, which provided victuals for the king and his household: each man his month in a year made provision.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Solomonayyo Israa7eela biittan ubban tammanne naa77u dereta heemmiyaageeti de7oosona; eti kawuwaassinne kawuwaa son de7iya asaa ubbaassi miyo kattaa ehiyaageeta. Etappe issoi issoi laittaa giddon issi issi aginaa kattaa ehees.

English Sentences: And these are their names: The son of Hur, in mount Ephraim:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta sunttai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettiis. Benihuuri Efireema gezziyaa heemmiyaagaa.

English Sentences: The son of Dekar, in Makaz, and in Shaalbim, and Bethshemesh, and Elonbethhanan:
Wolaitta Sentences: Benddeqari Maaqaxa, SHa7albbiima, Beeti-SHemeshanne Elooni-Beetihanaana katamata heemmiyaagaa.

English Sentences: The son of Hesed, in Aruboth; to him pertained Sochoh, and all the land of Hepher:
Wolaitta Sentences: Beniheseedi Arubboota biittaa heemmiyaagaa; Sooko biittainne Hefeera biittai ubbaikka abaa.

English Sentences: The son of Abinadab, in all the region of Dor; which had Taphath the daughter of Solomon to wife:
Wolaitta Sentences: Benabinadaabi Doora giyo biitta ubbaa heemmiyaagaa; i Solomona na7iyo Xaafaato ekkidaagaa.

English Sentences: Baana the son of Ahilud; to him pertained Taanach and Megiddo, and all Bethshean, which is by Zartanah beneath Jezreel, from Bethshean to Abelmeholah, even unto the place that is beyond Jokneam:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ahiluuda na7ai Ba7aana Taa7inaakanne Magiddo giyo katamata, Iziraa7eelappe garssan Xarttaana matan de7iya Beetishaana biittaa ubbaa, Beetishaanappe biidi Aabeeli-Mahoolaara kanttidi, Yoqima7aama hefintti gakkanaashin de7iya katamata heemmiyaagaa.

English Sentences: The son of Geber, in Ramothgilead; to him pertained the towns of Jair the son of Manasseh, which are in Gilead; to him also pertained the region of Argob, which is in Bashan, threescore great cities with walls and brasen bars:
Wolaitta Sentences: Benggebeeri Gala7aaden Raamoota giyo katama, Gala7aaden Minaase na7aa Yaa7iira katamatanne, yuushuwan gimbbeenne gimbbiyaa penggetun nahaasiyaa birataa hiraqoti de7iyo usuppun tammu gita katamatuura de7iya, Arggooba giyo biittaa heemmiyaagaa. Arggoobi Baasaanen de7ees.

English Sentences: Ahinadab the son of Iddo had Mahanaim:
Wolaitta Sentences: Iddo na7ai Ahinaadaabi Maahinaima giyo biittaa heemmiyaagaa.

English Sentences: Ahimaaz was in Naphtali; he also took Basmath the daughter of Solomon to wife:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ahima7aaxi Nifttaaleema biittaa heemmiyaagaa; i Solomona na7iyo Baasemaato ekkiis.

English Sentences: Baanah the son of Hushai was in Asher and in Aloth:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hushaaya na7ai Ba7aani Aseera biittaanne Ba7aaloota katamaa heemmiyaagaa.

English Sentences: Jehoshaphat the son of Paruah, in Issachar:
Wolaitta Sentences: Paaruha na7ai Yoosaafixi Yisaakoora biittaa heemmiyaagaa.

English Sentences: Shimei the son of Elah, in Benjamin:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eela na7ai SHim77i Biniyaama biittaa heemmiyaagaa.

English Sentences: Geber the son of Uri was in the country of Gilead, in the country of Sihon king of the Amorites, and of Og king of Bashan; and he was the only officer which was in the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Uura na7ai Gebeeri Gala7aade biittan Amooretu Kawoi Sihooninne Baasaane Kawoi Oogi kawotido biittata heemmiyaagaa; he biittata heemmiyaagee a xalaala.

English Sentences: Judah and Israel were many, as the sand which is by the sea in multitude, eating and drinking, and making merry.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa asainne Israa7eela asai abbaa doona shafiyaadan corattidosona; eti miiddinne uyiiddi ufaittidi de7idosona.

English Sentences: And Solomon reigned over all kingdoms from the river unto the land of the Philistines, and unto the border of Egypt: they brought presents, and served Solomon all the days of his life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni Efiraaxiisa SHaafaappe doommidi Pilisxxeema biittaa gakkanaashin, hegaappekka Gibxxe zawaa gakkanaashin de7iya kawotettata ubbaa haariis. He biittaa asati au giiraa giiridosona; eti a de7o laitta ubban ayyo haarettidosona.

English Sentences: And Solomon's provision for one day was thirty measures of fine flour, and threescore measures of meal,
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomonayyo hachchi hachchi qumau ishatamu konttaale muruta xiilliyaa, xeetu konttaale xiilliyaa,

English Sentences: Ten fat oxen, and twenty oxen out of the pastures, and an hundred sheep, beside harts, and roebucks, and fallowdeer, and fatted fowl.
Wolaitta Sentences: xiikkin modhdhida tammu boorata, yedan miida laatamu booratanne xeetu dorssata, eta bollikka cofoshota, gaarata, genessatanne ordde kuttota koshshees.

English Sentences: For he had dominion over all the region on this side the river, from Tiphsah even to Azzah, over all the kings on this side the river: and he had peace on all sides round about him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni Efiraaxiisa SHaafaappe arggo baggaara de7iya kawotettata ubbaa Tifisaaha katamaappe doommidi Gaaza katamaa gakkanaashin haariis; ba yuushuwan de7iya biitta ubbaarakka saro de7iis.

English Sentences: And Judah and Israel dwelt safely, every man under his vine and under his fig tree, from Dan even to Beersheba, all the days of Solomon.
Wolaitta Sentences: A de7o laitta ubban Yihudaa asainne Israa7eela asai Daanappe biidi Berssaabeha gakkanaashin, ubbai ba woiniyaa turaa kuwaaninne ba ettaa kuwan saro de7iis.

English Sentences: And Solomon had forty thousand stalls of horses for his chariots, and twelve thousand horsemen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomonayyo olaa paraa gaareta goochchiya oitamu sha7u gaaxaata paratinne tammanne naa77u sha7u paraasati de7oosona.

English Sentences: And those officers provided victual for king Solomon, and for all that came unto king Solomon's table, every man in his month: they lacked nothing.
Wolaitta Sentences: He deriyaa heemmiyaageeti bantta aginan aginan Kawoi Solomoninne a maaddan maanau yiida asai ubbai miyoobaa shiishshidosona. Eti hegaappe aibanne pacissokkona.

English Sentences: Barley also and straw for the horses and dromedaries brought they unto the place where the officers were, every man according to his charge.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti qassi gaariyaa paratinne hankko parati maanau banggaanne dalaa peeriyan banttana gakkidaagaa gakkidaagaa ehiidi a wottiyoosan wottidosona.

English Sentences: And God gave Solomon wisdom and understanding exceeding much, and largeness of heart, even as the sand that is on the sea shore.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Solomonayyo aadhdhida eratettaa, akeekaanne zawi bainna aaho qofaa immiis.

English Sentences: And Solomon's wisdom excelled the wisdom of all the children of the east country, and all the wisdom of Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomona aadhdhida eratettai arshsho baggaara de7iya asa ubbaa aadhdhida eratettaappenne Gibxxetu aadhdhida eratetta ubbaappekka aadhdhiis.

English Sentences: For he was wiser than all men; than Ethan the Ezrahite, and Heman, and Chalcol, and Darda, the sons of Mahol: and his fame was in all nations round about.
Wolaitta Sentences: I asa ubbaappe aadhdhida eranchcha; qassi i Ezirahiyaa Etaanappekka, Maahola naatu Hemaanappe, Kalkkoolappenne Darddaa7appekka aadhdhida eranchchaa. A woree yuushuwan de7iya kawotettata ubbaa gakkiis.

English Sentences: And he spake three thousand proverbs: and his songs were a thousand and five.
Wolaitta Sentences: I heezzu sha7u leemisota haasayiis; qassi a yettati issi sha7anne ichchasha.

English Sentences: And he spake of trees, from the cedar tree that is in Lebanon even unto the hyssop that springeth out of the wall: he spake also of beasts, and of fowl, and of creeping things, and of fishes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni Liibaanoosa zigaappe doommidi, keettaa gimbbiyaa bolli mokkiya hiisoophphiyaa giyo mittaa gakkanaashin, mittaabaa yootiis; hegaadankka qassi mehetubaa, do7atubaa, kafotubaa, sa7aara gooshettiya meretatubaanne moletubaa tamaarissiis.

English Sentences: And there came of all people to hear the wisdom of Solomon, from all kings of the earth, which had heard of his wisdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: A aadhdhida eratettaa siyida biittan sa7an de7iya kawoti ubbai kiittin, kawotetta ubbaappe asai Solomona aadhdhida eraa siyanau yiis.

English Sentences: And Hiram king of Tyre sent his servants unto Solomon; for he had heard that they had anointed him king in the room of his father: for Hiram was ever a lover of David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xiiroosa Kawoi Kiiraami Daawitaara ubbaton siiqettiiddi gam77ido gishshau, Solomoni ba aawaa Daawita sohuwan kawotanau tiyettidoogaa siyidi, ba oosanchchata Solomonakko kiittiis.

English Sentences: And Solomon sent to Hiram, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiittin Solomonikka Kiiraamayyo zaaridi hagaadan yaagidi kiittiis;

English Sentences: Thou knowest how that David my father could not build an house unto the name of the LORD his God for the wars which were about him on every side, until the LORD put them under the soles of his feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI a morkketa a tohuwaappe garssaara haarissana gakkanaashin, ta aawaa Daawita bolli ubbasaara denddida olaa gaasuwan, GODAA ba Xoossaa sunttaayyo Beeta Maqidase i keexxibeennaagaa neeni eraasa.

English Sentences: But now the LORD my God hath given me rest on every side, so that there is neither adversary nor evil occurrent.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ha77i GODAI ta Xoossai taayyo ubbasaara shemppuwaa immiis; immin taayyo aiba morkkeekka woikko iitabikka baawa.

English Sentences: And, behold, I purpose to build an house unto the name of the LORD my God, as the LORD spake unto David my father, saying, Thy son, whom I will set upon thy throne in thy room, he shall build an house unto my name.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ta aawaa Daawitayyo, Taani ne sohuwan, ne kawotaa araatan kawoyiyo ne na7ai ta sunttaayyo Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxana giidoogaadankka, taani GODAA ta Xoossaa sunttaayyo Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxanau halchchaas.

English Sentences: Now therefore command thou that they hew me cedar trees out of Lebanon; and my servants shall be with thy servants: and unto thee will I give hire for thy servants according to all that thou shalt appoint: for thou knowest that there is not among us any that can skill to hew timber like unto the Sidonians.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Liibaanoosappe zigaa taayyo qanxxiya asata azaza; ta asati ne asatuura oottana. Yaatobare ne asatussi neeni qanxxa giido damoozaa aiba gidikkonne, taani qanxxana. Sidoona asatudan mittaa qanxxuwaa hiillaa nu asai erennaagaa neeni eraasa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when Hiram heard the words of Solomon, that he rejoiced greatly, and said, Blessed be the LORD this day, which hath given unto David a wise son over this great people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiiraami Solomona kiitaa siyidi keehippe ufaittiis; ufaittidi, "Ha gita kawotettaa haarana mala, Daawitassi ha aadhdhida eranchcha na7aa immida GODAI hachchi galatetto" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Hiram sent to Solomon, saying, I have considered the things which thou sentest to me for: and I will do all thy desire concerning timber of cedar, and concerning timber of fir.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Kiiraami Solomonayyo hagaadan yaagidi kiittiis; "Neeni taayyo kiittido kiitai tana gakkiis. Neeni koyidobaa ubbaa taani oottana; zigaa mudettaanne xiiddaa mudettaa taani neeyyo shiishshana.

English Sentences: My servants shall bring them down from Lebanon unto the sea: and I will convey them by sea in floats unto the place that thou shalt appoint me, and will cause them to be discharged there, and thou shalt receive them: and thou shalt accomplish my desire, in giving food for my household.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta asati ne mudettaa Liibaanoosappe duge abbau miyyana. Miyyin taani qashissada, abbaa bollaara tookettidi neeni malaatosaa gakkanaadan oottana; gakkin taani yan birshshissana; birshshissada yaappe efiissana. Hegaappe guyyiyan neeni ne baggaara ta kawo keettan de7iya asaayyo miyoobaa kiittiyoogan ta amuwaa polana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Hiram gave Solomon cedar trees and fir trees according to all his desire.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan oottidi Kiiraami Solomoni koyido keena zigaa mudettaanne xiiddaa mudettaa ubbaa immiis.

English Sentences: And Solomon gave Hiram twenty thousand measures of wheat for food to his household, and twenty measures of pure oil: thus gave Solomon to Hiram year by year.
Wolaitta Sentences: Immin Solomonikka kawo keettan de7iya asai maanau laatamu sha7u konttaale gisttiyaanne oiddu xeetu sha7u litiro geeshsha wogaraa zaitiyaa laittan laittan paccennan Kiiraamayyo immiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD gave Solomon wisdom, as he promised him: and there was peace between Hiram and Solomon; and they two made a league together.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Solomonassi immana giidoogaadan, ayyo aadhdhida eratettaa immiis. Kiiraaminne Solomoni bantta giddon saro de7idosona; eti naa77ai bantta giddon maachchaa maacettidosona.

English Sentences: And king Solomon raised a levy out of all Israel; and the levy was thirty thousand men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Solomoni Israa7eela ubbaappe hasttamu sha7u gabbaarata dooridi kessiis.

English Sentences: And he sent them to Lebanon, ten thousand a month by courses: a month they were in Lebanon, and two months at home: and Adoniram was over the levy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dooridi Adooniraama giyo bitaniyaa eta bolli halaqa oottidi sunttiis. Gabbaaratakka tammu sha7aa tammu sha7aa shaakkidi, heezzu cita kessiis; issi issi citai kayan kayan biidi, issi aginaa Liibaanoosan oottanaadaaninne naa77u aginaa bantta son de7anaadan kuuyiis.

English Sentences: And Solomon had threescore and ten thousand that bare burdens, and fourscore thousand hewers in the mountains;
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomonayyo tooho tookkiya laappun tammu sha7u asatinne shuchchaa qoo7iya hosppun tammu sha7u asati gezziyan de7oosona.

English Sentences: Beside the chief of Solomon's officers which were over the work, three thousand and three hundred, which ruled over the people that wrought in the work.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti halaqa gididi asaa oosuwaa ootissiya heezzu sha7anne heezzu xeetu asata gujjennaana.

English Sentences: And the king commanded, and they brought great stones, costly stones, and hewed stones, to lay the foundation of the house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oosanchchati Kawoi Solomoni azazin, Beeta Maqidasiyaayyo baaso gidana mala wogga muruta shuchchata qoo7idi massidosona.

English Sentences: And Solomon's builders and Hiram's builders did hew them, and the stonesquarers: so they prepared timber and stones to build the house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomona asatinne Kiiraama asati kushe hiillaa eriyaageeti, Gebaala asatuurakka gididi, Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxanau mittaa qanxxidinne shuchchaa qoo7idi giigissidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass in the four hundred and eightieth year after the children of Israel were come out of the land of Egypt, in the fourth year of Solomon's reign over Israel, in the month Zif, which is the second month, that he began to build the house of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai Gibxxe biittaappe kiyido oiddu xeetanne hosppun tammantta laittan, Solomoni Israa7eela bolli kawotido oiddantto laittan, Ziifa giyo naa77antto aginan, Solomoni GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxanau doommiis.

English Sentences: And the house which king Solomon built for the LORD, the length thereof was threescore cubits, and the breadth thereof twenty cubits, and the height thereof thirty cubits.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni GODAAYYO keexxido Beeta Maqidasee zananaa usuppun tammu wara adussa; gomppaa laatamu wara aaho; geesaa hasttamu wara xoqqa.

English Sentences: And the porch before the temple of the house, twenty cubits was the length thereof, according to the breadth of the house; and ten cubits was the breadth thereof before the house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeta Maqidasiyaa geliyoosan de7iya baranddaa gomppai Beeta Maqidasiyaa gomppaakka keena laatamu wara; keettaa zananai Beeta Maqidasiyaa geliyoosaa gakkanaashin tammu wara.

English Sentences: And for the house he made windows of narrow lights.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeta Maqidasiyau so baggaara aakkidi, kare baggaara xuummida maskkooteti de7oosona.

English Sentences: And against the wall of the house he built chambers round about, against the walls of the house round about, both of the temple and of the oracle: and he made chambers round about:
Wolaitta Sentences: He keettaa yuushuwan hara kifileta keexxiis; he kifileti heezzu pooqeti de7iyoogeeta; zamadaa yeggiyo mittai geeshsha sohuwaa giddo gelenna mala, koiro godaara oisettidi shuchchaa wottidi, gimbbiyaayyo hirkki wurssettaa orddissiis.

English Sentences: The nethermost chamber was five cubits broad, and the middle was six cubits broad, and the third was seven cubits broad: for without in the wall of the house he made narrowed rests round about, that the beams should not be fastened in the walls of the house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gaasuwan garssa koiro pooqee ichchashu wara aaho; naa77antto pooqee usuppun wara aaho; heezzantto pooqee laappun wara aaho.

English Sentences: And the house, when it was in building, was built of stone made ready before it was brought thither: so that there was neither hammer nor axe nor any tool of iron heard in the house, while it was in building.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeta Maqidasee hini qoo7iyoosan masettida shuchcha xalaalan gimbbettiis; yaatin, Beeta Maqidasee gimbbettido wode, dijino, kaltta, woikko hara ai birata cenggurssinne Beeta Maqidasiyan siyettibeenna.

English Sentences: The door for the middle chamber was in the right side of the house: and they went up with winding stairs into the middle chamber, and out of the middle into the third.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe garssaara de7iya pooqiyaa geliyo penggee Beeta Maqidasiyaappe tohossa baggaara de7ees; he sohuwaappe naa77antto pooqiyaunne heezzantto pooqiyau baanau yedhdhi kiyiyo xekkati de7oosona.

English Sentences: So he built the house, and finished it; and covered the house with beams and boards of cedar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan oottidi, Solomoni keettaa keexxidi poliis; yaatidi zigaa xaulaanne masettaa bollaara kammiis.

English Sentences: And then he built chambers against all the house, five cubits high: and they rested on the house with timber of cedar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Beeta Maqidasiyaa yuushuwan pooqeta keexxidi poliis; eta xoqqatettai issuwaagee issuwaagee ichchashu wara gididi, godaara zigaa xaulan oiqettidosona.

English Sentences: And the word of the LORD came to Solomon, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalai Solomonakko yiis; yiidi Solomona,

English Sentences: Concerning this house which thou art in building, if thou wilt walk in my statutes, and execute my judgments, and keep all my commandments to walk in them; then will I perform my word with thee, which I spake unto David thy father:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha neeni keexxiyo Beeta Maqidasiyaa gidikko, neeni ta awaajuwaa kaallikko, ta wogaa oottikko, ta azazota ubbaa naagikkonne azazettikko, yaatikko, taani ne aawaa Daawitassi immido ufaissaa ne baggaara polana.

English Sentences: And I will dwell among the children of Israel, and will not forsake my people Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatada taani Israa7eela asaa giddon de7ana; taani ta asaa Israa7eela aggikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Solomon built the house, and finished it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxidi poliis.

English Sentences: And he built the walls of the house within with boards of cedar, both the floor of the house, and the walls of the ceiling: and he covered them on the inside with wood, and covered the floor of the house with planks of fir.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeta Maqidasiyaayyo so bagga godaa, wuigiyaappe biidi kaaraa gakkanaashin zigaa xaulaa licidi kammiis; qassi wuigiyankka xiiddaa xaulaa hiixxiis.

English Sentences: And he built twenty cubits on the sides of the house, both the floor and the walls with boards of cedar: he even built them for it within, even for the oracle, even for the most holy place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddon Ubbaappe Aadhdhiya Geeshsha Sohuwaa giyo qol77uwaa medhdhanau, guyye baggaara laatamu wara gidiya sohuwaa shaakkiis; shaakkidi wuigiyaappe kaaraa gakkanaashin zigaa xaulaa godaa essiis.

English Sentences: And the house, that is, the temple before it, was forty cubits long.
Wolaitta Sentences: He qol77uwaappe sintta baggaara de7iya wuigiyaa zananai oitamu wara adussa.

English Sentences: And the cedar of the house within was carved with knops and open flowers: all was cedar; there was no stone seen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeta Maqidasiyaayyo so baggai massido gosiyaanne ciyyida ciishshaa misiliyaa medhdhido zigaa xaulan licetti kamettiis; ubbabaikka ziga; aiba shuchchinne beettenna.

English Sentences: And the oracle he prepared in the house within, to set there the ark of the covenant of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni GODAA Maachchaa Taabootaa wottanau Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddon Ubbaappe Aadhdhiya Geeshsha Sohuwaa giigissiis.

English Sentences: And the oracle in the forepart was twenty cubits in length, and twenty cubits in breadth, and twenty cubits in the height thereof: and he overlaid it with pure gold; and so covered the altar which was of cedar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Aadhdhiya Geeshsha Sohoi laatamu wara adussa, laatamu wara aahonne laatamu wara xoqqa. Solomoni he qol77uwaassi so baggaa walahi bainna worqqan sheeshshiis. Qassi yarshshiyoosaikka zigaa xaulan kamettiis.

English Sentences: So Solomon overlaid the house within with pure gold: and he made a partition by the chains of gold before the oracle; and he overlaid it with gold.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni Beeta Maqidasiyaa gidduwaa walahi bainna worqqan sheeshshiis; worqqaa sheeshshido qol77uwaa geliyo penggiyaayyo bolla qoriyaa yaanne haanne gakkiya worqqa sanssalataa tolidi alleeqissiis.

English Sentences: And the whole house he overlaid with gold, until he had finished all the house: also the whole altar that was by the oracle he overlaid with gold.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi keetta giddo ubbaa worqqan sheeshshiis; qassi Ubbaappe Aadhdhiya Geeshsha Sohuwaa sinttan de7iya yarshshiyoosaa worqqan sheeshshiis.

English Sentences: And within the oracle he made two cherubims of olive tree, each ten cubits high.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Aadhdhiya Geeshsha Sohuwan wottanau issoi issoi tammu waraa aduqqiya wogaraappe naa77u kiruubetu misileta massidi giigissiis.

English Sentences: And five cubits was the one wing of the cherub, and five cubits the other wing of the cherub: from the uttermost part of the one wing unto the uttermost part of the other were ten cubits.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koiro kiruubiyaa qefee issoi ichchashu wara; naa77anttoi qassi ichchashu wara; koiro qefiyaa xeeraappe biidi naa77antto qefiyaa xeeraa gakkanaashin tammu wara.

English Sentences: And the other cherub was ten cubits: both the cherubims were of one measure and one size.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77antto kiruubeekka tammu wara; naa77u kiruubetu qottainne merai issi mala.

English Sentences: The height of the one cherub was ten cubits, and so was it of the other cherub.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi kiruubiyaa geesai tammu wara; naa77anttuwaageekka hegaa keena.

English Sentences: And he set the cherubims within the inner house: and they stretched forth the wings of the cherubims, so that the wing of the one touched the one wall, and the wing of the other cherub touched the other wall; and their wings touched one another in the midst of the house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni Beeta Maqidasiyan de7iya Ubbaappe Aadhdhiya Geeshsha Sohuwan kiruubeta wottiis. Eta qefee micetti uttiis; issi kiruubiyaa qefee issi bagga godaa bochchiyo wode, hinkko kiruubiyaa qefee qassi hinkko bagga godaa bochchees; eta naa77aa qefetikka so giddon issoi issuwaa bochchoosona.

English Sentences: And he overlaid the cherubims with gold.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni kiruubetakka worqqan sheeshshiis.

English Sentences: And he carved all the walls of the house round about with carved figures of cherubims and palm trees and open flowers, within and without.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qol77uwaanne wuigiyaa godaa ubbaa kiruubeta, zambbaanne ciyyida ciishshaa misiliyaa massidoogan alleeqissiis.

English Sentences: And the floor of the house he overlaid with gold, within and without.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeta Maqidasiyaayyo so giddo kifiliyaa wuigiyaakka kare bagga kifiliyaa wuigiyaakka worqqan sheeshshiis.

English Sentences: And for the entering of the oracle he made doors of olive tree: the lintel and side posts were a fifth part of the wall.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Aadhdhiya Geeshsha Sohuwaa geliyo penggiyaassi wogaraa mittaappe sanqqata kessiis. Qosilettati ichchashu baggaara zoozee de7iyoogeeta.

English Sentences: The two doors also were of olive tree; and he carved upon them carvings of cherubims and palm trees and open flowers, and overlaid them with gold, and spread gold upon the cherubims, and upon the palm trees.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wogaraa mittaappe oosettida naa77u sanqqatu bollan kiruubeta, zambbaanne ciyyida ciishshaa misiliyaa massidi, sanqqata, kiruubetanne zambbaa worqqan sheeshshiis.

English Sentences: So also made he for the door of the temple posts of olive tree, a fourth part of the wall.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka, Beeta Maqidasiyaa wuige geliyo penggiyau wogaraappe kessido oiddu zooziyaara de7iya qosilettaa essiis.

English Sentences: And the two doors were of fir tree: the two leaves of the one door were folding, and the two leaves of the other door were folding.
Wolaitta Sentences: I qassi he penggiyaayyo issi issi sanqqai gidduwan dakkotidi dooyettiyo naa77u sanqqata kessiis.

English Sentences: And he carved thereon cherubims and palm trees and open flowers: and covered them with gold fitted upon the carved work.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiruubeta, zambbaanne ciyyida ciishshaa misileta eta bolli massiis; he masettidaageetu bolli worqqaa issi mala oottidi sheeshshiis.

English Sentences: And he built the inner court with three rows of hewed stone, and a row of cedar beams.
Wolaitta Sentences: So baggaara de7iya dabaabaa gimbbiis; he gimbbee masettida shuchchaa heezzaa, issuwaa issuwaa bolli wottidi, issi zigaa masettaa eta bolli wottidi gimbbidoogaa.

English Sentences: In the fourth year was the foundation of the house of the LORD laid, in the month Zif:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa baasoi Solomoni kawotido oiddantto laittan, Ziifa giyo naa77antto aginan baasettiis.

English Sentences: And in the eleventh year, in the month Bul, which is the eighth month, was the house finished throughout all the parts thereof, and according to all the fashion of it. So was he seven years in building it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni kawotido tammanne isiinintta laittan, Bula giyo hosppuntta aginan Beeta Maqidasee halchchidoogaadan muleera keexettidi polettiis. Solomoni Beeta Maqidasiyaa laappun laittan keexxidi wurssiis.

English Sentences: But Solomon was building his own house thirteen years, and he finished all his house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni ba keettaa tammanne heezzu laittan keexxidi wurssiis.

English Sentences: He built also the house of the forest of Lebanon; the length thereof was an hundred cubits, and the breadth thereof fifty cubits, and the height thereof thirty cubits, upon four rows of cedar pillars, with cedar beams upon the pillars.
Wolaitta Sentences: Liibaanoosa Woraa Keettaa geetettiya keettaa Solomoni keexxiis; he keettaa zananai xeetu wara; gomppai ishatamu wara; geesai hasttamu wara. Zigaa tuuqeti oiddu maaran eqqidosona; qassi masettida zigaa mudettati eta bolli wodhdhidosona;

English Sentences: And it was covered with cedar above upon the beams, that lay on forty five pillars, fifteen in a row.
Wolaitta Sentences: mudettati heezzu maaran, issi issi maaran tammanne ichchashu mudettati de7oosona; eti muleera oitamanne ichchasha.

English Sentences: And there were windows in three rows, and light was against light in three ranks.
Wolaitta Sentences: He keettaayyo maskkooteti heezzu maaran de7oosona; eti issoi issuwau sintta baazzan de7oosona.

English Sentences: And all the doors and posts were square, with the windows: and light was against light in three ranks.
Wolaitta Sentences: Penggetinne maskkooteti oiddu zooziyaara de7oosona; maskkooteti heezzu maaran gididi, issoi issuwau sintta baazzan de7oosona.

English Sentences: And he made a porch of pillars; the length thereof was fifty cubits, and the breadth thereof thirty cubits: and the porch was before them: and the other pillars and the thick beam were before them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni Tuuqetu Keettaa geetettiya keettaakka keexxiis; he keettaa zananai ishatamu wara; gomppai hasttamu wara. He keettaa sinttan daro tuuqiyan zemppidanne bollaara kaaran kamettida baranddai de7ees.

English Sentences: Then he made a porch for the throne where he might judge, even the porch of judgment: and it was covered with cedar from one side of the floor to the other.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi i pirddaayyo kawotaa araatai de7iyo Pirdda Keettaakka keexxiis; he keettai wuigiyaappe biidi kaaraa gakkanaashin zigan kametti uttiis.

English Sentences: And his house where he dwelt had another court within the porch, which was of the like work. Solomon made also an house for Pharaoh's daughter, whom he had taken to wife, like unto this porch.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pirdda Keettaappe guyyen de7iya hara dabaaban bau daanau kawo keettaa hankko keettatudan oottidi keexxiis; ba keettaayeessi, Gibxxe kawuwaa na7eessikka he keettaa mala keettaa keexxiis.

English Sentences: All these were of costly stones, according to the measures of hewed stones, sawed with saws, within and without, even from the foundation unto the coping, and so on the outside toward the great court.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha keettati ubbai, kareppe doommidi biidi dirssaappe soora de7iya gita gutaraara gakkanaashin, baasuwaappe doommidi kaaraa gakkanaashin, likkidi massidonne sooranne kareera soofidi giigissido muruta shuchchaappe oosettidosona.

English Sentences: And the foundation was of costly stones, even great stones, stones of ten cubits, and stones of eight cubits.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gimbbee hiixettidoi tammu wara woikko hosppun wara gidiya lo77o masettida gita shuchchaana.

English Sentences: And above were costly stones, after the measures of hewed stones, and cedars.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe bolla baggaara likettidi masettida muruta shuchchainne zigaa mudettai de7ees.

English Sentences: And the great court round about was with three rows of hewed stones, and a row of cedar beams, both for the inner court of the house of the LORD, and for the porch of the house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gita dabaabaa yuushuwan de7iya gimbbee GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaadaaninne baranddaadan masettida shuchchaa heezzaa, issuwaa issuwaa bolli wottidi, issi zigaa masettaa eta bolli wottidi gimbbidoogaa.

English Sentences: And king Solomon sent and fetched Hiram out of Tyre.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Solomoni kiittidi, Huraama giyo bitaniyaa Xiiroosa katamaappe ehiissiis.

English Sentences: He was a widow's son of the tribe of Naphtali, and his father was a man of Tyre, a worker in brass: and he was filled with wisdom, and understanding, and cunning to work all works in brass. And he came to king Solomon, and wrought all his work.
Wolaitta Sentences: Huraama aayyiyaa am77e; a Nifttaaleema zare asa. A aawai Xiiroosa asa. Huraami nahaasiyaa giyo birataa qoxxiyo hiillai de7iyo asa; i nahaasiyaappe qoxxidi kessiyooban ubban keehippe loohida asa; Solomonakko i yiidi, a ooso ubbaa oottiis.

English Sentences: For he cast two pillars of brass, of eighteen cubits high apiece: and a line of twelve cubits did compass either of them about.
Wolaitta Sentences: Huraami issuwaa issuwaa geesai tammanne hosppun wara aduqqidi, yuushoi tammanne naa77u wara aakkido naa77u tuussata nahaasiyaa seerissidi tigidi kessiis. Tuussatuyyo giddoi kofa.

English Sentences: And he made two chapiters of molten brass, to set upon the tops of the pillars: the height of the one chapiter was five cubits, and the height of the other chapiter was five cubits:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka, tuussatu huuphiyan wottanau naa77u gumbbota nahaasiyaappe seerissidi, medhdhiis; issi issi gumbboi ichchashu wara aduqqees.

English Sentences: And nets of checker work, and wreaths of chain work, for the chapiters which were upon the top of the pillars; seven for the one chapiter, and seven for the other chapiter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tuussaa huuphiyan de7iya issi issi gumbbota gitedan oottido laappun sanssalataa qaxiqallotuuninne

English Sentences: And he made the pillars, and two rows round about upon the one network, to cover the chapiters that were upon the top, with pomegranates: and so did he for the other chapiter.
Wolaitta Sentences: naa77u maaraara roomaane giyo teeraa misiletun alleeqissi wottiis.

English Sentences: And the chapiters that were upon the top of the pillars were of lily work in the porch, four cubits.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baranddan eqqida tuussatu bolli de7iya gumbboti ciishshaa meran merettidosona; eta geesai oiddu wara.

English Sentences: And the chapiters upon the two pillars had pomegranates also above, over against the belly which was by the network: and the pomegranates were two hundred in rows round about upon the other chapiter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77u tuuqetu huuphiyan de7iya gumbbotun mulumuqqetti uttida sohuwaappe bolla baggaara, sanssalataa qaxiqalluwaappe kaallidi, naa77u xeetu roomaane teeraa misileti naa77u maaran yuuyi aadhdhidi de7oosona.
