English Sentences: And he set up the pillars in the porch of the temple: and he set up the right pillar, and called the name thereof Jachin: and he set up the left pillar, and called the name thereof Boaz.
Wolaitta Sentences: Huraami he naa77u tuussata Beeta Maqidasiyaa baranddaa matan essiis. Essidi ushachcha baggaara eqqida tuussaa Yaakiina sunttiis; haddirssa baggaara eqqida tuussaa qassi Boo7eeza sunttiis.

English Sentences: And upon the top of the pillars was lily work: so was the work of the pillars finished.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tuussatu huuphiyan de7iya gumbboti ciishsha milatidi merettidosona. Hegaadan hanidi tuussatu oosoi polettiis.

English Sentences: And he made a molten sea, ten cubits from the one brim to the other: it was round all about, and his height was five cubits: and a line of thirty cubits did compass it round about.
Wolaitta Sentences: Huraami Abba Sainiyaa giyo issi keehi gita sainiyaa nahaasiyaa birataappe seerissi tigidi medhdhiis. He Abba Sainiyaa doonai ha gaxaappe ya gaxaa gakkanaashin tammu wara; geesai ichchashu wara; yuushoi qassi hasttamu wara.

English Sentences: And under the brim of it round about there were knops compassing it, ten in a cubit, compassing the sea round about: the knops were cast in two rows, when it was cast.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abba Sainiyaa doonan kare baggaara ziqqi giidi, aara oiqettidi merettida gosetu misileti de7oosona; he gosetu misileti naa77u maaran, issi issi waran tammai tammai yuuyi aadhdhidi shuuyettidosona.

English Sentences: It stood upon twelve oxen, three looking toward the north, and three looking toward the west, and three looking toward the south, and three looking toward the east: and the sea was set above upon them, and all their hinder parts were inward.
Wolaitta Sentences: He Abba Sainee nahaasiyaa birataappe merettida tammanne naa77u booratu misiletu zokkuwan uttiis. Booratu misiletuppe heezzati huuphessa baggi, heezzati arggo baggi, heezzati tohossa baggi, heezzati qassi arshsho baggi simmidi xeelliyaabaa milatoosona. Abba Sainee eta bolli uttiis; etayyo guyye baggai giddokko simmi uttiis.

English Sentences: And it was an hand breadth thick, and the brim thereof was wrought like the brim of a cup, with flowers of lilies: it contained two thousand baths.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abba Sainee issi takkaaro keena ordde; a doonai wanccaa doonaa mala; qassi ciishshai ciyyidaagaakka malatees. He Abba Sainee oitamu sha7u litiro gidiya haattaa oiqqiyaagaa.

English Sentences: And he made ten bases of brass; four cubits was the length of one base, and four cubits the breadth thereof, and three cubits the height of it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Huraami qassi tammu gaareta nahaasiyaa birataappe medhdhiis. He gaareti issoi issoi oiddu wara adussa; oiddu wara aahonne heezzu wara xoqqa.

English Sentences: And the work of the bases was on this manner: they had borders, and the borders were between the ledges:
Wolaitta Sentences: He gaareti hagaadan oosettidosona; pude eqqida oiddu biratatu bolli piddi giida lochcha nahaase biratati oiqetti uttidosona.

English Sentences: And on the borders that were between the ledges were lions, oxen, and cherubims: and upon the ledges there was a base above: and beneath the lions and oxen were certain additions made of thin work.
Wolaitta Sentences: He biratatu bolli gaammota, booratanne kiruubeta milatissidi medhdhido misileti de7oosona; gaammotunne booratu misiletuppe huuphessaaranne tohossaara de7iya biratatu bolli qassi qoxxidi medhdhido ciishshaa enccurssaa misileti de7oosona.

English Sentences: And every base had four brasen wheels, and plates of brass: and the four corners thereof had undersetters: under the laver were undersetters molten, at the side of every addition.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi issi gaariyaayyo nahaasiyaappe oottido oiddu irzziizotinne irzziizota gatti waaxiyo nahaasiyaa kasoti de7oosona. Hegaadankka, oiddu zoozetun keriyaa zemppissiyoobati de7oosona. He zemppissiyoobati ciishshaa enccurssaa milatiya misiletun alleeqetti uttidosona.

English Sentences: And the mouth of it within the chapiter and above was a cubit: but the mouth thereof was round after the work of the base, a cubit and an half: and also upon the mouth of it were gravings with their borders, foursquare, not round.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaariyaa zemppissiyoobatu huuphiyan irzziizoti uttida shaashee de7ees; he shaashee gaariyaa xeeraappe pude issi wara gidiyaagaa xoqqu giidi, duge bagga wara gidiyaagaa ziqqi giidi merettiis. He shaashiyaayyo doonai yuuyi aadhdhidi misiliyan alleeqetti uttiis.

English Sentences: And under the borders were four wheels; and the axletrees of the wheels were joined to the base: and the height of a wheel was a cubit and half a cubit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Irzziizotu geesai issi waranne bagga; irzziizoti lochcha nahaase biratatuyyo garssa baggaara de7oosona. Irzziizoti oiqetti uttido kasoti gaariyaara oiqetti uttidosona.

English Sentences: And the work of the wheels was like the work of a chariot wheel: their axletrees, and their naves, and their felloes, and their spokes, were all molten.
Wolaitta Sentences: Irzziizoti olaa paraa gaariyaa irzziizotudan merettidosona; irzziizota gattidi oiqqiya kasoti, charkketinne raazheti ubbaikka nahaasiyaappe tigettidi oosettidosona.

English Sentences: And there were four undersetters to the four corners of one base: and the undersetters were of the very base itself.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gaaretu ubbaa zoozetussikka eta tohossaara tohossaara etaara issuwaa gidi oiqettidi, nahaasiyaappe merettida zemppoti de7oosona.

English Sentences: And in the top of the base was there a round compass of half a cubit high: and on the top of the base the ledges thereof and the borders thereof were of the same.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi issi gaariyaa huuphiyaa yuushuwan issi waraayyo baggaa aduqqiya shaashee de7ees; zemppotinne lochcha nahaaseti gaariyaara oiqettidi, issuwaa gididi oosettidosona.

English Sentences: For on the plates of the ledges thereof, and on the borders thereof, he graved cherubims, lions, and palm trees, according to the proportion of every one, and additions round about.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha zemppotuppenne lochcha nahaasetuppe gidduwan de7iya kallo sohotu ubbai kiruubetu, gaammotunne zambbatu misiletun alleeqetti uttidosona; qassi eta yuushoi ciishsha enccurssaa misiliyan alleeqetti uttiis.

English Sentences: After this manner he made the ten bases: all of them had one casting, one measure, and one size.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi tammu gaaretikka hagaadan oosettidosona; seerissidi eta tigido miishshai issuwaa gidiyo gishshau, eta geesaikka eta qottaikka issi mala.

English Sentences: Then made he ten lavers of brass: one laver contained forty baths: and every laver was four cubits: and upon every one of the ten bases one laver.
Wolaitta Sentences: Huraami meecettiyo tammu kereta nahaasiyaappe medhdhiis; issi issi keriyaa gomppai oiddu wara aaho gididi, hosppun xeetu litiro haattaa oiqqees; tammu gaaretussi huuphiyan huuphiyan issi issi meecettiyo keree de7ees.

English Sentences: And he put five bases on the right side of the house, and five on the left side of the house: and he set the sea on the right side of the house eastward over against the south.
Wolaitta Sentences: Huraami gaareta ichchashata Beeta Maqidasiyaayyo huuphessa baggaara, ichchashata qassi Beeta Maqidasiyaayyo tohossa baggaara wottiis; qassi nahaasiyaappe oosettida Abba Sainiyaa Beeta Maqidasiyaappe tohossa arshsho baggi zaaridi essiis.

English Sentences: And Hiram made the lavers, and the shovels, and the basons. So Hiram made an end of doing all the work that he made king Solomon for the house of the LORD:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Huraami kereta, akaafatanne kuixaarota medhdhiis; yaatidi Kawuwaa Solomonassi GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa oosuwaa oottidi poliis.

English Sentences: The two pillars, and the two bowls of the chapiters that were on the top of the two pillars; and the two networks, to cover the two bowls of the chapiters which were upon the top of the pillars;
Wolaitta Sentences: I oottido oosotikka: naa77u tuussata, tuussatu huuphiyan wottiyo saine mala naa77u gumbbota, tuussatu bolli de7iya naa77u gumbbota alleeqissiyo naa77u gite mala sanssalatata,

English Sentences: And four hundred pomegranates for the two networks, even two rows of pomegranates for one network, to cover the two bowls of the chapiters that were upon the pillars;
Wolaitta Sentences: issi issi gumbbuwaa bolli naa77u maaran nahaasiyaappe merettida issi issi xeetu roomaane teeraa misileta, muleera oiddu xeetu roomaane teeraa misileta,

English Sentences: And the ten bases, and ten lavers on the bases;
Wolaitta Sentences: tammu gaareta, gaaretu bollan wodhdhiya, meecettiyo tammu kereta,

English Sentences: And one sea, and twelve oxen under the sea;
Wolaitta Sentences: Abba Sainiyaanne appe garssan de7iya tammanne naa77u booratu misileta,

English Sentences: And the pots, and the shovels, and the basons: and all these vessels, which Hiram made to king Solomon for the house of the LORD, were of bright brass.
Wolaitta Sentences: kereta, akaafatanne kuixaarota. Huraami Kawuwaa Solomonayyo GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa oosuwaassi medhdhido ha miishshata ubbaa qucettida nahaasiyaappe medhdhiis.

English Sentences: In the plain of Jordan did the king cast them, in the clay ground between Succoth and Zarthan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Solomoni Sukkotappenne Xarttaanappe gidduwan, Yorddaanoosa dembban de7iya, nahaasiyaa birataa seerissiyo sohuwan hageeta ubbaa ootissiis.

English Sentences: And Solomon left all the vessels unweighed, because they were exceeding many: neither was the weight of the brass found out.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nahaasiyaa birataappe merettida ha miishsha ubbai keehi daro gidido gishshau, Solomoni a mazzanissibeenna; hegaa gishshau, woisaa deexxiyaabaakko likkee erettibeenna.

English Sentences: And Solomon made all the vessels that pertained unto the house of the LORD: the altar of gold, and the table of gold, whereupon the shewbread was,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Solomoni GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddon de7iya miishshata ubbaa worqqaappe merissiis. Hegeetinne: worqqaappe oottido yarshshiyoosaa, GODAA sinttan wottiyo oittai uttiyo xaraphpheezaa,

English Sentences: And the candlesticks of pure gold, five on the right side, and five on the left, before the oracle, with the flowers, and the lamps, and the tongs of gold,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Aadhdhiya Geeshsha Sohuwaappe sinttan ushachcha baggaaranne haddirssa baggaara eqqida, ichchashu ichchashu xomppiyaa wottiyo ballata, ciishshata, xomppetanne qapheta,

English Sentences: And the bowls, and the snuffers, and the basons, and the spoons, and the censers of pure gold; and the hinges of gold, both for the doors of the inner house, the most holy place, and for the doors of the house, to wit, of the temple.
Wolaitta Sentences: xuu7ata, xomppiyaa toissiyoobata, kuixaarota, ixaanaa cuwayiyoobata, tamaa ekkiyo miishshatanne, Ubbaappe Aadhdhiya Geeshsha Sohuwaa giyo qol77uwaa penggetanne Beeta Maqidasiyaayyo kare bagga penggeta oiqqida maaxafeta. Ha miishshati ubbai worqqaappe oosettidosona.

English Sentences: So was ended all the work that king Solomon made for the house of the LORD. And Solomon brought in the things which David his father had dedicated; even the silver, and the gold, and the vessels, did he put among the treasures of the house of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Solomoni GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa oosuwaa ubbaa polidoogaappe guyyiyan, a aawai Daawiti GODAAYYO dummayidi wottido biraa, worqqaanne hara miishshatakka ubbaa ehiidi, Beeta Maqidasiyaa buquraa minjjiyoosan wottiis.

English Sentences: Then Solomon assembled the elders of Israel, and all the heads of the tribes, the chief of the fathers of the children of Israel, unto king Solomon in Jerusalem, that they might bring up the ark of the covenant of the LORD out of the city of David, which is Zion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Kawoi Solomoni GODAA Taabootaa Daawita Katamaappe, Xiyooneppe kessidi, Beeta Maqidasiyaa ehanaadan, Israa7eela cimata, zaretu ubbaa halaqatanne Israa7eela keettaa asata kaalettiyaageeta Yerusalaame katamaa shiishshiis.

English Sentences: And all the men of Israel assembled themselves unto king Solomon at the feast in the month Ethanim, which is the seventh month.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etaaniima giyo laappuntta aginan, Daase Baalai bonchchettiyo wode, Israa7eela asai ubbai Kawuwaa Solomonakko shiiqiis.

English Sentences: And all the elders of Israel came, and the priests took up the ark.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela cimati ubbai gakkin, qeeseti Taabootaa denttidosona.

English Sentences: And they brought up the ark of the LORD, and the tabernacle of the congregation, and all the holy vessels that were in the tabernacle, even those did the priests and the Levites bring up.
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewatinne qeeseti, GODAA Taabootaa, Dunkkaaniyaanne Dunkkaaniyaa giddon de7iya geeshsha miishshata ubbaa tookkidi ehiidosona.

English Sentences: And king Solomon, and all the congregation of Israel, that were assembled unto him, were with him before the ark, sacrificing sheep and oxen, that could not be told nor numbered for multitude.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Solomoninne aara de7iya Israa7eela yaa7ai kumettai Taabootaa sinttan shiiqidi, qoodanau danddayettenna cora dorssaanne mehiyaa yarshshidosona.

English Sentences: And the priests brought in the ark of the covenant of the LORD unto his place, into the oracle of the house, to the most holy place, even under the wings of the cherubims.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan qeeseti GODAA Maachchaa Taabootaa Beeta Maqidasiyaayyo giddo geeshsha qol77uwaa, Ubbaappe Aadhdhida Geeshsha Sohuwaa giyo sohuwaa ehiidi, kiruubetu misiletu qefetuppe garssa baggaara wottidosona.

English Sentences: For the cherubims spread forth their two wings over the place of the ark, and the cherubims covered the ark and the staves thereof above.
Wolaitta Sentences: Micetti uttida kiruubetu qefeti Taabootaanne Taabootaa tookkiyo kasota kammidosona.

English Sentences: And they drew out the staves, that the ends of the staves were seen out in the holy place before the oracle, and they were not seen without: and there they are unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kasoti keehippe adussa gidiyo gishshau, eta xeerai Ubbaappe Aadhdhiya Geeshsha Sohuwaa sinttan de7iya Geeshsha Sohuwan beettanau danddayees; shin Geeshsha Sohuwaappe kareera beettanau danddayenna. Eti hachchi gakkanaashin he sohuwan de7oosona.

English Sentences: There was nothing in the ark save the two tables of stone, which Moses put there at Horeb, when the LORD made a covenant with the children of Israel, when they came out of the land of Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai Gibxxe biittaappe kiyido wode, GODAI etaara maachchaa maacettido Siinaa Deriyan Muusee wottido naa77u masettida shuchchatuppe attin, Taabootaa giddon harabi aibinne baawa.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when the priests were come out of the holy place, that the cloud filled the house of the LORD,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeeseti Geeshsha Sohuwaappe kiyin, shaarai GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa kumiis.

English Sentences: So that the priests could not stand to minister because of the cloud: for the glory of the LORD had filled the house of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: He shaaraa gaasuwan qeeseti bantta oosuwaa oottanau danddayibookkona; aissi giikko, GODAA bonchchoi a Beeta Maqidasiyaa kumi uttiis.

English Sentences: Then spake Solomon, The LORD said that he would dwell in the thick darkness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Solomoni hagaadan yaagiis; "Abeet GODAU, neeni, Taani xuma shaaran de7ana yaaga wottadasa.

English Sentences: I have surely built thee an house to dwell in, a settled place for thee to abide in for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani tumuppe neeyyo lo77o Beeta Maqidasiyaa, neeni an merinau de7ana sohuwaa keexxaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the king turned his face about, and blessed all the congregation of Israel: (and all the congregation of Israel stood;)
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela yaa7ai kumettai eqqidaashin, kawoi etakko simmidi, hagaadan yaagidi eta anjjiis;

English Sentences: And he said, Blessed be the LORD God of Israel, which spake with his mouth unto David my father, and hath with his hand fulfilled it, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai galatetto! Ta aawaa Daawitassi ba doonan odido ufaissaa ba kushiyan poliis. He i odido ufaissai,

English Sentences: Since the day that I brought forth my people Israel out of Egypt, I chose no city out of all the tribes of Israel to build an house, that my name might be therein; but I chose David to be over my people Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta asaa Israa7eela Gibxxeppe kessada ehiido gallassaappe doommin, ta sunttai an de7ana mala, Beeta Maqidase keexxanau Israa7eela zaretu giddon ai katamanne doorabeikke; shin ta asaa Israa7eela kaalettana mala, taani Daawita dooraas yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it was in the heart of David my father to build an house for the name of the LORD God of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta aawai Daawiti GODAA Israa7eela Xoossaa sunttaayyo Beeta Maqidase keexxanau ba wozanan qoppiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto David my father, Whereas it was in thine heart to build an house unto my name, thou didst well that it was in thine heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAI ta aawaa Daawita, Neeni ta sunttaayyo Beeta Maqidase keexxanau ne wozanan qoppido gishshau, lo77obaa oottadasa.

English Sentences: Nevertheless thou shalt not build the house; but thy son that shall come forth out of thy loins, he shall build the house unto my name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxanaagee nena gidakka; ta sunttaayyo Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxanaagee ne gulbbataappe yelettana ne na7aa yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD hath performed his word that he spake, and I am risen up in the room of David my father, and sit on the throne of Israel, as the LORD promised, and have built an house for the name of the LORD God of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha77ikka GODAI ba immana giido ufaissaa qaalaa poliis. GODAI kase immido ufaissaadankka taani ta aawaa Daawita sohuwan kawotaasinne ha77i Israa7eela kawotaa araatan uttaas. Qassi GODAA Israa7eela Xoossaa sunttaayyo Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxaas.

English Sentences: And I have set there a place for the ark, wherein is the covenant of the LORD, which he made with our fathers, when he brought them out of the land of Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI nu aawata Gibxxeppe kessido wode etaara maacettido maachchai de7iyo Taabootaayyookka a giddon sohuwaa injjeyaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Solomon stood before the altar of the LORD in the presence of all the congregation of Israel, and spread forth his hands toward heaven:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Solomoni GODAAYYO yarshshiyo sohuwaa sinttan, Israa7eela yaa7ai kumettai de7iyoosan eqqidi, ba kushiyaa saluwaa zaaridi micciis.

English Sentences: And he said, LORD God of Israel, there is no God like thee, in heaven above, or on earth beneath, who keepest covenant and mercy with thy servants that walk before thee with all their heart:
Wolaitta Sentences: Miccidi hagaadan yaagidi woossiis; "Abeet GODAU, Israa7eela Xoossau, bolla saluwan woikko garssa sa7an ne mala xoossi baawa. Neeni ne maachchaa naagaasa; ba kumetta wozanaappe ne sinttan hemettida ne ashkkarata aggenna siiquwan siiqaasa.

English Sentences: Who hast kept with thy servant David my father that thou promisedst him: thou spakest also with thy mouth, and hast fulfilled it with thine hand, as it is this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne ashkkaraayyo, ta aawaa Daawitayyo neeni oottana gaada haasayido qaalaa naagadasa; neeni kase ne doonan haasayidoogaa ne kushiyan hachchi poladasa.

English Sentences: Therefore now, LORD God of Israel, keep with thy servant David my father that thou promisedst him, saying, There shall not fail thee a man in my sight to sit on the throne of Israel; so that thy children take heed to their way, that they walk before me as thou hast walked before me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha77ikka abeet GODAU, Israa7eela Xoossau, neeni ne ashkkaraassi, ta aawaa Daawitassi, Neeni ta sinttan hemettidoogaadan ne naatikka ta sinttan hemettana mala bantta ogiyaa naagikko, ta sinttan Israa7eela kawotaa araatan uttiya asa neeni mulekka xayakka yaagido qaalaa pola.

English Sentences: And now, O God of Israel, let thy word, I pray thee, be verified, which thou spakest unto thy servant David my father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Israa7eela Xoossau, neeni ne ashkkaraayyo, ta aawaa Daawitayyo haasayido ne qaalaa ha77ikka aggoppa.

English Sentences: But will God indeed dwell on the earth? behold, the heaven and heaven of heavens cannot contain thee; how much less this house that I have builded?
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin Xoossai tumu sa7an de7aneeyye? Be7a, saloti, ubbaappe xoqqan de7iya saloikka neeyyo gidanau danddayenna. Yaatin, ha taani keexxido Beeta Maqidasee neeyyo ai keenaa guuxxanddeeshsha!

English Sentences: Yet have thou respect unto the prayer of thy servant, and to his supplication, O LORD my God, to hearken unto the cry and to the prayer, which thy servant prayeth before thee to day:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, abeet GODAU, ta Xoossau, taani ne ashkkarai hachchi woossiyoogaanne watiwatiyoogaa neeni ezgga.

English Sentences: That thine eyes may be open toward this house night and day, even toward the place of which thou hast said, My name shall be there: that thou mayest hearken unto the prayer which thy servant shall make toward this place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni, Ta sunttai he sohuwan de7ana giido ha Beeta Maqidasiyaa ne aifee qamminne gallassi xeello. Taani ne ashkkarai ha sohuwaakko simmada, woossiyo woosaa neeni siya.

English Sentences: And hearken thou to the supplication of thy servant, and of thy people Israel, when they shall pray toward this place: and hear thou in heaven thy dwelling place: and when thou hearest, forgive.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne ashkkarainne ne asai Israa7eeli ha Beeta Maqidasiyaakko simmidi, watiwatiyo watiwatuwaa neeni siya. Neeni de7iyoosan saluwan siyada, nuuyyo atto yaaga.

English Sentences: If any man trespass against his neighbour, and an oath be laid upon him to cause him to swear, and the oath come before thine altar in this house:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Issi asi ba shooruwaa naaqqidi kashi gin, a caaqettanau ha Beeta Maqidasiyaa ehin, a giddon de7iya yarshshiyo sohuwaa sinttan i caaqqikko,

English Sentences: Then hear thou in heaven, and do, and judge thy servants, condemning the wicked, to bring his way upon his head; and justifying the righteous, to give him according to his righteousness.
Wolaitta Sentences: neeni saluwan siya; siyada ootta. Ne ashkkaratu gidduwan pirdda. Mooranchchaa bolli pirddada, i oottidobaa a bolli zaara; xilluwaa shatinttada, ayyo a xillotettaadan zaara.

English Sentences: When thy people Israel be smitten down before the enemy, because they have sinned against thee, and shall turn again to thee, and confess thy name, and pray, and make supplication unto thee in this house:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne asai Israa7eeli ne bolli nagaraa oottido gaasuwan morkkiyan xoonettidi, eti neekko simmidi, ne sunttaa xeesidi, ha Beeta Maqidasiyan nena woossikkonne neeyyo watiwatikko,

English Sentences: Then hear thou in heaven, and forgive the sin of thy people Israel, and bring them again unto the land which thou gavest unto their fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: neeni saluwan siya. Siyada ne asaa Israa7eela nagaraa atto yaaga; yaatada neeni kase eta maizza aawatuyyo immido biittau eta guyye zaara.

English Sentences: When heaven is shut up, and there is no rain, because they have sinned against thee; if they pray toward this place, and confess thy name, and turn from their sin, when thou afflictest them:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne asai ne bolli nagaraa oottido gaasuwan saloti gorddettiininne irai bukkennan ixxin, eti ha sohuwaa simmidi, woossikkonne neeni eta un77ettido gishshau ne sunttaa xeesidi, bantta nagaraappe simmikko, neeni saluwan siya.

English Sentences: Then hear thou in heaven, and forgive the sin of thy servants, and of thy people Israel, that thou teach them the good way wherein they should walk, and give rain upon thy land, which thou hast given to thy people for an inheritance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siyada ne ashkkaratu nagaraa, ne asaa Israa7eela nagaraa atto yaaga. Eti hemettanau bessiya lo77o ogiyaa eta tamaarissa; yaatada neeni ne asaa laatissido biittan iraa bukissa.

English Sentences: If there be in the land famine, if there be pestilence, blasting, mildew, locust, or if there be caterpiller; if their enemy besiege them in the land of their cities; whatsoever plague, whatsoever sickness there be;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Biittaa bollan koshai woikko boshai yin, woikko kattaa xuuggi xaissiya carkkoi woikko boolee woikko gumbburoi biittaa bollan yin, woikko morkkee eta katamata dooddin, woikko ai mala bashshai woikko harggee yin,

English Sentences: What prayer and supplication soever be made by any man, or by all thy people Israel, which shall know every man the plague of his own heart, and spread forth his hands toward this house:
Wolaitta Sentences: ne asaa Israa7eelappe ooninne nena woossikkonne neeyyo watiwatikko, qassi ai asinne ba wozanan un77ettiyoobaa eridi, ha Beeta Maqidasiyaakko simmidi, ba kushiyaa miccikko,

English Sentences: Then hear thou in heaven thy dwelling place, and forgive, and do, and give to every man according to his ways, whose heart thou knowest; (for thou, even thou only, knowest the hearts of all the children of men;)
Wolaitta Sentences: neeni de7iyoosan saluwan siya. Siyada eta nagaraa atto yaaga; yaatada etau ootta. Neeni asaa wozanaa eriyoogaadankka, asa ubbau a oosuwaadan oosuwaadan imma. Aissi giikko, asaa ubbaa wozanaa eriyai ne xalaala.

English Sentences: That they may fear thee all the days that they live in the land which thou gavest unto our fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatikko, neeni nu maizza aawatuyyo immido biittan de7iyo wode ubban, eti neeyyo yayyana.

English Sentences: Moreover concerning a stranger, that is not of thy people Israel, but cometh out of a far country for thy name's sake;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaadankka, ne asaa Israa7eela gidenna kare biittaa asi ne gita sunttaabaanne neeni ne asaayyo oottido maalaalissiya oosotubaa siyidi,

English Sentences: (For they shall hear of thy great name, and of thy strong hand, and of thy stretched out arm;) when he shall come and pray toward this house;
Wolaitta Sentences: haaho biittaappe yiidi, ha Beeta Maqidasiyaakko simmidi, nena woossikko,

English Sentences: Hear thou in heaven thy dwelling place, and do according to all that the stranger calleth to thee for: that all people of the earth may know thy name, to fear thee, as do thy people Israel; and that they may know that this house, which I have builded, is called by thy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: neeni de7iyoosan saluwan siya. Ne asati Israa7eelati eriyoogaadan, sa7an de7iya asai ubbai ne sunttaa erana malanne neeyyo yayyana mala, qassi taani keexxido ha Beeta Maqidasee, neeyyo goinniyo soho gididoogaa eti erana mala, he kare biittaa asi nena woossiyoobaa ayyo pola.

English Sentences: If thy people go out to battle against their enemy, whithersoever thou shalt send them, and shall pray unto the LORD toward the city which thou hast chosen, and toward the house that I have built for thy name:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne asati bantta morkketa olana mala neeni kiittidosaa aunne biidi, eti neeni doorido ha katamaakkonne taani ne sunttaayyo keexxido Beeta Maqidasiyaakko simmidi, nena GODAA woossikko,

English Sentences: Then hear thou in heaven their prayer and their supplication, and maintain their cause.
Wolaitta Sentences: eta woosaanne watiwatuwaa saluwan neeni siya; siyada etau xoonuwaa imma.

English Sentences: If they sin against thee, (for there is no man that sinneth not,) and thou be angry with them, and deliver them to the enemy, so that they carry them away captives unto the land of the enemy, far or near;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nagara oottenna asi bainnaagaadankka, eti ne bolli nagaraa oottin, neeni etayyo hanqqettada morkketuyyo eta aattada immin morkketikka eta omooddidi, haakkin matinkka bantta biitti ekkidi efin,

English Sentences: Yet if they shall bethink themselves in the land whither they were carried captives, and repent, and make supplication unto thee in the land of them that carried them captives, saying, We have sinned, and have done perversely, we have committed wickedness;
Wolaitta Sentences: eti he omoodettido biittan de7iiddi, bantta wozanan nagaraappe simmikko, he omoodettido biittan eti de7iiddi, Nuuni nagaraa oottida; nuuni moorida; nuuni iitabaa hanida yaagidi neeyyo watiwatikko,

English Sentences: And so return unto thee with all their heart, and with all their soul, in the land of their enemies, which led them away captive, and pray unto thee toward their land, which thou gavest unto their fathers, the city which thou hast chosen, and the house which I have built for thy name:
Wolaitta Sentences: banttana omooddidi efiida morkketu biittan de7iiddi, eti bantta kumetta wozanaappenne bantta kumetta qofaappe neekko simmikko, neeni eta maizza aawatuyyo immido eta biittaakko, neeni doorido katamaakkonne taani ne sunttaayyo keexxido Beeta Maqidasiyaakko simmidi, nena woossikko, yaatikko,

English Sentences: Then hear thou their prayer and their supplication in heaven thy dwelling place, and maintain their cause,
Wolaitta Sentences: eta woosaanne eta watiwatuwaa neeni de7iyoosan saluwan siya. Siyada etau pirdda.

English Sentences: And forgive thy people that have sinned against thee, and all their transgressions wherein they have transgressed against thee, and give them compassion before them who carried them captive, that they may have compassion on them:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne asai ne bolli oottido nagaraanne moorido mooruwaa atto yaaga; eta omooddidi efiida asati etayyo qarettanaadan ootta.

English Sentences: For they be thy people, and thine inheritance, which thou broughtest forth out of Egypt, from the midst of the furnace of iron:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti he birataa seerissiya cooce mala biittaappe, Gibxxeppe neeni kessido ne asatanne ne buzota.

English Sentences: That thine eyes may be open unto the supplication of thy servant, and unto the supplication of thy people Israel, to hearken unto them in all that they call for unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani ne ashkkarainne ne asai Israa7eeli watiwatiyoogaa ne aifee xeello; qassi eti waassiyo wode audenne neeni etayyo alla.

English Sentences: For thou didst separate them from among all the people of the earth, to be thine inheritance, as thou spakest by the hand of Moses thy servant, when thou broughtest our fathers out of Egypt, O LORD God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, abeet Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, neeni kase nu aawata Gibxxeppe kessiyo wode ne ashkkaraa Muuse baggaara odidoogaadan, eta neeni sa7an de7iya kawotettatu ubbaa giddoppe ne buzo oottanau dummayadasa" yaagidi woossiis.

English Sentences: And it was so, that when Solomon had made an end of praying all this prayer and supplication unto the LORD, he arose from before the altar of the LORD, from kneeling on his knees with his hands spread up to heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni GODAA woosaanne watiwatuwaa polidoogaappe guyyiyan, ba kushiyaa saluwaa miccidi yarshshiyo sohuwaa sinttan gulbbatidosaappe denddi eqqiis.

English Sentences: And he stood, and blessed all the congregation of Israel with a loud voice, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eqqidi Israa7eela yaa7aa ubbaa ba qaalaa xoqqissidi, hagaadan yaagidi anjjiis;

English Sentences: Blessed be the LORD, that hath given rest unto his people Israel, according to all that he promised: there hath not failed one word of all his good promise, which he promised by the hand of Moses his servant.
Wolaitta Sentences: "I kase haasayido ba qaalaadan ba asaa Israa7eela shemppissida GODAI galatetto; i ba ashkkaraa Muuse baggaara immido lo77o ufaissai ubbai polettiis.

English Sentences: The LORD our God be with us, as he was with our fathers: let him not leave us, nor forsake us:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI nu Xoossai kase nu aawatuura de7idoogaadan, nunaarakka de7o; i nuna mulekka aggoppo woikko yeggoppo.

English Sentences: That he may incline our hearts unto him, to walk in all his ways, and to keep his commandments, and his statutes, and his judgments, which he commanded our fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni a ogetun ubban hemettana malanne i nu aawatussi immido azazota, wogatanne higgeta naagana mala, nu wozanaa baakko zaaro.

English Sentences: And let these my words, wherewith I have made supplication before the LORD, be nigh unto the LORD our God day and night, that he maintain the cause of his servant, and the cause of his people Israel at all times, as the matter shall require:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hachchi hachchi de7uwaassi koshshiyoogaadan, GODAI tana ba ashkkaraanne ba asaa Israa7eela maaddana mala, taani GODAA sinttan woossaidda giido ha qaalati qamminne gallassi GODAAKKO, nu Xoossaakko, shiiqona.

English Sentences: That all the people of the earth may know that the LORD is God, and that there is none else.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, sa7an de7iya asai ubbai GODAI Xoossaa gidiyoogaanne appe attin hara xoossi bainnaagaa eranaassa.

English Sentences: Let your heart therefore be perfect with the LORD our God, to walk in his statutes, and to keep his commandments, as at this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hachchiigaadankka intte a wogaadan hemettanaunne ayyo azazettanau GODAAYYO, nu Xoossaayyo, intte wozanai ammanettiyaagaa gido" yaagidi anjjiis.

English Sentences: And the king, and all Israel with him, offered sacrifice before the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan kawoinne Israa7eela asai ubbai issippe GODAA sinttan yarshshuwaa yarshshidosona.

English Sentences: And Solomon offered a sacrifice of peace offerings, which he offered unto the LORD, two and twenty thousand oxen, and an hundred and twenty thousand sheep. So the king and all the children of Israel dedicated the house of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni GODAAYYO issippetettaa yarshshuwaa yarshshanau laatamanne naa77u sha7u booratanne xeetanne laatamu sha7u dorssata shiishshiis. Hegaadan oottidi kawoinne Israa7eela asai ubbai GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa anjjissidosona.

English Sentences: The same day did the king hallow the middle of the court that was before the house of the LORD: for there he offered burnt offerings, and meat offerings, and the fat of the peace offerings: because the brasen altar that was before the LORD was too little to receive the burnt offerings, and meat offerings, and the fat of the peace offerings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Solomoni Beeta Maqidasiyaayyo sintta baazzan de7iya giddo dabaabaa he gallassi dummayiis. Dummayidi he sohuwan xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa, kattaa yarshshuwaanne issippetettaa yarshshuwaappe modhdhuwaa yarshshiis. I hegaa oottidoogee GODAA sinttan de7iya, nahaasiyaa giyo birataappe oosettida yarshshiyo sohoi xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa, kattaa yarshshuwaanne issippetettaa yarshshuwaappe modhdhuwaa yarshshanau guuxxido gishshaassa.

English Sentences: And at that time Solomon held a feast, and all Israel with him, a great congregation, from the entering in of Hamath unto the river of Egypt, before the LORD our God, seven days and seven days, even fourteen days.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Solomoninne Israa7eela asai ubbai laappun gallassaayyo Daase Baalaa bonchchiis; Israa7eela zawan Hamaata Pinuwaappe biidi Gibxxe SHaafaa gakkanaashin de7iya cora asai GODAA Xoossaa sinttan baalaa bonchchanau shiiqiis.

English Sentences: On the eighth day he sent the people away: and they blessed the king, and went unto their tents joyful and glad of heart for all the goodness that the LORD had done for David his servant, and for Israel his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi kawoi asaa moissiis; asai kawuwaa anjjidi, GODAI ba ashkkaraa Daawitayyoonne ba asaa Israa7eelayyo oottido kehatettan ufaittiiddinne wozanappe pashkkiiddi, ba soo ba soo biis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when Solomon had finished the building of the house of the LORD, and the king's house, and all Solomon's desire which he was pleased to do,
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaanne kawo keettaa keexxidi makkidoogaappenne oottanau amottido amuwaa ubbaa polidoogaappe guyyiyan,

English Sentences: That the LORD appeared to Solomon the second time, as he had appeared unto him at Gibeon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gabaa7oona kataman kase qonccidoogaadan, GODAI naa77anttuwaa ayyo qoncciis.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto him, I have heard thy prayer and thy supplication, that thou hast made before me: I have hallowed this house, which thou hast built, to put my name there for ever; and mine eyes and mine heart shall be there perpetually.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qonccidi GODAI a hagaadan yaagiis; "Neeni ta sinttan woossido woosaanne watiwatido watiwatuwaa taani siyaas. Neeni keexxido Beeta Maqidasee merinau ta sunttai an xeesettana mala oottada taani geeshshaas; ta aifeenne ta wozanai ubba wode ha Beeta Maqidasiyan de7ana.

English Sentences: And if thou wilt walk before me, as David thy father walked, in integrity of heart, and in uprightness, to do according to all that I have commanded thee, and wilt keep my statutes and my judgments:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nena gidikko, neeni ne aawai Daawiti hemettidoogaadan boree bainnan suuretettan ta sinttan hemettikko, taani azazidobaa ubbaa oottikkonne ta wogaanne ta higgiyaa naagikko,

English Sentences: Then I will establish the throne of thy kingdom upon Israel for ever, as I promised to David thy father, saying, There shall not fail thee a man upon the throne of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani ne aawaa Daawitayyo, Israa7eela kawotaa araatan uttiya asa neeni mulekka xayakka giidoogaadan, ne kawotaa araataa Israa7eela bolli merinau minttada essana.

English Sentences: But if ye shall at all turn from following me, ye or your children, and will not keep my commandments and my statutes which I have set before you, but go and serve other gods, and worship them:
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin neeni woikko ne naati tana kaalliyoogaa aggidi wora simmikko, taani inttena azazido ta azazuwaanne ta wogaa naagennan ixxikkonne hara xoossatuyyo oottanaunne goinnanau biikko,

English Sentences: Then will I cut off Israel out of the land which I have given them; and this house, which I have hallowed for my name, will I cast out of my sight; and Israel shall be a proverb and a byword among all people:
Wolaitta Sentences: yaatikko, Israa7eela asaa taani kase etayyo immido biittaappe xoqollana; taani ta sunttaayyo geeshshido ha Beeta Maqidasiyaakka aggaagana. Aggin Israa7eelati asaa ubbaa giddon haiseyiyoobaanne qilliicciyoobaa gidana.

English Sentences: And at this house, which is high, every one that passeth by it shall be astonished, and shall hiss; and they shall say, Why hath the LORD done thus unto this land, and to this house?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha Beeta Maqidasee qolettidabai keelettido soho gidana; mataara kanttiya asi ubbi dagammiiddinne Poora! giiddi, GODAI ha biittaanne ha Beeta Maqidasiyaa aibissi hagaadan oottidee? yaagana.

English Sentences: And they shall answer, Because they forsook the LORD their God, who brought forth their fathers out of the land of Egypt, and have taken hold upon other gods, and have worshipped them, and served them: therefore hath the LORD brought upon them all this evil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin asai, Eta maizza aawata Gibxxeppe kessida GODAA bantta Xoossaa eti aggidi, hara xoossata kaallido gishshaassinne etayyo oottidi goinnido gishshaassi, GODAI eta bolli ha iitabaa ubbaa ehiis yaagidi zaarana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass at the end of twenty years, when Solomon had built the two houses, the house of the LORD, and the king's house,
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni ha naa77u keettata, Beeta Maqidasiyaanne kawo keettaa keexxido laatamantta laittaa wurssettan,

English Sentences: (Now Hiram the king of Tyre had furnished Solomon with cedar trees and fir trees, and with gold, according to all his desire,) that then king Solomon gave Hiram twenty cities in the land of Galilee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xiiroosa Kawoi Kiiraami i koyiyo xiiddaa, zigaanne worqqa ubbaa immido gishshau, Galiilan de7iya laatamu katamata Solomoni ayyo immiis.

English Sentences: And Hiram came out from Tyre to see the cities which Solomon had given him; and they pleased him not.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Kiiraami Xiiroosa katamaappe kiyidi, Solomoni ayyo immido katamata be7anau biido wode, katamati a ufaissibookkona.

English Sentences: And he said, What cities are these which thou hast given me, my brother? And he called them the land of Cabul unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Kiiraami Solomona, "Ta ishau, hageeti neeni taayyo immidoogeeti aiba katamee?" yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau, i he katamata, "Pattenna biittaa" yaagidi sunttiis. He heerai hachchi gakkanaashinkka he sunttan xeesettees.

English Sentences: And Hiram sent to the king sixscore talents of gold.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiiraami oiddu sha7u kilo giraame deexxiya worqqaa Kawuwaa Solomonayyo yeddi wottiis.

English Sentences: And this is the reason of the levy which king Solomon raised; for to build the house of the LORD, and his own house, and Millo, and the wall of Jerusalem, and Hazor, and Megiddo, and Gezer.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa, ba keettaa, Miillo, Yerusalaame katamaa gimbbiyaanne Haxoora, Magiddonne Gezeera katamata gimbbanau Kawuwaa Solomonayyo gabbaarati de7oosona.

English Sentences: For Pharaoh king of Egypt had gone up, and taken Gezer, and burnt it with fire, and slain the Canaanites that dwelt in the city, and given it for a present unto his daughter, Solomon's wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxe biittaa Kawoi kase Gezeera katamaa oiqqiis; oiqqidi katamaa taman xuuggiis. Kataman de7iya Kanaane asatakka woriis; yaatidi Solomoni machchido ba na7eeyyo woito oottidi immiis;

English Sentences: And Solomon built Gezer, and Bethhoron the nether,
Wolaitta Sentences: immin Solomoni Gezeera katamaa wotti yeggidi keexxiis. Hegaadankka qassi, Solomoni Hirkki Beeti-Horoona,

English Sentences: And Baalath, and Tadmor in the wilderness, in the land,
Wolaitta Sentences: Baa7ilaata, Yihudaa Bazzuwan de7iya Taamaara katamaa,

English Sentences: And all the cities of store that Solomon had, and cities for his chariots, and cities for his horsemen, and that which Solomon desired to build in Jerusalem, and in Lebanon, and in all the land of his dominion.
Wolaitta Sentences: miishshaa minjjiyo katamata ubbaa, ba paratanne paraa gaareta wottiyo katamatanne Yerusalaamen, Liibaanoosaaninne ba haariyo biittan ubban keexxanau amottido ubbaa keexxiis.

English Sentences: And all the people that were left of the Amorites, Hittites, Perizzites, Hivites, and Jebusites, which were not of the children of Israel,
Wolaitta Sentences: Amooretuppe, Hiitetuppe, Parzzetuppe, Hiiwetuppenne Yaabuusatuppe attida asati ubbai Israa7eela asa gidokkona;

English Sentences: Their children that were left after them in the land, whom the children of Israel also were not able utterly to destroy, upon those did Solomon levy a tribute of bondservice unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: eti Israa7eela asati biittaappe wurssi xaissanau danddayennan aggin, he biittan attida asatu zerettata. Solomoni eta gabbaaratettaa ootissiis; eti hachchi gakkanaashinkka gabbaaratettan oottoosona.

English Sentences: But of the children of Israel did Solomon make no bondmen: but they were men of war, and his servants, and his princes, and his captains, and rulers of his chariots, and his horsemen.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Solomoni Israa7eela asatuppe oonanne ailleyibeenna; eti ayyo oosanchchata, olanchchata, olanchchatu halaqatanne gadaawata, paraa gaareta laaggiyaageetu halaqatanne paraasata gididi oottidosona.

English Sentences: These were the chief of the officers that were over Solomon's work, five hundred and fifty, which bare rule over the people that wrought in the work.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka qassi, eti Solomona oosuwaa oottiyaageetu halaqata; etappe ichchashu xeetanne ishatamati oosuwaa oottiya gabbaarata xeellidi ootissoosona.

English Sentences: But Pharaoh's daughter came up out of the city of David unto her house which Solomon had built for her: then did he build Millo.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxe Kawuwaa na7iyaa Daawita Katamaappe Solomoni iyyo keexissido keettaa pude biidoogaappe guyyiyan, i Miillo gimbbiis.

English Sentences: And three times in a year did Solomon offer burnt offerings and peace offerings upon the altar which he built unto the LORD, and he burnt incense upon the altar that was before the LORD. So he finished the house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni GODAAYYO gimbbido yarshsho sohuwan xuuggiyo yarshshuwaanne issippetettaa yarshshuwaa laittan heezzutoo yarshshees; GODAA sinttan ixaanaakka cuwayees. Yaatiiddi Beeta Maqidasiyaa poliis.

English Sentences: And king Solomon made a navy of ships in Eziongeber, which is beside Eloth, on the shore of the Red sea, in the land of Edom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Kawoi Solomoni Eedooma biittan Zo7o Abbaa doonan, Eelaata giyo katamaa matan de7iya Eexiyooni-Gaabiran markkabeta medhdhiis.

English Sentences: And Hiram sent in the navy his servants, shipmen that had knowledge of the sea, with the servants of Solomon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Kiiraami Solomona asatuura oottana mala markkabiyaa laaguwaa loohida ba asata kiittiis.

English Sentences: And they came to Ophir, and fetched from thence gold, four hundred and twenty talents, and brought it to king Solomon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiittin eti Ofiira biitti biidosona; biidi yaappe tammanne oiddu sha7u kilo giraamiyaappe dariya worqqaa Kawuwaa Solomonayyo ekkidi yiidosona.

English Sentences: And when the queen of Sheba heard of the fame of Solomon concerning the name of the LORD, she came to prove him with hard questions.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saaba kawiyaa GODAA sunttan woretida Solomona woriyaa siyada, deexo oishata ekkada, a paaccanau denddaasu.

English Sentences: And she came to Jerusalem with a very great train, with camels that bare spices, and very much gold, and precious stones: and when she was come to Solomon, she communed with him of all that was in her heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Denddada sawuwaa, keehi daro worqqaanne al77o shuchchaa caanettida daro gaameelatu cugiyaara keehi daro ajaban Yerusalaame gakkada, Solomona sintti aadhdhaasu. Aadhdhada ba wozanan de7iyaabaa ubbaa Solomonayyo yootaasu.

English Sentences: And Solomon told her all her questions: there was not any thing hid from the king, which he told her not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni a oichchidobaa ubbaa odiis; iyyo birshshennan appe geemmi attidabi aibinne baawa.

English Sentences: And when the queen of Sheba had seen all Solomon's wisdom, and the house that he had built,
Wolaitta Sentences: Saaba kawiyaa Solomona aadhdhida eratettaa, i keexxido kawo keettaa,

English Sentences: And the meat of his table, and the sitting of his servants, and the attendance of his ministers, and their apparel, and his cupbearers, and his ascent by which he went up unto the house of the LORD; there was no more spirit in her.
Wolaitta Sentences: a maaddan shiiqiya qumaa, a oosanchchati uttiyo utettaa, a ashkkarati oottiyo oosuwaanne maayiyo maayuwaa, a eessaa tigiyaageetanne GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyan i xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa be7ido wode, i wozanai gagettiis.

English Sentences: And she said to the king, It was a true report that I heard in mine own land of thy acts and of thy wisdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan a kawuwaa, "Nebaanne ne aadhdhida eratettaabaa taani ta deren de7aidda siyidoogee tuma.

English Sentences: Howbeit I believed not the words, until I came, and mine eyes had seen it: and, behold, the half was not told me: thy wisdom and prosperity exceedeth the fame which I heard.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani yaada, ta aifiyaa biraanan be7ana gakkanaashin eti taayyo yootidobaa ammanabeikke. Taayyo asai yootidoogee bagganne gakkenna; aadhdhida eratettankka duretettankka taani siyidoogaappe keehi darees.

English Sentences: Happy are thy men, happy are these thy servants, which stand continually before thee, and that hear thy wisdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubba wode ne sinttan eqqidi, ne aadhdhida eratettaa siyiya ne asatinne ne oosanchchati aiba ufaittiyoonaashsha!

English Sentences: Blessed be the LORD thy God, which delighted in thee, to set thee on the throne of Israel: because the LORD loved Israel for ever, therefore made he thee king, to do judgment and justice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenan ufaittidi, nena Israa7eela kawotaa araatan utissida GODAI ne Xoossai galatetto! GODAI Israa7eela asaa merinau siiqido gishshau, neeni suure pirddaanne xillotettaa oottana mala i nena kawoyiis" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And she gave the king an hundred and twenty talents of gold, and of spices very great store, and precious stones: there came no more such abundance of spices as these which the queen of Sheba gave to king Solomon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagada kawiyaa oiddu sha7u kilo giraame deexxiya worqqaa, keehi daro sawuwaanne al77o shuchchaa kawuwaayyo immaasu. Saaba kawiyaa Kawuwaa Solomonayyo immidoogaa keena daro sawuwaa hegaappe simmin ooninne ehibeenna.

English Sentences: And the navy also of Hiram, that brought gold from Ophir, brought in from Ophir great plenty of almug trees, and precious stones.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawuwaa Kiiraama markkabeti, Ofiirappe worqqaa ehiidaageeti yaappekka sanddale giyo keehi daro mittaanne al77o shuchchaa ehiidosona.

English Sentences: And the king made of the almug trees pillars for the house of the LORD, and for the king's house, harps also and psalteries for singers: there came no such almug trees, nor were seen unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Solomoni he sanddalliyaappe GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaanne kawo keettaa tuuqeta, mazamuriyaa yexxiyaageetuyyo diittaanne maazinqqiyaa merissiis. Hegaa mala sanddalee he gallassappe haa simmin yinne erenna, beettinne erenna.

English Sentences: And king Solomon gave unto the queen of Sheba all her desire, whatsoever she asked, beside that which Solomon gave her of his royal bounty. So she turned and went to her own country, she and her servants.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Solomoni kawoi immanau bessiya imotaappe haraa, Saaba Kawiyaa amottada a oichchidobaa ubbaa iyyo immiis. Hegaappe guyyiyan Saaba Kawiyaa ba ajabaara denddada, ba biitti simmaasu.

English Sentences: Now the weight of gold that came to Solomon in one year was six hundred threescore and six talents of gold,
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni laittan laittan ekkiyo worqqai laatamanne heezzu sha7u kilo giraame deexxiyaagaa.

English Sentences: Beside that he had of the merchantmen, and of the traffick of the spice merchants, and of all the kings of Arabia, and of the governors of the country.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee zal77anchchatuppe ekkido qaraxaanne Araba biittaa kawotu ubbaappenne Israa7eela biittaa haariyaageetuppe ekkido giiraa gujjennaana.

English Sentences: And king Solomon made two hundred targets of beaten gold: six hundred shekels of gold went to one target.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni naa77u xeetu wogga gonddalleta qoxxido worqqaappe merissiis; issi issi gonddalliyan laappun kilo giraame gidiya worqqai geliis.

English Sentences: And he made three hundred shields of beaten gold; three pound of gold went to one shield: and the king put them in the house of the forest of Lebanon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka i heezzu xeetu qeeri gonddalleta qoxxido worqqaappe merissiis; issi issi qeeri gonddalliyan naa77u kilo giraame gidiya worqqai geliis. Kawoi he gonddalleta Liibaanoosa Woraa Keettaa giyo keettan wottiis.

English Sentences: Moreover the king made a great throne of ivory, and overlaid it with the best gold.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka kawoi issi gita kawotaa araataa danggarssaa zaaliyaappe merissidi, muruta worqqan sheeshshiis.

English Sentences: The throne had six steps, and the top of the throne was round behind: and there were stays on either side on the place of the seat, and two lions stood beside the stays.
Wolaitta Sentences: araatai de7iyoosaa pude kiyanau yedhdhiyo usuppun xekkati de7oosona. He araatai guyye baggaara kiikiyan muumi uttiis. Araatau naa77u baggaarakka qesiyaa zemppissiyo sohoti de7oosona; he naa77u sohotu lanqqiyankka eqqida issi issi gaammo misilee de7ees.

English Sentences: And twelve lions stood there on the one side and on the other upon the six steps: there was not the like made in any kingdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: He araataa pude kiyiyo usuppun xekkatun ya baggaaranne ha baggaara issi issi gaammo misilee, muleera tammanne naa77u misileti de7oosona. Hagaa mala kawotaa araatai hara kawotettan awaaninne oosettibeenna.

English Sentences: And all king Solomon's drinking vessels were of gold, and all the vessels of the house of the forest of Lebanon were of pure gold; none were of silver: it was nothing accounted of in the days of Solomon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Solomoni ushshaa uyiyo miishsha ubbai worqqaappe oosettiis; Liibaanoosa Woraa Keettan de7iya miishsha ubbaikka muruta worqqaappe oosettiis. Issibainne birappe oosettibeenna; aissi giikko, Solomona wode biri mulekka go77iyaabadan qoodetti erenna.

English Sentences: For the king had at sea a navy of Tharshish with the navy of Hiram: once in three years came the navy of Tharshish, bringing gold, and silver, ivory, and apes, and peacocks.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawuwaayyo Kiiraama markkabetuura zal77iya gita markkabeti abban de7oosona. He markkabeti worqqaanne biraa, danggarssaa zaaliyaa, geleshshotanne qaareta caani ekkidi, heezzu laittaappe issiton simmoosona.

English Sentences: So king Solomon exceeded all the kings of the earth for riches and for wisdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Solomoni duretettaaninne aadhdhida eratettan sa7an de7iya kawotu ubbaappe dariis.

English Sentences: And all the earth sought to Solomon, to hear his wisdom, which God had put in his heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7an de7iya asai ubbai a sintti aadhdhanaunne Xoossai a wozanan wottido aadhdhida eratettaa siyanau koyees.

English Sentences: And they brought every man his present, vessels of silver, and vessels of gold, and garments, and armour, and spices, horses, and mules, a rate year by year.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laittaappe laittan yiya ubbai ayyo immanau worqqanne bira miishshata, maayota, ola miishshatanne sawuwaa, paratanne baqulota ekkidi yees.

English Sentences: And Solomon gathered together chariots and horsemen: and he had a thousand and four hundred chariots, and twelve thousand horsemen, whom he bestowed in the cities for chariots, and with the king at Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni paraa gaaretanne parata shiishshiis; ayyo issi sha7anne oiddu xeetu paraa gaaretinne tammanne naa77u sha7u parati de7oosona. I eta paraa gaaretu katamatuuninne banaara Yerusalaamen wottiis.

English Sentences: And the king made silver to be in Jerusalem as stones, and cedars made he to be as the sycomore trees that are in the vale, for abundance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Yerusalaamen biri shuchchadan korettanaadan, zigikka bargguwan dicciya ettaadan corattanaadan oottiis.

English Sentences: And Solomon had horses brought out of Egypt, and linen yarn: the king's merchants received the linen yarn at a price.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomona parati Gibxxeppenne Qaawe giyo biittaappe yiidosona. Kawuwaa zal77anchchati eta Qaaweppe miishshan shammidi ehoosona.

English Sentences: And a chariot came up and went out of Egypt for six hundred shekels of silver, and an horse for an hundred and fifty: and so for all the kings of the Hittites, and for the kings of Syria, did they bring them out by their means.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti issi issi paraa gaariyaa usuppun xeetu xaqara biran, issi issi paraa xeetanne ishatamu xaqara biran Gibxxeppe shammidi ehoosona; ehiidi etikka Hiitetu kawotussi ubbatussinne Sooriyaa kawotussi baizzoosona.

English Sentences: But king Solomon loved many strange women, together with the daughter of Pharaoh, women of the Moabites, Ammonites, Edomites, Zidonians, and Hittites;
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Solomoni daro allaga biittaa maccaasata siiqiis; hegeetinne Gibxxe kawuwaa na7ee bolli gujjin Moo7aabatu, Amoonatu, Eedoomatu, Sidoonatunne Hiitetu maccaasata.

English Sentences: Of the nations concerning which the LORD said unto the children of Israel, Ye shall not go in to them, neither shall they come in unto you: for surely they will turn away your heart after their gods: Solomon clave unto these in love.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti, "Intte ha asatuura ehuwan geluwan walahettoppite; aissi giikko, eti intte wozanaa tumuppe bantta eeqaa xoossatukko zaarana" yaagidi GODAI Israa7eela asaayyo odido kawotettatu maccaasata; shin Solomoni etaara siiquwan qashettiis.

English Sentences: And he had seven hundred wives, princesses, and three hundred concubines: and his wives turned away his heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomonayyo kawotu naata gidiya laappun xeetu machchetinne heezzu xeetu baakkoti de7oosona. A maccaasati a wora zaaridosona.

English Sentences: For it came to pass, when Solomon was old, that his wives turned away his heart after other gods: and his heart was not perfect with the LORD his God, as was the heart of David his father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni cimi cimidi biishin, a maccaasati a wozanaa hara xoossatukko zaaridosona; yaatin, a aawaa Daawiti kumetta wozanaappe siiqidoogaadan, GODAA ba Xoossaa i siiqibeenna.

English Sentences: For Solomon went after Ashtoreth the goddess of the Zidonians, and after Milcom the abomination of the Ammonites.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni Asttaarooto giyo Sidoonatu xoosseeyyoonne Molooka giyo Amoonatu xoossaayyo, sheneyiyaagaayyo goinniis.

English Sentences: And Solomon did evil in the sight of the LORD, and went not fully after the LORD, as did David his father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaanidi Solomoni GODAA sinttan iitabaa oottiis; a aawaa Daawiti kaallidoogaadan, GODAA polo kaallibeenna.

English Sentences: Then did Solomon build an high place for Chemosh, the abomination of Moab, in the hill that is before Jerusalem, and for Molech, the abomination of the children of Ammon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Solomoni Kamoosha giyo tuna eeqaayyoonne Amoonati eeqiyo, Molooka giyo tuna eeqaayyo Yerusalaame katamaappe arshsho baggan de7iya deriyaa huuphiyan goinniyo xoqqa sohota keexxiis.

English Sentences: And likewise did he for all his strange wives, which burnt incense and sacrificed unto their gods.
Wolaitta Sentences: Allaga biittaappe ekkido ba maccaasatu ubbaayyookka i hegaadan giigissiis; giigissin eti bantta xoossatuyyo yan ixaanaa cuwayidosonanne yarshshuwaa yarshshidosona.

English Sentences: And the LORD was angry with Solomon, because his heart was turned from the LORD God of Israel, which had appeared unto him twice,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ayyo naa77utoo qonccida GODAAPPE Israa7eela Xoossaappe Solomona wozanai wora simmido gishshau, GODAI a hanqqettiis.

English Sentences: And had commanded him concerning this thing, that he should not go after other gods: but he kept not that which the LORD commanded.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hara xoossata kaallennaadan GODAI Solomona azaziis; gidikkonne, Solomoni GODAA azazuwaa naagibeenna.

English Sentences: Wherefore the LORD said unto Solomon, Forasmuch as this is done of thee, and thou hast not kept my covenant and my statutes, which I have commanded thee, I will surely rend the kingdom from thee, and will give it to thy servant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, GODAI Solomona hagaadan yaagiis; "Neeni hagaadan hanido gishshau, taani nena azazido ta maachchaanne ta wogaanne neeni naagennan ixxido gishshau, taani ne kawotettaa neeppe dafa ekkada, ne ashkkaratuppe issuwaayyo immana.

English Sentences: Notwithstanding in thy days I will not do it for David thy father's sake: but I will rend it out of the hand of thy son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, ne aawaa Daawita gishshau taani hagaa neeni paxa de7iyo laittan dafa ekkikke; ne na7aa kushiyaappe dafa ekkana.

English Sentences: Howbeit I will not rend away all the kingdom; but will give one tribe to thy son for David my servant's sake, and for Jerusalem's sake which I have chosen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaakka qassi kawotettaa muliyaa appe dafa ekkikke; ta ashkkaraa Daawita gishshaunne taani doorido katamaa Yerusalaame gishshau issi zariyaa ayyo immana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD stirred up an adversary unto Solomon, Hadad the Edomite: he was of the king's seed in Edom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan GODAI Eedoomiyaa Hadaada, Eedooma biittaa kawotu zare gididaagaa baarigaara oottidi Solomona bolli denttiis.

English Sentences: For it came to pass, when David was in Edom, and Joab the captain of the host was gone up to bury the slain, after he had smitten every male in Edom;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaappe kase baggan Daawiti Eedooma asatuura olettido wode, haiqqidaageeta moogissanau pude biida ola gadaawai Yoo7aabi, Eedooman de7iya attumaasa ubbaa wori wurssiis.

English Sentences: (For six months did Joab remain there with all Israel, until he had cut off every male in Edom:)
Wolaitta Sentences: Eedooman de7iya attumaasa ubbaa xaissana gakkanaashin Yoo7aabinne Israa7eela asai ubbai yan usuppun agina uttiis.

English Sentences: That Hadad fled, he and certain Edomites of his father's servants with him, to go into Egypt; Hadad being yet a little child.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin he wode guutta na7a gidida Hadaadi, a aawaassi oottida Eedooma oosanchchatuppe amaridaageetuura Gibxxe biitti baqatiis.

English Sentences: And they arose out of Midian, and came to Paran: and they took men with them out of Paran, and they came to Egypt, unto Pharaoh king of Egypt; which gave him an house, and appointed him victuals, and gave him land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Midiyaamappe denddidi, Paaraana biidosona; Paaraanappe banttanaara asaa ekkidi Gibxxe biitti, Gibxxe kawuwaakko biidosona. Kawoi Hadaadayyo issi keettaanne gadiyaa immidi, qumaakka ayyo azaziis.

English Sentences: And Hadad found great favour in the sight of Pharaoh, so that he gave him to wife the sister of his own wife, the sister of Tahpenes the queen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hadaadi kawuwaa keehippe ufaissiis; ufaissin kawoi ba keettaayee, Kawee Xaafineesi michchiyo ayyo machcho immiis.

English Sentences: And the sister of Tahpenes bare him Genubath his son, whom Tahpenes weaned in Pharaoh's house: and Genubath was in Pharaoh's household among the sons of Pharaoh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xaafineesi michchiya ayyo Ganubaata giyo na7aa yelaasu. Yelin Xaafineesa a kawo keettan dichchaasu; Ganubaati yan kawuwaa naatuura issippe de7iis.

English Sentences: And when Hadad heard in Egypt that David slept with his fathers, and that Joab the captain of the host was dead, Hadad said to Pharaoh, Let me depart, that I may go to mine own country.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hadaadi Gibxxen de7iiddi Daawiti haiqqidi ba maizzan gaittidoogaanne ola gadaawai Yoo7aabikka haiqqidoogaa siyiis; siyidi Hadaadi kawuwaayyo, "Taani ta biitti simmana mala tana yedda" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Pharaoh said unto him, But what hast thou lacked with me, that, behold, thou seekest to go to thine own country? And he answered, Nothing: howbeit let me go in any wise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin kawoi a, "Neeyyo hagan aibi pacciinee neeni ne biitti baanau koyiyoi?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin Hadaadi, "Taayyo aibinne paccibeenna; shin taani baana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And God stirred him up another adversary, Rezon the son of Eliadah, which fled from his lord Hadadezer king of Zobah:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka qassi, Xoossai Eliyadaa7a na7aa Razoona giyoogaa Solomona bolli baarigaara oottidi denttiis; Razooni Xooba Kawuwaa Hadaadi7eezerappe baqatiis.

English Sentences: And he gathered men unto him, and became captain over a band, when David slew them of Zobah: and they went to Damascus, and dwelt therein, and reigned in Damascus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Xooba biittaa olanchchata xaissido wode, Razooni baayyo asaa shiishshidi, shittatu halaqa gidiis; shittati Damasqqo biidi, he katamaa oiqqidi, yan uttidi, Razoona kawoyidosona.

English Sentences: And he was an adversary to Israel all the days of Solomon, beside the mischief that Hadad did: and he abhorred Israel, and reigned over Syria.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hadaadi medhdhido metuwaa bollikka gujjidi, Solomoni de7ido keenan ubban Razooni Israa7eelatuyyo baarigaara gidiis; yaatidi i Sooriyan kawotidi Israa7eela asaa morkkiis.

English Sentences: And Jeroboam the son of Nebat, an Ephrathite of Zereda, Solomon's servant, whose mother's name was Zeruah, a widow woman, even he lifted up his hand against the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa bollikka Nabaaxa na7ai Iyorbbaami Solomona bolli makkalidi denddiis; i Solomona ashkkaratuppe issuwaa. I Efireema biittan Xareedappe yiida asa; a aayyiyaakka Xiruu7o giyo am77iyo.

English Sentences: And this was the cause that he lifted up his hand against the king: Solomon built Millo, and repaired the breaches of the city of David his father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawuwaa bolli i makkalidi denddido taarikee hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaagaa. Solomoni Miillo gimbbiisinne ba aawaa Daawita Katamaa yuushuwaa gimbbiyan de7iya kallo sohuwaa kunttiis.

English Sentences: And the man Jeroboam was a mighty man of valour: and Solomon seeing the young man that he was industrious, he made him ruler over all the charge of the house of Joseph.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iyorbbaami mino asa; Solomoni ha wodallai ba oosuwaa waati loitti oottiyaakko be7iis; be7idi Minaasenne Efireema biittan oottiya gabbaaratu ubbaa bolli a halaqa oottidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass at that time when Jeroboam went out of Jerusalem, that the prophet Ahijah the Shilonite found him in the way; and he had clad himself with a new garment; and they two were alone in the field:
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi Iyorbbaami Yerusalaame katamaappe kiyidi bees; biishin Seeloppe yiida, hananabaa yootiya Akiiyi aara ogiyan gaittiis. Akiiyi he wode ooratta maayuwaa maayi uttiis. Dembban eta naa77aa xalaalai de7oosona.

English Sentences: And Ahijah caught the new garment that was on him, and rent it in twelve pieces:
Wolaitta Sentences: Akiiyi ba maayido ooratta maayuwaa oiqqidi, tammanne naa77u kessidi pooshshiis.

English Sentences: And he said to Jeroboam, Take thee ten pieces: for thus saith the LORD, the God of Israel, Behold, I will rend the kingdom out of the hand of Solomon, and will give ten tribes to thee:
Wolaitta Sentences: Pooshshidi Iyorbbaama hagaadan yaagiis; "Tammu pooshota neeyyo ekka. Aissi giikko, GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; Be7a, taani kawotettaa Solomona kushiyaappe pooshshada, tammu zareta neeyyo immana hanais.

English Sentences: (But he shall have one tribe for my servant David's sake, and for Jerusalem's sake, the city which I have chosen out of all the tribes of Israel:)
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ta ashkkaraa Daawita gishshaunne Israa7eela zaretu ubbaa giddoppe taani doorido Yerusalaame katamaa gishshau, issi zariyaa ayyo aggana.

English Sentences: Because that they have forsaken me, and have worshipped Ashtoreth the goddess of the Zidonians, Chemosh the god of the Moabites, and Milcom the god of the children of Ammon, and have not walked in my ways, to do that which is right in mine eyes, and to keep my statutes and my judgments, as did David his father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hagaa oottana gaasoi, Solomoni tana aggidi Sidoonatu xoossee Asttaarootiyyo, Moo7aabatu xoossaa Kamooshayyoonne Amoonatu xoossaa Molookayyo goinnido gishshaassanne ta ogiyan hemettennan, ta sinttan suurebaa hanennaaninne a aawai Daawiti naagidoogaadan ta wogatanne ta higgeta naagennan ixxido gishshaassa.

English Sentences: Howbeit I will not take the whole kingdom out of his hand: but I will make him prince all the days of his life for David my servant's sake, whom I chose, because he kept my commandments and my statutes:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Gidikkonne, taani kawotettaa Solomona kushiyaappe wurssa ekkikke; taani dooridonne ta azazuwaanne ta wogaa naagida ta ashkkaraa Daawita gishshau, Solomoni paxa de7ido peeshan ubban i haaranaadan oottaas.

English Sentences: But I will take the kingdom out of his son's hand, and will give it unto thee, even ten tribes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan taani kawotettaa a na7aa kushiyaappe ekkana; ekkada tammu zareta neeyyo immana.

English Sentences: And unto his son will I give one tribe, that David my servant may have a light alway before me in Jerusalem, the city which I have chosen me to put my name there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta sunttai an xeesettana mala, taani doorido Yerusalaame kataman ubba wodekka ta ashkkaraa Daawita zerettai kawotana mala, taani issi zariyaa a na7aassi immana.

English Sentences: And I will take thee, and thou shalt reign according to all that thy soul desireth, and shalt be king over Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nena gidikko, taani nena ekkana; ekkin ne wozanai amottido ubbaa neeni haarana; neeni Israa7eela bolli kawotana.

English Sentences: And it shall be, if thou wilt hearken unto all that I command thee, and wilt walk in my ways, and do that is right in my sight, to keep my statutes and my commandments, as David my servant did; that I will be with thee, and build thee a sure house, as I built for David, and will give Israel unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena azaziyoogaa neeni oottikko, ta ogiyan hemettikkonne ta ashkkarai Daawiti naagidoogaadan ta wogatanne ta azazota naagada ta sinttan suurebaa hanikko, taani nenaara gidana; Daawitassi oottidoogaadankka ne zareti de7i be7anaadan oottana; Israa7eelakka taani neeyyo immana.

English Sentences: And I will for this afflict the seed of David, but not for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomona nagaraa gishshau Daawita zerettata taani qaxxayana; shin merinassi gidenna yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Solomon sought therefore to kill Jeroboam. And Jeroboam arose, and fled into Egypt, unto Shishak king of Egypt, and was in Egypt until the death of Solomon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Solomoni Iyorbbaama woranau kajjeeliis; shin Iyorbbaami Gibxxe biitti Kawuwaa SHiishaaqakko baqatidi biis; biidi Solomoni haiqqana gakkanaashin Gibxxen takkiis.

English Sentences: And the rest of the acts of Solomon, and all that he did, and his wisdom, are they not written in the book of the acts of Solomon?
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni hanido harabai, i oottidobai ubbai, a aadhdhida eratettaabai Solomona Taarikiyaa Maxaafan xaafetti uttiis.

English Sentences: And the time that Solomon reigned in Jerusalem over all Israel was forty years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni Israa7eela ubbaa bolli Yerusalaamen oitamu laitta kawotiis.

English Sentences: And Solomon slept with his fathers, and was buried in the city of David his father: and Rehoboam his son reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Solomoni haiqqidi, ba maizzan gaittiis; ba aawaa Daawita Kataman moogettiis. A na7ai Robi7aami a sohuwan kawotiis.

English Sentences: And Rehoboam went to Shechem: for all Israel were come to Shechem to make him king.
Wolaitta Sentences: asai ubbai Robi7aama kawoyanau Sekeema katamaa biido gishshau, ikka yaa biis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when Jeroboam the son of Nebat, who was yet in Egypt, heard of it, (for he was fled from the presence of king Solomon, and Jeroboam dwelt in Egypt;)
Wolaitta Sentences: Nabaaxa na7ai Iyorbbaami, Kawuwaa Solomonappe baqatidi Gibxxen de7iyaagee hagaa siyido wode, Gibxxeppe simmidi yiis.

English Sentences: That they sent and called him. And Jeroboam and all the congregation of Israel came, and spake unto Rehoboam, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yin Israa7eela asai Iyorbbaamayyo kiittidi xeesissin, inne Israa7eela maabarai ubbai Robi7aamakko biis; biidi,

English Sentences: Thy father made our yoke grievous: now therefore make thou the grievous service of thy father, and his heavy yoke which he put upon us, lighter, and we will serve thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ne aawai nuna deexo qambbaraa toossiis; shin ha77i neeni i nuna ootissiyo wolqqaama oosuwaanne deexo qambbaraa nuuyyo kaushsharkkii. Yaatikko, nuuni neeyyo haarettana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Depart yet for three days, then come again to me. And the people departed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Robi7aami etayyo, "Biite; biidi heezzantto gallassi simmidi taakko yiite" yaagiis; yaagin asai biis.

English Sentences: And king Rehoboam consulted with the old men, that stood before Solomon his father while he yet lived, and said, How do ye advise that I may answer this people?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Kawoi Robi7aami a aawai Solomoni paxa de7iyo wode, Solomona zorida cimata zoretaa bessiis. I eta, "Ha asaayyo woigada zaara geetii?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And they spake unto him, saying, If thou wilt be a servant unto this people this day, and wilt serve them, and answer them, and speak good words to them, then they will be thy servants for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin cimati Robi7aama, "Hachchi neeni asaayyo ashkkara gidada oottikkonne eti oichchiyoobau neeni lo77o qaalaa zaarikko, ubbaton eti neeyyo ashkkara gidana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But he forsook the counsel of the old men, which they had given him, and consulted with the young men that were grown up with him, and which stood before him:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Robi7aami cimati zorido zoriyaa aggidi, aara diccidi ayyo oottiya yelaga asata zoretaa bessiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, What counsel give ye that we may answer this people, who have spoken to me, saying, Make the yoke which thy father did put upon us lighter?
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta, "Intte tana zoriyoobi aibee? Ne aawai nuna toossido deexo qambbaraa nuuyyo kaushsharkkii yaagiya ha deriyaayyo woigada zaaroo?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And the young men that were grown up with him spake unto him, saying, Thus shalt thou speak unto this people that spake unto thee, saying, Thy father made our yoke heavy, but make thou it lighter unto us; thus shalt thou say unto them, My little finger shall be thicker than my father's loins.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin aara diccida yelagati, "Ne aawai nuna deexo qambbaraa toossiis; shin neeni nuuyyo kaushsharkkii yaagiya asaayyo, Ta gil77a biradhdhee ta aawaa xeessaappe orddees.

English Sentences: And now whereas my father did lade you with a heavy yoke, I will add to your yoke: my father hath chastised you with whips, but I will chastise you with scorpions.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta aawai intte qambbaraa deexettiis; shin taani hegaappekka aattada deexettana. Ta aawai inttena lissuwan wadhdhiis; shin taani inttena masimasuwaadan dukkiya lissuwan wadhdhana yaagada zaara" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: So Jeroboam and all the people came to Rehoboam the third day, as the king had appointed, saying, Come to me again the third day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Kawoi Robi7aami, "Heezzantto gallassi simmidi taakko yiite" giidoogaadankka, Iyorbbaaminne asai ubbai heezzantto gallassi simmidi yiidosona.

English Sentences: And the king answered the people roughly, and forsook the old men's counsel that they gave him;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yin kawoi etayyo hanqqo zaaruwaa zaariis. Cimatu zoriyaa aggi bayidi,

English Sentences: And spake to them after the counsel of the young men, saying, My father made your yoke heavy, and I will add to your yoke: my father also chastised you with whips, but I will chastise you with scorpions.
Wolaitta Sentences: yelagati zorido zoriyaa kaalliis. Yaatidi hagaadan yaagiis; "Ta aawai intte qambbaraa deexettiis; shin taani hegaappekka aattada deexettana. Ta aawai inttena lissuwan wadhdhiis; shin taani inttena masimasuwaadan dukkiya lissuwan wadhdhana" yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: Wherefore the king hearkened not unto the people; for the cause was from the LORD, that he might perform his saying, which the LORD spake by Ahijah the Shilonite unto Jeroboam the son of Nebat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi asai giyoogaa siyennan ixxiis; aissi giikko, GODAI Seeloppe yiida Akiiya baggaara kase Nabaaxa na7aa Iyorbbaamayyo yootido qaalai polettanaadan hagee GODAAPPE haniis.

English Sentences: So when all Israel saw that the king hearkened not unto them, the people answered the king, saying, What portion have we in David? neither have we inheritance in the son of Jesse: to your tents, O Israel: now see to thine own house, David. So Israel departed unto their tents.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai ubbai kawoi eti giyoogaa siyennan ixxidoogaa be7idi, kawuwaa hagaadan yaagidosona; "Daawitabaappe nuna gakkiyaabi aibee? Isseya na7aappe nuuni laattanabi baawa! Israa7eela asau, intte soo intte soo simmite! Ha77i simmi Robi7aami bau naagetto!" yaagidosona. Yaagidi Israa7eela asai ubbai bantta soo bantta soo simmidosona.

English Sentences: But as for the children of Israel which dwelt in the cities of Judah, Rehoboam reigned over them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Robi7aami Yihudaa katamatun de7iya Israa7eela asaa bolli kawotiis.

English Sentences: Then king Rehoboam sent Adoram, who was over the tribute; and all Israel stoned him with stones, that he died. Therefore king Rehoboam made speed to get him up to his chariot, to flee to Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Kawoi Robi7aami ba gabbaaratu halaqaa Adooniraama Israa7eela asaakko kiittiis; kiittin eti shuchchan caddidi woridosona. Yaatin, Kawoi Robi7aami ba paraa gaariyan eesuwan kiyi uttidi, Yerusalaame baqatiis.

English Sentences: So Israel rebelled against the house of David unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heedeppe doommidi hachchi gakkanaashin Israa7eela zareti tammati Daawita zariyaappe kawotida kawotu bolli makkalidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when all Israel heard that Jeroboam was come again, that they sent and called him unto the congregation, and made him king over all Israel: there was none that followed the house of David, but the tribe of Judah only.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iyorbbaami Gibxxeppe simmidoogaa Israa7eela asai ubbai siyido wode, a bantta yaa7au xeesissidi, Israa7eela bolli kawoyidosona; Daawita zariyaappe kawotida kawotussi ammanettidi attidai Yihudaa zariyaa xalaala.

English Sentences: And when Rehoboam was come to Jerusalem, he assembled all the house of Judah, with the tribe of Benjamin, an hundred and fourscore thousand chosen men, which were warriors, to fight against the house of Israel, to bring the kingdom again to Rehoboam the son of Solomon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomona na7ai Robi7aami Yerusalaame katamaa gakkido wode, Israa7eela biittaa asaara olettidi, kawotettaa baayyo zaarana mala, Yihudaa zariyaappenne Biniyaama zariyaappe doorettida issi xeetanne hosppun tammu sha7u olanchchata shiishshiis.

English Sentences: But the word of God came unto Shemaiah the man of God, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossaa qaalai, Xoossaa asa gidiya SHamaa7iyaakko yiis; yiidi,

English Sentences: Speak unto Rehoboam, the son of Solomon, king of Judah, and unto all the house of Judah and Benjamin, and to the remnant of the people, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Solomona na7aa, Yihudaa Kawuwaa Robi7aamayyo, Yihudaanne Biniyaama zaretuyyoonne attida asa ubbaayyo hagaadan yaaga;
