English Sentences: Thus saith the LORD, Ye shall not go up, nor fight against your brethren the children of Israel: return every man to his house; for this thing is from me. They hearkened therefore to the word of the LORD, and returned to depart, according to the word of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI inttena, "Intte dabbotuura, Israa7eelatuura olettanau booppite. Hagaa taani oottido gishshau, intte ubbaikka intte soo intte soo simmite" yaagees yaagada yoota" yaagiis. Yaagin eti GODAA qaalaa siyidi, simmidi soo biidosona.

English Sentences: Then Jeroboam built Shechem in mount Ephraim, and dwelt therein; and went out from thence, and built Penuel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Iyorbbaami Efireema gezziyan de7iya Sekeema qato kessidi gimbbidi, yan de7iis; hegaappe kiyi biidi PHinii7eela gimbbiis.

English Sentences: And Jeroboam said in his heart, Now shall the kingdom return to the house of David:
Wolaitta Sentences: Iyorbbaami ba wozanan, "Kawotettai Daawita zariyaassi simmana.

English Sentences: If this people go up to do sacrifice in the house of the LORD at Jerusalem, then shall the heart of this people turn again unto their lord, even unto Rehoboam king of Judah, and they shall kill me, and go again to Rehoboam king of Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha asai GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyan yarshshuwaa yarshshanau Yerusalaame katamaa biyaabaa gidikko, eti qassikka bantta godaakko, Kawuwaa Robi7aamakko simmana. Eti tana woridi, Yihudaa Kawuwaa Robi7aamakko simmana" yaagidi qoppiis.

English Sentences: Whereupon the king took counsel, and made two calves of gold, and said unto them, It is too much for you to go up to Jerusalem: behold thy gods, O Israel, which brought thee up out of the land of Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, kawoi zorettidoogaappe guyyiyan worqqaappe naa77u maratu misileta medhdhiis. Medhdhidi asaayyo, "Intte hagaappe Yerusalaame biido keenai gidana. Inttenoo Israa7eela asatoo, inttena Gibxxeppe kessida intte xoossati hageetihoona!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he set the one in Bethel, and the other put he in Dan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etappe issuwaa Beeteelen, issuwaa qassi Daanan wottiis.

English Sentences: And this thing became a sin: for the people went to worship before the one, even unto Dan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha yohoi etayyo nagaratiis; aissi giikko, issi maraa misiliyaayyo goinnanau asai Daana gakkanaashin bees.

English Sentences: And he made an house of high places, and made priests of the lowest of the people, which were not of the sons of Levi.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iyorbbaami keraa huuphiyan goinniyo xoqqa sohuwaa giigissiis; giigissidi Leewa zare gidana xayikkokka, ubba qommo asaappe qeese oottidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: And Jeroboam ordained a feast in the eighth month, on the fifteenth day of the month, like unto the feast that is in Judah, and he offered upon the altar. So did he in Bethel, sacrificing unto the calves that he had made: and he placed in Bethel the priests of the high places which he had made.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudan bonchchiyoogaadan hosppuntta aginan tammanne ichchashantta gallassan baalai bonchchettanaadan, Iyorbbaami gallassaa keeriis; keeridi yarshshuwaa yarshshiis. I hagaadan haniis; Beeteele biis; biidi ba medhdhido maraa misiliyaayyo yarshshuwaa yarshshiis. Qassi ba medhdhido goinniyo xoqqa sohotun qeeseta Beeteelen sunttidi wottiis.

English Sentences: So he offered upon the altar which he had made in Bethel the fifteenth day of the eighth month, even in the month which he had devised of his own heart; and ordained a feast unto the children of Israel: and he offered upon the altar, and burnt incense.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba huuphen doorido hosppuntta aginan, he aginau tammanne ichchashantto gallassi Beeteele biis; biidi he gallassai Israa7eela asaayyo baalaa gidanaadan awaajjiis. Yaatidi ixaanaa cuwayanau pude yarshshiyo sohuwaa kiyiis.

English Sentences: And, behold, there came a man of God out of Judah by the word of the LORD unto Bethel: and Jeroboam stood by the altar to burn incense.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iyorbbaami ixaanaa cuwayanau yarshshuwaa yarshshiyo sohuwaa matan eqqidaashin, GODAA qaalan kiitettida, Xoossaa asa giyo issi bitanee Yihudaappe yiis;

English Sentences: And he cried against the altar in the word of the LORD, and said, O altar, altar, thus saith the LORD; Behold, a child shall be born unto the house of David, Josiah by name; and upon thee shall he offer the priests of the high places that burn incense upon thee, and men's bones shall be burnt upon thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: yiidi GODAI azazin he yarshshiyo sohuwaa bolli hagaadan yaagidi waassiis; "Yarshshiyo sohuwau, yarshshiyo sohuwau, GODAI nena hagaadan yaagees; Daawita zariyaassi Yoosiyaasa geetettiya issi na7ai yelettana. He na7ai ha77i hagan yarshshiiddi de7iya xoqqa sohotu qeeseta ne bolli yarshshana; ne bolli asaa meqettai xuugettana yaagees" yaagidi waassiis.

English Sentences: And he gave a sign the same day, saying, This is the sign which the LORD hath spoken; Behold, the altar shall be rent, and the ashes that are upon it shall be poured out.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi Xoossaa asi malaataa immiiddi, "GODAI yootido malaatai hagaa; ha yarshshiyo sohoi phalqqettana; a bollan de7iya bidinttaikka wora laalettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when king Jeroboam heard the saying of the man of God, which had cried against the altar in Bethel, that he put forth his hand from the altar, saying, Lay hold on him. And his hand, which he put forth against him, dried up, so that he could not pull it in again to him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Iyorbbaami Xoossaa asi Beeteelen de7iya yarshshiyo sohuwaa bolli waassidoogaa siyido wode, yarshshiyo sohuwaappe ba kushiyaa yeddidi, "He bitaniyaa oiqqite!" yaagiis. SHin i bitaniyaayyo yeddido kushee sohuwaarakka xiiggidi siliis; Hegaa gishshau, ba kushiyaa guyye zaaridi ekkanau danddayibeenna.

English Sentences: The altar also was rent, and the ashes poured out from the altar, according to the sign which the man of God had given by the word of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Xoossaa asi GODAA qaalan immido malaataadan yarshshiyo sohoi phalqqetti wodhdhin, a bollan de7iya bidinttaikka wora laalettiis.

English Sentences: And the king answered and said unto the man of God, Intreat now the face of the LORD thy God, and pray for me, that my hand may be restored me again. And the man of God besought the LORD, and the king's hand was restored him again, and became as it was before.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Kawoi Iyorbbaami Xoossaa asa, "Ta kushee kaseegaadan hanana mala taayyo gaannatada GODAA ne Xoossaa woossarkkii!" yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau, Xoossaa asi kawuwaayyo gaannatidi GODAA woossin, kawuwaa kushee simmidi kaseegaadan haniis.

English Sentences: And the king said unto the man of God, Come home with me, and refresh thyself, and I will give thee a reward.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Xoossaa asa, "Tanaara ta soo hindda; kattanne ma. Qassi taani neeyyo imotaa immana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the man of God said unto the king, If thou wilt give me half thine house, I will not go in with thee, neither will I eat bread nor drink water in this place:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossaa asi kawuwaassi hagaadan yaagidi zaariis; "Harai attin neeni ne aquwaayyo baggaa taassi immiyaakkokka, taani nenaara biikke; hagan oittaakka miikke, haattaakka uyikke.

English Sentences: For so was it charged me by the word of the LORD, saying, Eat no bread, nor drink water, nor turn again by the same way that thou camest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAA qaalai tana, Neeni oittakka mooppa, haattakka uyoppa, ne yiido ogiyaarakka simmada booppa yaagidi azaziis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So he went another way, and returned not by the way that he came to Bethel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, bitanee hara ogiyaara biis; i Beeteele yiido ogiyaara simmidi bibeenna.

English Sentences: Now there dwelt an old prophet in Bethel; and his sons came and told him all the works that the man of God had done that day in Bethel: the words which he had spoken unto the king, them they told also to their father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiya issi cima bitanee Beeteele kataman de7ees. Beeteelen he gallassi Xoossaa asi oottido ubbabaa he cima bitaniyaa naati yiidi yootidosona; qassi he bitanee kawuwaayyo yootido qaalaa eti bantta aawaayyo yootidosona.

English Sentences: And their father said unto them, What way went he? For his sons had seen what way the man of God went, which came from Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yootin aawai eta, "Awa ogiyaara biidee?" yaagiis; yaagin Yihudaappe yiida Xoossaa asi biido ogiyaa ayyo malaatidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto his sons, Saddle me the ass. So they saddled him the ass: and he rode thereon,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan i ba naata, "Taayyo ane hariyaa koorite" yaagiis; yaagin eti ayyo hariyaa koorin toggiis.

English Sentences: And went after the man of God, and found him sitting under an oak: and he said unto him, Art thou the man of God that camest from Judah? And he said, I am.
Wolaitta Sentences: Toggidi Xoossaa asa geeduwaa kaallidi biis; issi wolaa kuwan uttidaagaa demmidi, "Yihudaappe yiida Xoossaa asi neneeyye?" yaagiis. Yaagin bitanee, "Ee tana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then he said unto him, Come home with me, and eat bread.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin hananabaa yootiya cima bitanee a, "Qumaa maanau ta soo tanaara hindda" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, I may not return with thee, nor go in with thee: neither will I eat bread nor drink water with thee in this place:
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa asi zaaridi, "Taani guyye simmada nenaara baanau, woikko ha sohuwan nenaara oittaa maanau, woikko haatta uyanau danddayikke.

English Sentences: For it was said to me by the word of the LORD, Thou shalt eat no bread nor drink water there, nor turn again to go by the way that thou camest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAA qaalai tana, Neeni he sohuwan oittakka mooppa, haattakka uyoppa, ne yiido ogiyaarakka simmada booppa yaagidi azaziis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: He said unto him, I am a prophet also as thou art; and an angel spake unto me by the word of the LORD, saying, Bring him back with thee into thine house, that he may eat bread and drink water. But he lied unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin hananabaa yootiya cima bitanee, "Taanikka nenadan hananabaa yootiyaagaa. Kiitanchchai GODAA qaalan tana, Oittaa i maana malanne haattaa uyana mala, a zaarada ne soo nenaara ekkada ya yaagiis" yaagiis. SHin cima bitanee hegaa ayyo wordduwaa odiis.

English Sentences: So he went back with him, and did eat bread in his house, and drank water.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Xoossaa asi aara simmidi, a son miisinne uyiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, as they sat at the table, that the word of the LORD came unto the prophet that brought him back:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti maaddan uttidaashin, GODAA qaalai bitaniyaa guyye zaarida hananabaa yootiya cima bitaniyaakko yiis.

English Sentences: And he cried unto the man of God that came from Judah, saying, Thus saith the LORD, Forasmuch as thou hast disobeyed the mouth of the LORD, and hast not kept the commandment which the LORD thy God commanded thee,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yin bitanee Yihudaappe yiida Xoossaa asayyo ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "GODAI hagaadan yaagees; Neeni GODAA qaalaa ixxadasa; GODAI ne Xoossai nena azazido azazuwaakka naagabaakka.

English Sentences: But camest back, and hast eaten bread and drunk water in the place, of the which the Lord did say to thee, Eat no bread, and drink no water; thy carcase shall not come unto the sepulchre of thy fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni GODAI, "He sohuwan mooppa woikko uyoppa" giido sohuwaa guyye simmada baada, yan oittaa maadasa; haattaakka uyadasa. Hegaa gishshau, ne ahai ne aawatu duufuwan moogettenna yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, after he had eaten bread, and after he had drunk, that he saddled for him the ass, to wit, for the prophet whom he had brought back.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa asi miyoogaanne uyiyoogaa polidoogaappe guyyiyan, hananabaa yootiyaagee ba guyye zaaridi ehiido bitaniyaayyo hariyaa kooriis.

English Sentences: And when he was gone, a lion met him by the way, and slew him: and his carcase was cast in the way, and the ass stood by it, the lion also stood by the carcase.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koorin i ogiyan biishin gaammoi aara gaittidi, a woriis. Worin ahai ogiyan canggaraariis; hareenne gaammoinne naa77aikka ahaa lanqqen eqqidosona.

English Sentences: And, behold, men passed by, and saw the carcase cast in the way, and the lion standing by the carcase: and they came and told it in the city where the old prophet dwelt.
Wolaitta Sentences: He ogiyaara aadhdhiya asai ahai canggaraaridaagaanne gaammoi ahaa lanqqen eqqidaagaa be7iis; be7idi biidi hananabaa yootiya cima bitanee de7iyo kataman yootiis.

English Sentences: And when the prophet that brought him back from the way heard thereof, he said, It is the man of God, who was disobedient unto the word of the LORD: therefore the LORD hath delivered him unto the lion, which hath torn him, and slain him, according to the word of the LORD, which he spake unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biyoosaappe bitaniyaa guyye zaarida hananabaa yootiya cima bitanee hegaa siyido wode hagaadan yaagiis; "Hegee GODAA qaalaayyo azazettennan ixxida Xoossaa asa. Hegaa gishshau, GODAA qaalai ayyo kasetidi odidoogaadan, GODAI gaammuwan a gattiis; yaatin, gaammoi a mentterettidi woriis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he spake to his sons, saying, Saddle me the ass. And they saddled him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan cima bitanee ba naata, "Taayyo hariyaa koorite" yaagiis. Yaagin eti ayyo hariyaa kooridosona;

English Sentences: And he went and found his carcase cast in the way, and the ass and the lion standing by the carcase: the lion had not eaten the carcase, nor torn the ass.
Wolaitta Sentences: koorin bitanee kiyidi biis. Biidi ogiyan canggaraarida ahaanne ahaa matan eqqida hariyaanne gaammuwaa demmiis; gaammoi ahaa mibeenna woikko hariyaakka menttibeenna.

English Sentences: And the prophet took up the carcase of the man of God, and laid it upon the ass, and brought it back: and the old prophet came to the city, to mourn and to bury him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiya cima bitanee Xoossaa asa ahaa denttidi, hariyaa zokkuwan wottidi, yeekkanaunne mooganau guyye ba katamaa ekkidi ehiis.

English Sentences: And he laid his carcase in his own grave; and they mourned over him, saying, Alas, my brother!
Wolaitta Sentences: Ehiidi bau makki wottido duufuwan ahaa wottiis; wottin a bolli, "Aayyee ta ishau! Aayyee ta ishau!" yaagidi yeekkidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, after he had buried him, that he spake to his sons, saying, When I am dead, then bury me in the sepulchre wherein the man of God is buried; lay my bones beside his bones:
Wolaitta Sentences: Moogi simmidi ba naata hagaadan yaagiis; "Taani haiqqiyo wode, Xoossaa asi moogettido duufuwan tana moogite; ta meqettatakka a meqettata lanqqiyan wottite.

English Sentences: For the saying which he cried by the word of the LORD against the altar in Bethel, and against all the houses of the high places which are in the cities of Samaria, shall surely come to pass.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Beeteele kataman de7iya yarshshiyoosaa bollinne Samaariyaa katamatun de7iya goinniyo xoqqa sohotu bolli GODAI azazin he bitanee waassidoogee tumu polettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: After this thing Jeroboam returned not from his evil way, but made again of the lowest of the people priests of the high places: whosoever would, he consecrated him, and he became one of the priests of the high places.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyankka Iyorbbaami ba iita ogiyaappe simmibeenna; shin goinniyo xoqqa sohotuyyo ubba qommo asaappe qeeseta gujjidi sunttiis; qeese gidanau koyiya oonanne goinniyo xoqqa sohuwan wottiis.

English Sentences: And this thing became sin unto the house of Jeroboam, even to cut it off, and to destroy it from off the face of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iyorbbaama keettaa asaa ongganaunne biittaa bollaappe xaissanau gattida nagarai hegaa.

English Sentences: At that time Abijah the son of Jeroboam fell sick.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Iyorbbaama na7ai Abiiyi harggiis.

English Sentences: And Jeroboam said to his wife, Arise, I pray thee, and disguise thyself, that thou be not known to be the wife of Jeroboam; and get thee to Shiloh: behold, there is Ahijah the prophet, which told me that I should be king over this people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Iyorbbaami ba keettaayyiyo, "Dendda; denddada neeni Iyorbbaama keettaayyiyo gidiyoogaa ooninne erenna mala, ne maayuwaa laamma; laammada Seelo ba. Taani ha asaa bolli kawotanaagaa taayyo yootida hananabaa yootiya Akiiyi yan de7ees.

English Sentences: And take with thee ten loaves, and cracknels, and a cruse of honey, and go to him: he shall tell thee what shall become of the child.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammu oittaa, amarida komppuwaanne issi oto eessaa ayyo ekkada akko ba. Bobare ha harggida na7ai hananabaa i neeyyo yootana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jeroboam's wife did so, and arose, and went to Shiloh, and came to the house of Ahijah. But Ahijah could not see; for his eyes were set by reason of his age.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Iyorbbaama keettaayyiyaa i giidoogaadan oottaasu; denddada Akiiya soo Seelo baasu. Akiiyi xeellanau danddayenna; i cimmido gishshau, a aifee demmenna.

English Sentences: And the LORD said unto Ahijah, Behold, the wife of Jeroboam cometh to ask a thing of thee for her son; for he is sick: thus and thus shalt thou say unto her: for it shall be, when she cometh in, that she shall feign herself to be another woman.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAI Akiiya, "Iyorbbaama keettaayyiyaa ba na7aa harggiyaabaa nena oichchanau yausu. Neeni iyyo hagaa hagaa yaagada oda. A ya gakkada hara maccaasa milatana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it was so, when Ahijah heard the sound of her feet, as she came in at the door, that he said, Come in, thou wife of Jeroboam; why feignest thou thyself to be another? for I am sent to thee with heavy tidings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Akiiyi maccaasiyaa penggen di77i di77iyoogaa siyidi hagaadan yaagiis; "Iyorbbaama keettaayee, ane haa gela. Aissi hagaadan hara asa milatadii? Taani iita wore neeyyo yootanau kiitettaas.

English Sentences: Go, tell Jeroboam, Thus saith the LORD God of Israel, Forasmuch as I exalted thee from among the people, and made thee prince over my people Israel,
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni Iyorbbaamakko baada hagaadan yaaga; GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai nena, "Taani nena asaa giddoppe xoqqissaas; ta asaa Israa7eela bolli nena kawoyaas.

English Sentences: And rent the kingdom away from the house of David, and gave it thee: and yet thou hast not been as my servant David, who kept my commandments, and who followed me with all his heart, to do that only which was right in mine eyes;
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Daawita zariyaappe kawotettaa wotta ekkada, neeyyo immaas. SHin neeni ta ashkkaraa Daawita mala gidakka; i ta azazuwaa naagiisinne ta sinttan suurebaa xalaalaa oottiiddi, ba kumetta wozanan tana kaalliis.

English Sentences: But hast done evil above all that were before thee: for thou hast gone and made thee other gods, and molten images, to provoke me to anger, and hast cast me behind thy back:
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeppe kase de7ida ubbati oottidoogaappe dariya iitaa neeni oottadasa; neeni neeyyo hara xoossata, seerissido birataappe eeqata medhdhadasa. Yaatada tana hanqqetissadasa; tana neeppe guyye aattadasa.

English Sentences: Therefore, behold, I will bring evil upon the house of Jeroboam, and will cut off from Jeroboam him that pisseth against the wall, and him that is shut up and left in Israel, and will take away the remnant of the house of Jeroboam, as a man taketh away dung, till it be all gone.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Hegaa gaasuwan taani Iyorbbaama keettaa asau iitaa ehaana. Israa7eela biittan Iyorbbaama keettaa asaappe aille gidin goqa gidin, issi attumaasinne attennan xoqollana. Issi uri oshai wurana gakkanaashin kessiyoogaadan, Iyorbbaama keettaa asaa taani wurssa kessana.

English Sentences: Him that dieth of Jeroboam in the city shall the dogs eat; and him that dieth in the field shall the fowls of the air eat: for the LORD hath spoken it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iyorbbaama zare gididi kataman haiqqiya oonanne kanati maana; gaxariyan haiqqiyaageeta qassi saluwaa kafoti maana. Taani GODAI hagaa odaas!" yaagiis yaaga.

English Sentences: Arise thou therefore, get thee to thine own house: and when thy feet enter into the city, the child shall die.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nena gidikko, ha77i neeni denddada ne soo ba. Ne tohoi katamaa geliyo wode, na7ai haiqqana.

English Sentences: And all Israel shall mourn for him, and bury him: for he only of Jeroboam shall come to the grave, because in him there is found some good thing toward the LORD God of Israel in the house of Jeroboam.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela ubbai na7aayyo yeekkidi moogana; Iyorbbaama keettaa asan GODAA Israa7eela Xoossaa sinttan ha na7an lo77obai beettido gishshau, Iyorbbaama keettaa asaappe a xalaalai duufuwan moogettana.

English Sentences: Moreover the LORD shall raise him up a king over Israel, who shall cut off the house of Jeroboam that day: but what? even now.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan Iyorbbaama keettaa asaa xoqolli xaissiya kawuwaa GODAI baayyo Israa7eela bolli denttana.

English Sentences: For the LORD shall smite Israel, as a reed is shaken in the water, and he shall root up Israel out of this good land, which he gave to their fathers, and shall scatter them beyond the river, because they have made their groves, provoking the LORD to anger.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haattaa giddon woshoi qaaxxiyoogaadan, GODAI he wode Israa7eelata shocidi qaattana. Asheero giyo xoosseessi eti misiliyaa essidi, GODAA hanqqetissido gishshau, eta aawatuyyo i immido lo77o biittaappe eta diggana; yaatidi eta Efiraaxiisa SHaafaappe hefinttan laalana.

English Sentences: And he shall give Israel up because of the sins of Jeroboam, who did sin, and who made Israel to sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iyorbbaami oottido nagaraa gishshaunne Israa7eela asaa i ootissido nagaraa gishshau, GODAI Israa7eela aggi bayana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Jeroboam's wife arose, and departed, and came to Tirzah: and when she came to the threshold of the door, the child died;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Iyorbbaama keettaayyiyaa denddada baada Tirxxa gakkaasu. Gakkada keettaa pengge goccillaa yedhdhaanne na7ai haiqqi aggiis.

English Sentences: And they buried him; and all Israel mourned for him, according to the word of the LORD, which he spake by the hand of his servant Ahijah the prophet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba ashkkaraa hananabaa yootiya Akiiya baggaara GODAI yootidoogaadankka a moogidosona; Israa7eela asai ubbai ayyo yeekkiis.

English Sentences: And the rest of the acts of Jeroboam, how he warred, and how he reigned, behold, they are written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iyorbbaami hanido harabai, a olatinne a aisuwaa maarati Israa7eela Kawotu Taarikiyaa Maxaafatun xaafetti uttidosona.

English Sentences: And the days which Jeroboam reigned were two and twenty years: and he slept with his fathers, and Nadab his son reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iyorbbaami laatamanne naa77u laittaa kawotiis. Hegaappe guyyiyan haiqqidi ba maizzan gaittiis. A sohuwan a na7ai Nadaabi kawotiis.

English Sentences: And Rehoboam the son of Solomon reigned in Judah. Rehoboam was forty and one years old when he began to reign, and he reigned seventeen years in Jerusalem, the city which the LORD did choose out of all the tribes of Israel, to put his name there. And his mother's name was Naamah an Ammonitess.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomona na7aa Robi7aami Yihudan kawotiis; Robi7aami kawotiyo wode laittai ayyo oitamanne isiino. GODAI ba sunttaa wottanau Israa7eela zaretu katamatu ubbaa giddoppe doorido Yerusalaame kataman Robi7aami tammanne laappun laitta kawotiis. A aayee sunttai Naa7imo; a Amoona biittaa asa.

English Sentences: And Judah did evil in the sight of the LORD, and they provoked him to jealousy with their sins which they had committed, above all that their fathers had done.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa asati GODAA sinttan iitabaa oottidosona; bantta oottido nagaran eti bantta aawatuppe aattidi GODAA qanaatissidosona.

English Sentences: For they also built them high places, and images, and groves, on every high hill, and under every green tree.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa bollikka qassi eti banttau goinniyo xoqqa sohota, eeqa shuchchatanne Asheero giyo xoossee misileta xoqqa keratu ubbaa bollinne irxxa mittatu ubbaa garssan essidosona.

English Sentences: And there were also sodomites in the land: and they did according to all the abominations of the nations which the LORD cast out before the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Harai attin eti goinniyo sohotun goino woga oottidi attumaasati attumaasatuura shaaramuxiyaageeti de7oosona. GODAI Israa7eelatu sinttaappe kessidi yedettido dere asati meezetido, he sheneyiya oosota ubbaa Israa7eela asati oottidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass in the fifth year of king Rehoboam, that Shishak king of Egypt came up against Jerusalem:
Wolaitta Sentences: Robi7aami kawotido ichchashantto laittan Gibxxe Kawoi SHiishaaqi Yerusalaame katamaa bolli woraajjiis.

English Sentences: And he took away the treasures of the house of the LORD, and the treasures of the king's house; he even took away all: and he took away all the shields of gold which Solomon had made.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woraajjidi GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaaninne kawo keettan de7iya buquraa, Solomoni qoxissido worqqa gonddalletuura ubbaa bonqqi ekkidi biis.

English Sentences: And king Rehoboam made in their stead brasen shields, and committed them unto the hands of the chief of the guard, which kept the door of the king's house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, kawoi Robi7aami he gonddalletu gishshaa nahaasiyaa birataappe hara gonddalleta merissiis; merissidi eti naagidi wottana mala kawo keettaa penggiyaa naagiyaageetu halaqatuyyo immiis.

English Sentences: And it was so, when the king went into the house of the LORD, that the guard bare them, and brought them back into the guard chamber.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa biyo wode ubban, naagiyaageeti gonddalleta oiqqoosona. Hegaappe simmin eti zaaridi, naagiyaageetu keettan wottoosona.

English Sentences: Now the rest of the acts of Rehoboam, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?
Wolaitta Sentences: Robi7aami hanido harabainne i oottidobai ubbai Yihudaa Kawotu Taarikiyaa Maxaafan xaafetti uttiis.

English Sentences: And there was war between Rehoboam and Jeroboam all their days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Robi7aaminne Iyorbbaami ubba wode olettiiddi de7idosona.

English Sentences: And Rehoboam slept with his fathers, and was buried with his fathers in the city of David. And his mother's name was Naamah an Ammonitess. And Abijam his son reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Robi7aami haiqqidi ba maizzan gaittiis; i Daawita Kataman de7iya ba aawatu duufuwan moogettiis. A aayee sunttai Naa7imo; a Amoona biittaa asa. Robi7aama sohuwan a na7ai Abiiyi kawotiis.

English Sentences: Now in the eighteenth year of king Jeroboam the son of Nebat reigned Abijam over Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nabaaxa na7aa Iyorbbaami kawotido tammanne hosppuntta laittan Abiiyi Yihudan kawotiis.

English Sentences: Three years reigned he in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Maachah, the daughter of Abishalom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abiiyi Yerusalaamen heezzu laitta kawotiis. A aayyiyaa Abeselooma na7ee na7iyo; i sunttai Maa7iko.

English Sentences: And he walked in all the sins of his father, which he had done before him: and his heart was not perfect with the LORD his God, as the heart of David his father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Appe kase a aawai oottido nagarata ubbaa oottiis; a wozanai a aawaa aawaa aawaa Daawita wozanai polo gididoogaadan GODAAYYO, ba Xoossaayyo polo gidibeenna.

English Sentences: Nevertheless for David's sake did the LORD his God give him a lamp in Jerusalem, to set up his son after him, and to establish Jerusalem:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, appe guyyiyan Yerusalaamen kawotana malanne Yerusalaame sarotettaa naagana mala, GODAI a Xoossai Daawita gishshau Abiiyassi issi attuma na7aa immiis.

English Sentences: Because David did that which was right in the eyes of the LORD, and turned not aside from any thing that he commanded him all the days of his life, save only in the matter of Uriah the Hittite.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hagaa oottido gaasotai, Daawiti GODAA sinttan suurebaa oottiis; Hiitiyaa Ooriyoona bolli nagara oottoorippe attin, ba de7o laitta ubban GODAA azazotuppe issibaanne naagennan aggibeenna.

English Sentences: And there was war between Rehoboam and Jeroboam all the days of his life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abiiyi de7ido laitta ubban Robi7aama asaaranne Iyorbbaama asaara olettiiddi de7idosona.

English Sentences: Now the rest of the acts of Abijam, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah? And there was war between Abijam and Jeroboam.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abiiyi hanido harabainne i oottidobai ubbai Yihudaa Kawotu Taarikiyaa Maxaafan xaafetti uttiis. Abiiyinne Iyorbbaami olettiiddi de7idosona.

English Sentences: And Abijam slept with his fathers; and they buried him in the city of David: and Asa his son reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abiiyi haiqqidi ba maizzan gaittiis; i Daawita Kataman moogettiis. A sohuwan a na7ai Asi kawotiis.

English Sentences: And in the twentieth year of Jeroboam king of Israel reigned Asa over Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela Kawoi Iyorbbaami kawotido laatamantto laittan Asi Yihudan kawotiis.

English Sentences: And forty and one years reigned he in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Maachah, the daughter of Abishalom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi Yerusalaamen oitamanne isiini laitta kawotiis. A aawaa aayee sunttai Maa7iko; a Abeselooma na7iyo.

English Sentences: And Asa did that which was right in the eyes of the LORD, as did David his father.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi ba maizza aawai Daawiti oottidoogaadan, GODAA sinttan suurebaa oottiis.

English Sentences: And he took away the sodomites out of the land, and removed all the idols that his fathers had made.
Wolaitta Sentences: Goino woga oottidi attumaasaara shaaramuxiya attumaasata Asi ba biittaappe xaissiis; appe kase de7ida kawoti medhdhido eeqa misileta ubbaa xoqolerettidi oliis.

English Sentences: And also Maachah his mother, even her he removed from being queen, because she had made an idol in a grove; and Asa destroyed her idol, and burnt it by the brook Kidron.
Wolaitta Sentences: A aawaa aayyiyaa Maa7ikakka Asheero giyo xoosseessi tuna eeqaa misiliyaa medhdhido gishshau, Kawuwaa Aayyiyo a geetettiyo bonchchuwaappe o diggiis. Asi he eeqaa misiliyaa qanxxerettidi, Qediroona Zanggaaran xuuggiis.

English Sentences: But the high places were not removed: nevertheless Asa's heart was perfect with the LORD all his days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi goinniyo xoqqa sohota xaissennan aggikkonne, i ba de7ido laitta ubban Xoossaassi wozanappe ammanettiya asa gididi de7iis.

English Sentences: And he brought in the things which his father had dedicated, and the things which himself had dedicated, into the house of the LORD, silver, and gold, and vessels.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inne a aawai Xoossaayyo dummayi wottido biraa, worqqaanne hara miishshata ehiidi, GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddon wottiis.

English Sentences: And there was war between Asa and Baasha king of Israel all their days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa Kawoi Asinne Israa7eela Kawoi Baa7ishi, bantta kawotido laitta ubban olettidosona.

English Sentences: And Baasha king of Israel went up against Judah, and built Ramah, that he might not suffer any to go out or come in to Asa king of Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela Kawoi Baa7ishi Yihudaa bolli woraajjiis; woraajjidi Yihudaa Kawuwaa Asa biittaappe ooninne gelennaadaaninne kiyennaadan teqqanau Raama katamaa yuushuwaa minttidi gimbbiis.

English Sentences: Then Asa took all the silver and the gold that were left in the treasures of the house of the LORD, and the treasures of the king's house, and delivered them into the hand of his servants: and king Asa sent them to Benhadad, the son of Tabrimon, the son of Hezion, king of Syria, that dwelt at Damascus, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gaasuwan Kawoi Asi GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaaninne ba kawo keettan attida worqqaanne biraa ubbaa kessidi, ba oosanchchatu kushiyan wottiis. Wottidi Heziyoona na7aa na7aa, Xabrimmoona na7aayyo, Damasqqo kataman de7iya Sooriyaa Kawuwaa Benihadaadayyo, imota oottidi yeddiis. Yeddiiddi hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: There is a league between me and thee, and between my father and thy father: behold, I have sent unto thee a present of silver and gold; come and break thy league with Baasha king of Israel, that he may depart from me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Kase ta aawaaranne ne aawaara maacettidoogaadan, ane tanaaranne nenaara maacettoos. Be7a, hagaa biraanne worqqaa taani neeyyo imotaa immanau yeddaas. Israa7eela Kawoi Baa7ishi ba olanchchata ta biittaappe kessana mala, neeni kase aara maacettido maachchaa kola" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Benhadad hearkened unto king Asa, and sent the captains of the hosts which he had against the cities of Israel, and smote Ijon, and Dan, and Abelbethmaachah, and all Cinneroth, with all the land of Naphtali.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Benihadaadi Kawoi Asi giidoogaa maayidi, ba ola gadaawata Israa7eela katamata olanau yeddiis. Yeddin eti Iyoona, Daananne Aabeeli-Beetimaa7ika geetettiya katamata, Galiila Abbaa matan de7iya biittaa, Nifttaaleema biittaarakka gujjidi ubbaa xoonidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when Baasha heard thereof, that he left off building of Ramah, and dwelt in Tirzah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Baa7ishi hegaa siyidi, Raama katamaa gimbbiyoogaa aggiigidi, Tirxxa katamaa biis.

English Sentences: Then king Asa made a proclamation throughout all Judah; none was exempted: and they took away the stones of Ramah, and the timber thereof, wherewith Baasha had builded; and king Asa built with them Geba of Benjamin, and Mizpah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Kawoi Asi Yihudan de7iya asaa ubbaa azaziis; azazin issoinne attennan denddidi, Baa7ishi kase yan go7ettiyo shuchchaanne mittaa Raamappe miyyidosona. Miyyin Kawoi Asi Mixiphphanne Biniyaama biittan de7iya Gebaa7a an minttidi gimbbiis.

English Sentences: The rest of all the acts of Asa, and all his might, and all that he did, and the cities which he built, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah? Nevertheless in the time of his old age he was diseased in his feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi hanido harabai, a minotettai ubbai, i oottidobai ubbainne i keexxido katamati Yihudaa Kawotu Taarikiyaa Maxaafan xaafetti uttidosona. SHin i cimido wode tohuwaa sakettiis.

English Sentences: And Asa slept with his fathers, and was buried with his fathers in the city of David his father: and Jehoshaphat his son reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi haiqqidi, ba maizzan gaittiis; ba maizza aawaa Daawita Kataman moogettiis. A na7ai Yoosaafixi a sohuwan kawotiis.

English Sentences: And Nadab the son of Jeroboam began to reign over Israel in the second year of Asa king of Judah, and reigned over Israel two years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa Kawoi Asi kawotido naa77antto laitti Iyorbbaama na7ai Nadaabi Israa7eelan kawotiis; i Israa7eela biittan naa77u laitta kawotiis.

English Sentences: And he did evil in the sight of the LORD, and walked in the way of his father, and in his sin wherewith he made Israel to sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nadaabi kase ba aawaa ogiyaanne Israa7eela asaa i ootissido a nagaraa ogiyan hemettidi, GODAA sinttan iitabaa oottiis.

English Sentences: And Baasha the son of Ahijah, of the house of Issachar, conspired against him; and Baasha smote him at Gibbethon, which belonged to the Philistines; for Nadab and all Israel laid siege to Gibbethon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yisaakoora zare gidida Akiiya na7ai Baa7ishi Nadaaba bolli maqettiis. He wode Nadaabinne a olanchchati Pilisxxeeman de7iya Gibbatoona katamaa dooddidi de7oosona.

English Sentences: Even in the third year of Asa king of Judah did Baasha slay him, and reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa Kawoi Asi kawotido heezzantto laittan Baa7ishi Nadaaba woriis; woridi a sohuwan i bau kawotiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when he reigned, that he smote all the house of Jeroboam; he left not to Jeroboam any that breathed, until he had destroyed him, according unto the saying of the LORD, which he spake by his servant Ahijah the Shilonite:
Wolaitta Sentences: Baa7ishi kawotaa doommosaarakka Iyorbbaama so asaa ubbaa wori wurssiis; GODAI Seeloppe yiida ba ashkkaraa hananabaa yootiya Akiiya baggaara yootidoogaadankka Iyorbbaama keettaa asai ubbai haiqqi wuriis.

English Sentences: Because of the sins of Jeroboam which he sinned, and which he made Israel sin, by his provocation wherewith he provoked the LORD God of Israel to anger.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee hanidoogee Iyorbbaami ba huuphen oottido nagaraa gishshaassa, Israa7eela asaa i ootissido nagaraa gishshaassanne GODAA Israa7eela Xoossaa hanqqetissido gishshaassa.

English Sentences: Now the rest of the acts of Nadab, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?
Wolaitta Sentences: Nadaabi hanido harabainne i oottidobai ubbai Israa7eela Kawotu Taarikiyaa Maxaafan xaafetti uttiis.

English Sentences: And there was war between Asa and Baasha king of Israel all their days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa Kawoi Asinne Israa7eela Kawoi Baa7ishi bantta kawotaa laitta ubban olettiiddi de7idosona.

English Sentences: In the third year of Asa king of Judah began Baasha the son of Ahijah to reign over all Israel in Tirzah, twenty and four years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa Kawoi Asi kawotido heezzantto laittan Akiiya na7ai Baa7ishi Israa7eela asaa ubbaa bolli kawotiis; i Tirxxa kataman laatamanne oiddu laitta kawotiis.

English Sentences: And he did evil in the sight of the LORD, and walked in the way of Jeroboam, and in his sin wherewith he made Israel to sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iyorbbaami Israa7eela asaa ootissido nagaraa oottidinne a ogiyan hemettidi, Baa7ishi GODAA sinttan iitabaa oottiis.

English Sentences: Then the word of the LORD came to Jehu the son of Hanani against Baasha, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hanaana na7aa Yeehu baggaara GODAA qaalai Baa7ishabaa hagaadan yaagiiddi yiis;

English Sentences: Forasmuch as I exalted thee out of the dust, and made thee prince over my people Israel; and thou hast walked in the way of Jeroboam, and hast made my people Israel to sin, to provoke me to anger with their sins;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani nena buhiyaappe denttada ta asaa Israa7eela bolli halaqa kessaas; shin neeni Iyorbbaama ogiyan hemettadasa. Qassi ta asaa Israa7eela nagaraa ootissada, eta nagaran tana hanqqetissadasa.

English Sentences: Behold, I will take away the posterity of Baasha, and the posterity of his house; and will make thy house like the house of Jeroboam the son of Nebat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, be7a! Taani Baa7ishanne a keettaa asaa pittana hanais. Baa7ishaa, taani ne keettaa asaa Nabaaxa na7aa Iyorbbaama keettaa asaadan oottana.

English Sentences: Him that dieth of Baasha in the city shall the dogs eat; and him that dieth of his in the fields shall the fowls of the air eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baa7isha zare gididi, kataman haiqqiya oonanne kanai maana; qassi gaxariyan haiqqiya oonanne saluwaa kafoti maana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now the rest of the acts of Baasha, and what he did, and his might, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?
Wolaitta Sentences: Baa7ishi hanido harabai, i oottidobainne a minotettai Israa7eela Kawotu Taarikiyaa Maxaafan xaafetti uttiis.

English Sentences: So Baasha slept with his fathers, and was buried in Tirzah: and Elah his son reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baa7ishi haiqqidi ba maizzan gaittiis; Tirxxa kataman moogettiis. A na7ai Eeli a sohuwan kawotiis.

English Sentences: And also by the hand of the prophet Jehu the son of Hanani came the word of the LORD against Baasha, and against his house, even for all the evil that he did in the sight of the LORD, in provoking him to anger with the work of his hands, in being like the house of Jeroboam; and because he killed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hananabaa yootiya Yeehu baggaara Baa7isha bollinne a so asaa bolli he hananabaa yootido gaasoi Baa7ishi oottido nagaraa gishshaassanne Iyorbbaaminne a so asai oottidoogaadan, iitabaa oottidi, GODAA hanqqetissido gishshaassa. Qassi i Iyorbbaama so asaa ubbaa wori wurssido gishshaassa.

English Sentences: In the twenty and sixth year of Asa king of Judah began Elah the son of Baasha to reign over Israel in Tirzah, two years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa Kawoi Asi kawotido laatammanne usuppuntta laittan Baa7isha na7ai Eeli Israa7eelan kawotiis. Tirxxa kataman i naa77u laitta kawotiis.

English Sentences: And his servant Zimri, captain of half his chariots, conspired against him, as he was in Tirzah, drinking himself drunk in the house of Arza steward of his house in Tirzah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawuwaa ola gadaawatuppe issuwaa gididi, a paraa gaaretuppe baggaa azaziya Zimiri kawuwaa bolli maqettiis. Kawoi Eeli he wode Tirxxan de7iya kawo keettau aawatiya Arxxa son Tirxxan mattotti uttiis.

English Sentences: And Zimri went in and smote him, and killed him, in the twenty and seventh year of Asa king of Judah, and reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa Kawoi Asi kawotido laatamanne laappuntta laittan Zimiri Arxxa soo gelidi kawuwaa woriis; woridi a sohuwan bau kawotiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when he began to reign, as soon as he sat on his throne, that he slew all the house of Baasha: he left him not one that pisseth against a wall, neither of his kinsfolks, nor of his friends.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zimiri kawotidi, kawotaa araatan uttosaarakka Baa7isha so asaa ubbaa woriis. Baa7ishayyo dabbo gidin lagge gidin issi attumaasanne paxa ashshibeenna.

English Sentences: Thus did Zimri destroy all the house of Baasha, according to the word of the LORD, which he spake against Baasha by Jehu the prophet,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiya Yeehu baggaara GODAI Baa7isha bolli haasayido qaalaadan Zimiri Baa7isha so asaa ubbaa wori xaissiis.

English Sentences: For all the sins of Baasha, and the sins of Elah his son, by which they sinned, and by which they made Israel to sin, in provoking the LORD God of Israel to anger with their vanities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee hanidoogee Baa7ishinne a na7ai Eeli bantta eeqau goinnidi, oottido nagaraa ubbaa gaasuwaaninne Israa7eela asaa ootissido nagaraa gaasuwan, GODAA, Israa7eela Xoossaa hanqqetissido gishshaassa.

English Sentences: Now the rest of the acts of Elah, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eeli hanido harabainne i oottidobai ubbai Israa7eela Kawotu Taarikiyaa Maxaafan xaafetti uttiis.

English Sentences: In the twenty and seventh year of Asa king of Judah did Zimri reign seven days in Tirzah. And the people were encamped against Gibbethon, which belonged to the Philistines.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa Kawoi Asi kawotido laatamanne laappuntta laittan Zimiri Tirxxan laappun gallassa xalaalaa kawotiis. He wode Israa7eela olanchchati Gibbatoona giyo Pilisxxeema katamaa dooddidi uttidosona.

English Sentences: And the people that were encamped heard say, Zimri hath conspired, and hath also slain the king: wherefore all Israel made Omri, the captain of the host, king over Israel that day in the camp.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dooddi uttida Israa7eelati Zimiri kawuwaa bolli maqettidi a woridoogaa siyido wode, ola gadaawaa Omira he gallassikka he sohuwan Israa7eela kawo kessidi kawoyidosona.

English Sentences: And Omri went up from Gibbethon, and all Israel with him, and they besieged Tirzah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Omirinne aara de7iya Israa7eela asai ubbai Gibbatoona katamaappe kiyidi biidi, Tirxxa katamaa dooddidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when Zimri saw that the city was taken, that he went into the palace of the king's house, and burnt the king's house over him with fire, and died,
Wolaitta Sentences: Katamai ohettiichchidoogaa be7ido wode, Zimiri kawo keettaa giddon de7iya qatuwaa gelidi, kawo keettan tamaa oittiis; yaatidi ikka haiqqiis.

English Sentences: For his sins which he sinned in doing evil in the sight of the LORD, in walking in the way of Jeroboam, and in his sin which he did, to make Israel to sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee hanidoogee Iyorbbaami oottido nagaraanne Israa7eela asaa ootissido nagaraa kaallidi, Zimiri GODAA sinttan iitabaa oottido gishshaassa.

English Sentences: Now the rest of the acts of Zimri, and his treason that he wrought, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?
Wolaitta Sentences: Zimiri hanido harabainne i maqqido maqqoi Israa7eela Kawotu Taarikiyaa Maxaafan xaafetti uttiis.

English Sentences: Then were the people of Israel divided into two parts: half of the people followed Tibni the son of Ginath, to make him king; and half followed Omri.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Israa7eela asai naa77u kiyidi shaahettiis. Asaappe baggai Ginaata na7aa Tiibina kawoyanau koyin, baggai qassi Omira kawoyanau koyiis.

English Sentences: But the people that followed Omri prevailed against the people that followed Tibni the son of Ginath: so Tibni died, and Omri reigned.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Omira maaddiya asai Ginaata na7aa Tiibina maaddiya asaappe minniis. Hegaa gishshau, Tiibini haiqqin Omiri kawotiis.

English Sentences: In the thirty and first year of Asa king of Judah began Omri to reign over Israel, twelve years: six years reigned he in Tirzah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa Kawoi Asi kawotido hasttamanne isiinintta laittan Omiri Israa7eela asaa bolli kawotiis. Kawotidi tammanne naa77u laittaa haariis; hegaappe usuppun laittaa Tirxxan haariis.

English Sentences: And he bought the hill Samaria of Shemer for two talents of silver, and built on the hill, and called the name of the city which he built, after the name of Shemer, owner of the hill, Samaria.
Wolaitta Sentences: Omiri Samaariyaa giyo keraa SHemeera giyo bitaniyaappe usuppun sha7u xaqara biran shammiis; shammidi issi katamaa an keexxiis. Yaatidi he katamaa kase he keraa godaa sunttan Samaariyaa giidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: But Omri wrought evil in the eyes of the LORD, and did worse than all that were before him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Omiri GODAA sinttan iitabaa oottiis; i baappe kase de7ida kawotu ubbatuppekka aadhdhiya nagaraa oottiis.

English Sentences: For he walked in all the way of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, and in his sin wherewith he made Israel to sin, to provoke the LORD God of Israel to anger with their vanities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nabaaxa na7ai Iyorbbaami oottido nagaraanne Israa7eela asaa ootissido nagaraa Omiri kaalliis; he eeqau goinniyo hanotai GODAA Israa7eela Xoossaa hanqqetissiis.

English Sentences: Now the rest of the acts of Omri which he did, and his might that he shewed, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel?
Wolaitta Sentences: Omiri hanido harabai, i oottidobainne a minotettai Israa7eela Kawotu Taarikiyaa Maxaafan xaafetti uttiis.

English Sentences: So Omri slept with his fathers, and was buried in Samaria: and Ahab his son reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Omiri haiqqidi ba maizzan gaittiis; Samaariyaa kataman moogettiis. A na7ai Akaabi a sohuwan kawotiis.

English Sentences: And in the thirty and eighth year of Asa king of Judah began Ahab the son of Omri to reign over Israel: and Ahab the son of Omri reigned over Israel in Samaria twenty and two years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa Kawoi Asi kawotido hasttamanne hosppuntta laittan Omira na7ai Akaabi Israa7eelan kawotiis; Omira na7ai Akaabi Samaariyaa kataman Israa7eela bolli laatamanne naa77u laitta kawotiis.

English Sentences: And Ahab the son of Omri did evil in the sight of the LORD above all that were before him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Omira na7ai Akaabi baappe kase wode de7ida kawotu ubbatuugaappekka aadhdhiya iitabaa GODAA sinttan oottiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, as if it had been a light thing for him to walk in the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, that he took to wife Jezebel the daughter of Ethbaal king of the Zidonians, and went and served Baal, and worshipped him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nabaaxa na7ai Iyorbbaami oottido nagaraa oottiyoogaa laafabaa giidi qoppiyoogaa xalaala gidennan Sidoonatu Kawuwaa Etiba7aala na7iyo Elzzaabeelo bau machcho ekkidi, Ba7aala giyo eeqau oottanaunne au goinnanau doommiis.

English Sentences: And he reared up an altar for Baal in the house of Baal, which he had built in Samaria.
Wolaitta Sentences: Samaariyaa kataman i keexissido Ba7aala Eeqaa Keettan Ba7aalayyo yarshshiyoosaa keexxiis.

English Sentences: And Ahab made a grove; and Ahab did more to provoke the LORD God of Israel to anger than all the kings of Israel that were before him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Akaabi Asheero giyo xoossee misiliyaa essidi, baappe kase de7ida kawotu ubbatuppe aattidi GODAA Israa7eela Xoossaa hanqqetissiya nagaraa oottiis.

English Sentences: In his days did Hiel the Bethelite build Jericho: he laid the foundation thereof in Abiram his firstborn, and set up the gates thereof in his youngest son Segub, according to the word of the LORD, which he spake by Joshua the son of Nun.
Wolaitta Sentences: Akaaba kawotettaa wode Beeteeleppe yiida Hii7eela giyo issi bitanee Yarkko katamaa zaarettidi keexxiis. Nawe na7aa Yaasu baggaara GODAI odidoogaadan, Hii7eeli Yarkko keexxanau baasiyo wode, Abiiraama giyo a baira na7ai haiqqiis; qassi penggiyaa aattiyo wode Saguba giyo a wurssetta kaalo na7ai haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And Elijah the Tishbite, who was of the inhabitants of Gilead, said unto Ahab, As the LORD God of Israel liveth, before whom I stand, there shall not be dew nor rain these years, but according to my word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gala7aaden Tishbbe giyoosaappe yiida, hananabaa yootiya Eelaasa giyo issi bitanee Kawuwaa Akaaba hagaadan yaagiis; "Taani ayyo oottiyo GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai ero! Ha sinttaara yiya laittatun taani odennan de7ishin, sa7an iri bukkenna woikko xaazi xaazatenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the word of the LORD came unto him, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe simmin GODAA qaalai hananabaa yootiya Eelaasakko yiidi a hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Get thee hence, and turn thee eastward, and hide thyself by the brook Cherith, that is before Jordan.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hagaappe denddada arshsho baggi ba; yan Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe arshsho baggaara de7iya Kariita SHaafaa matan qosetta.

English Sentences: And it shall be, that thou shalt drink of the brook; and I have commanded the ravens to feed thee there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni he shaafaappe haattaa uyana; qooraaseti nena he sohuwan qumaa mizanaadan taani eta azazaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So he went and did according unto the word of the LORD: for he went and dwelt by the brook Cherith, that is before Jordan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Eelaasi GODAI giidoogaa oottiis; Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe arshsho baggaara de7iya Kariita SHaafaa biidi, yan uttiis.

English Sentences: And the ravens brought him bread and flesh in the morning, and bread and flesh in the evening; and he drank of the brook.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maalladonne omarssi qooraaseti oittaanne ashuwaa Eelaasayyo ehoosona; haattaakka shaafaappe uyees.

English Sentences: And it came to pass after a while, that the brook dried up, because there had been no rain in the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittan iri bukkenna gishshau, guutta wodiyaappe guyyiyan shaafai meliis.

English Sentences: And the word of the LORD came unto him, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan GODAA qaalai Eelaasakko yiidi, a hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Arise, get thee to Zarephath, which belongeth to Zidon, and dwell there: behold, I have commanded a widow woman there to sustain thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha sohuwaappe denddada, Sidoona matan de7iya Siraafiti ba; baada yan de7ashsha. Issi am77e maccaasiyaa nena qumaa mizanaadan taani azazaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So he arose and went to Zarephath. And when he came to the gate of the city, behold, the widow woman was there gathering of sticks: and he called to her, and said, Fetch me, I pray thee, a little water in a vessel, that I may drink.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Eelaasi denddidi Siraafiti biis; i biidi katamaa penggiyaakko gakkiyo wode, issi am77e maccaasiyaa mittaa mixausu. Eelaasi mishiriyo xeesidi, "Hayyanaa, tau uyanau haatta bulen ekka yarkkii" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And as she was going to fetch it, he called to her, and said, Bring me, I pray thee, a morsel of bread in thine hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mishiriyaa haattaa ehaanau biishin i xeesidi, "Hayyanaa guutta baso oittakka ekkada yarkkii" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And she said, As the LORD thy God liveth, I have not a cake, but an handful of meal in a barrel, and a little oil in a cruse: and, behold, I am gathering two sticks, that I may go in and dress it for me and my son, that we may eat it, and die.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin mishiriyaa ayyo, "GODAI ne Xoossai ero! Taayyo oitti baawa. Taayyo otuwan issi kuuchcha xiilleenne xaaruwan qii zaite xalaalai de7ees. Taani hagaa yiidoogee guutta mitta mixada, soo simmada, hinnokka taayyoonne ta na7aayyo issitoo uukkanaassanne miidi haiqqanaassa" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And Elijah said unto her, Fear not; go and do as thou hast said: but make me thereof a little cake first, and bring it unto me, and after make for thee and for thy son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Eelaasi mishireeyyo, "Aikko baa, yayyoppa; baada neeni giidoogaadan ootta. SHin kasetada ne xiilliyaappe guutta komppuwaa komppada taayyo ekka ya; hegaappe simmada neeyyoonne ne na7aayyo komppa.

English Sentences: For thus saith the LORD God of Israel, The barrel of meal shall not waste, neither shall the cruse of oil fail, until the day that the LORD sendeth rain upon the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai, Sa7aa bollan GODAI iraa bukissana gakkanaashin, xiillee otuwaappe wurenna; zaiteekka xaaruwaappe coroshettenna yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And she went and did according to the saying of Elijah: and she, and he, and her house, did eat many days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, mishiriyaa baada, Eelaasi yootidoogaadan oottaasu; hegan Eelaasi, mishiriyaanne i so asai ubba gallassi qumaa miidosona.

English Sentences: And the barrel of meal wasted not, neither did the cruse of oil fail, according to the word of the LORD, which he spake by Elijah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAI Eelaasa baggaara yootido qaalaa naagidi, otuwaappe xiillee wuribeennanne xaaruwaappe zaiteekka coroshettibeenna.

English Sentences: And it came to pass after these things, that the son of the woman, the mistress of the house, fell sick; and his sickness was so sore, that there was no breath left in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Guutta wodiyaappe guyyiyan he keettaa godee na7ai harggiis; harggee goobi goobidi bin, wurssettan na7ai shemppuwaa teqettidi haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And she said unto Elijah, What have I to do with thee, O thou man of God? art thou come unto me to call my sin to remembrance, and to slay my son?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, mishiriyaa Eelaasa, "Xoossaa asoo, neeni tana morkkiyoobi aibiinee? Neeni ta nagaraa hassayissada ta na7aa woranau yaadii?" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And he said unto her, Give me thy son. And he took him out of her bosom, and carried him up into a loft, where he abode, and laid him upon his own bed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Eelaasi o, "Ne na7aa taayyo hamma" yaagiis. Na7aa i kiyuwaappe ekkidi, pude ba de7iyo pooqiyaa efiis; efiidi ba arssan zin77issiis.

English Sentences: And he cried unto the LORD, and said, O LORD my God, hast thou also brought evil upon the widow with whom I sojourn, by slaying her son?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi GODAAYYO hagaadan yaagidi waassiis; "Abeet GODAU, ta Xoossau, qassi ha taani de7iyo mishiree am77ee na7aa worada, i bollakka meto ehai?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he stretched himself upon the child three times, and cried unto the LORD, and said, O LORD my God, I pray thee, let this child's soul come into him again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe simmidi na7aa bolli heezzutoo zaqqullidi, GODAAYYO hagaadan yaagidi waassiis; "Abeet GODAU, ta Xoossau, ha na7aa shemppuwaa zaara" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD heard the voice of Elijah; and the soul of the child came into him again, and he revived.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin GODAI Eelaasa waasuwaa siyiis. Na7aa shemppoikka simmin, na7ai paxiis.

English Sentences: And Elijah took the child, and brought him down out of the chamber into the house, and delivered him unto his mother: and Elijah said, See, thy son liveth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eelaasi na7aa ekkidi pooqiyaappe duge wodhdhiis; na7aa aayeeyyo immidi hagaadan yaagiis; "Be7a, ne na7ai paxiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the woman said to Elijah, Now by this I know that thou art a man of God, and that the word of the LORD in thy mouth is truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan mishiriyaa Eelaasa, "Neeni Xoossaa asa gididoogaanne ne doonaappe odettiya GODAA qaalai tuma gididoogaa taani ha77i eraas" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: And it came to pass after many days, that the word of the LORD came to Elijah in the third year, saying, Go, shew thyself unto Ahab; and I will send rain upon the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Irai xayoosappe heezzantto laittan, unddenna aginai aadhdhin GODAI Eelaasa, "Ba; baada Kawuwaa Akaabayyo beetta. Taani ha biittan iraa bukissana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Elijah went to shew himself unto Ahab. And there was a sore famine in Samaria.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Eelaasi Akaabayyo beettanau denddidi biis. He wode Samaariyan wolqqaama koshai de7ees.

English Sentences: And Ahab called Obadiah, which was the governor of his house. (Now Obadiah feared the LORD greatly:
Wolaitta Sentences: Akaabi ba keettau aawatiya Obaadiyaa xeesiis. Obaadee GODAA minttidi ammaniya asa.

English Sentences: For it was so, when Jezebel cut off the prophets of the LORD, that Obadiah took an hundred prophets, and hid them by fifty in a cave, and fed them with bread and water.)
Wolaitta Sentences: Elzzaabeela GODAA sunttan hananabaa yootiyaageeta worissiyo wode, Obaadee etappe xeetata ekkidi, ishatamaa ishatamaa shaakkidi, gonggolotu giddon qosidi, kattaa miziiddi haattaakka ushshiiddi wottiis.

English Sentences: And Ahab said unto Obadiah, Go into the land, unto all fountains of water, and unto all brooks: peradventure we may find grass to save the horses and mules alive, that we lose not all the beasts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Akaabi Obaadiyaa xeesidi, "Biittan sa7an pulttoi de7iyoosaa ubbaanne shaafaa qoco ubbaa ba. Ooni erii, nuuni maataa demmidi paratanne baqulota worennan ashshanaakkonne" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So they divided the land between them to pass throughout it: Ahab went one way by himself, and Obadiah went another way by himself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti biittaa shaakki shaakki ekkin, Akaabi issi ogiyaa oiqqidi barkka biis; qassi Obaadeekka hara ogiyaa oiqqidi barkka biis.

English Sentences: And as Obadiah was in the way, behold, Elijah met him: and he knew him, and fell on his face, and said, Art thou that my lord Elijah?
Wolaitta Sentences: Obaadee ba ogiyaa oiqqidi biishin, Eelaasi aara gaittiis. Gaittin Obaadee Eelaasa eridi ba som77uwan gufannidi, "Ta godau Eelaasaa, hagee neneeyye?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he answered him, I am: go, tell thy lord, Behold, Elijah is here.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Eelaasi ayyo, "Ee tana. Neeni baada, Eelaasi hagan de7ees yaagada ne godaassi oda" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, What have I sinned, that thou wouldest deliver thy servant into the hand of Ahab, to slay me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Obaadee Eelaasayyo, "Taani nena ai naaqqiinee neeni tana ne ashkkaraa haiqqo gaada Akaaba kushiyan aatta immiyoi?

English Sentences: As the LORD thy God liveth, there is no nation or kingdom, whither my lord hath not sent to seek thee: and when they said, He is not there; he took an oath of the kingdom and nation, that they found thee not.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ne Xoossai ero! Ta godai nena koyissanau kiittibeenna deree woikko kawotetti mulekka baawa. Eti, Eelaasi hagan baawa yaagiyo wode, neeni hegan bainnaagee tuma gidiyoogaa eranau Akaabi deriyaa haariyaageeta caaqettiis.

English Sentences: And now thou sayest, Go, tell thy lord, Behold, Elijah is here.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i neeni tana, Baada ne godaayyo, "Eelaasi hagan de7ees" yaagada yoota yaagaasa.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass, as soon as I am gone from thee, that the Spirit of the LORD shall carry thee whither I know not; and so when I come and tell Ahab, and he cannot find thee, he shall slay me: but I thy servant fear the LORD from my youth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena yeggada baanne, GODAA Ayyaanai nena denttidi, taani erenna sohuwaa efaana. Taani Akaabayyo yootin, i nena demmana xayikko, tana worana. Taani ne ashkkarai naatettaappe doommada GODAAYYO yayyiya asa.

English Sentences: Was it not told my lord what I did when Jezebel slew the prophets of the LORD, how I hid an hundred men of the LORD's prophets by fifty in a cave, and fed them with bread and water?
Wolaitta Sentences: Elzzaabeela GODAA sunttan hananabaa yootiyaageeta worissiyo wode, taani etappe xeetaa ekkada, ishatamaa ishatamaa issi gonggoluwan qosada, qumaa mizaasinne haattaakka ushshaas. Yaatin, ha taani oottidobai neeyyo ta godaayyo odettibeenneeyye?

English Sentences: And now thou sayest, Go, tell thy lord, Behold, Elijah is here: and he shall slay me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i qassi neeni tana, Baada ne godaayyo, "Eelaasi hagan de7ees" yaagada yoota yaagaasa. Yootikko i tana worana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Elijah said, As the LORD of hosts liveth, before whom I stand, I will surely shew myself unto him to day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Eelaasi a, "Taani ayyo azazettiyo, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI ero! Tuma taani hachchi Akaabayyo beettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Obadiah went to meet Ahab, and told him: and Ahab went to meet Elijah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Obaadee Akaabaara gaittanau biis; biidi Akaabayyo yootiis. Yootin Akaabi Eelaasaara gaittanau biis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when Ahab saw Elijah, that Ahab said unto him, Art thou he that troubleth Israel?
Wolaitta Sentences: Akaabi Eelaasa be7ido wode, "Israa7eela biittaa aatta yeggiyaagee, laa hagee nenee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he answered, I have not troubled Israel; but thou, and thy father's house, in that ye have forsaken the commandments of the LORD, and thou hast followed Baalim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Eelaasi Akaaba, "Israa7eela biittaa aatti yeggiyai tana gidikke. GODAA azazuwaa aggidi, Ba7aala eeqatussi goinnidi, biittaa aatti yeggiyai nenanne ne aawaa so asaa.

English Sentences: Now therefore send, and gather to me all Israel unto mount Carmel, and the prophets of Baal four hundred and fifty, and the prophets of the groves four hundred, which eat at Jezebel's table.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i Israa7eela asaa ubbaa Qarmmeloosa Deriyaa taakko shiishsha; qassi Elzzaabeeli maaddaappe miya hananabaa yootiyaageeta ubbaa etaara issippe he sohuwaa shiishsha. Hegeetikka Ba7aala sunttan hananabaa yootiya oiddu xeetanne ishatamatanne Asheeri sunttan hananabaa yootiya oiddu xeetata" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Ahab sent unto all the children of Israel, and gathered the prophets together unto mount Carmel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Akaabi kiittidi, Israa7eela asaa ubbaanne hananabaa yootiyaageeta Qarmmeloosa Deriyaa shiishshiis.

English Sentences: And Elijah came unto all the people, and said, How long halt ye between two opinions? if the LORD be God, follow him: but if Baal, then follow him. And the people answered him not a word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eelaasi shiiqida asaakko biidi, "Aude gakkanaashin naa77u qofan buuteetii? GODAI Xoossaa gidikko, a kaallite; gidennan Ba7aala gidikko, ini akka kaallite" yaagiis. Yaagin asai ayyo qaalanne qaattennan sirphphi giis.

English Sentences: Then said Elijah unto the people, I, even I only, remain a prophet of the LORD; but Baal's prophets are four hundred and fifty men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Eelaasi asaayyo hagaadan yaagiis; "GODAA sunttan hananabaa yootiyaageetuppe ta xalaalai attaas; shin Ba7aala sunttan hananabaa yootiyaageeti oiddu xeetanne ishatama.

English Sentences: Let them therefore give us two bullocks; and let them choose one bullock for themselves, and cut it in pieces, and lay it on wood, and put no fire under: and I will dress the other bullock, and lay it on wood, and put no fire under:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ane nuuyyo naa77u korima boorati imettona. He korimatuppe issuwaa eti doorona; korimaa shukkidi qanxxerettona; yaatidi ashuwaa mittaa bolli wottona; shin tamaa eettoppona. Taanikka naa77antto korimaa giigissada, mittaa bolli wottana; taanikka tamaa eettikke.

English Sentences: And call ye on the name of your gods, and I will call on the name of the LORD: and the God that answereth by fire, let him be God. And all the people answered and said, It is well spoken.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte intte xoossaa sunttaa xeesite; taanikka GODAA sunttaa xeesana. Xeesin koyidi, yarshshuwaa miya tamaa kiittiya xoossai Xoossaa gido" yaagiis. Yaagin asai, "Hagee lo77o qofa" yaagidi maayiis.

English Sentences: And Elijah said unto the prophets of Baal, Choose you one bullock for yourselves, and dress it first; for ye are many; and call on the name of your gods, but put no fire under.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Eelaasi Ba7aala sunttan hananabaa yootiyaageeta, "Intte cora gidiyo gishshau, issi korimaa doori ekkidi, kasetidi giigissite. Yaatidi intte xoossaa sunttaa xeesite; shin an tamaa eettoppite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they took the bullock which was given them, and they dressed it, and called on the name of Baal from morning even until noon, saying, O Baal, hear us. But there was no voice, nor any that answered. And they leaped upon the altar which was made.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti banttau imettida korimaa ekkidi giigissidosona. Maalladoppe seeta gallassi gakkanaashin, Ba7aala sunttaa xeesidi, "Hai Ba7aalaa, nu woosaa siya" yaagidi woossidosona. SHin siyettiya cenggurssi baawa; issi asinne koyibeenna. Yaatin, bantta giigissido yarshshiyoosaa yuuyi aadhdhidi duridosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass at noon, that Elijah mocked them, and said, Cry aloud: for he is a god; either he is talking, or he is pursuing, or he is in a journey, or peradventure he sleepeth, and must be awaked.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai seeta gallassa gidin, Eelaasi eta bolli, "Intte qaalaa xoqqu oottidi woossite! I xoossa gidennee! Ooni erii, i qofan sheekkidaakko, woikko au oosoi daridaakko, woikko manddaridaakko, woikko xiskkidabaa gidikko denttanau koshshees!" yaagidi qilliicciis.

English Sentences: And they cried aloud, and cut themselves after their manner with knives and lancets, till the blood gushed out upon them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi woossidosona. Qassi kase bantta goinniyo wogaadan bantta bollaara suuttai goggana gakkanaashin tooraaninne mashshan banttana caddidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when midday was past, and they prophesied until the time of the offering of the evening sacrifice, that there was neither voice, nor any to answer, nor any that regarded.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yarshshuwaa shiishshiyo omarssai gakkanaashin eti hegaadan haniiddi, hananabaa yootoosona; shin siyettiya cenggurssi baawa. Etabaa ezggidi zaaro immiyaabi issoinne baawa.

English Sentences: And Elijah said unto all the people, Come near unto me. And all the people came near unto him. And he repaired the altar of the LORD that was broken down.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Eelaasi asaa ubbaayyo, "Haa taakko shiiqite" yaagiis. Yaagin asai akko shiiqin, GODAASSI yarshshiyoosai qolettiichchidaagaa zaarettidi gimbbiis.

English Sentences: And Elijah took twelve stones, according to the number of the tribes of the sons of Jacob, unto whom the word of the LORD came, saying, Israel shall be thy name:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalai Yaaqoobakko yiidi, "Ne sunttai Israa7eela gidana" yaagidi yootido Yaaqooba naatu zaretu qoodaadan Eelaasi tammanne naa77u shuchchata ekkiis.

English Sentences: And with the stones he built an altar in the name of the LORD: and he made a trench about the altar, as great as would contain two measures of seed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ekkidi GODAA sunttaayyo he shuchchatun yarshshiyoosaa gimbbiis. Gimbbidi tammanne oiddu litiro haattaa tigin ekkiya ollaa yarshshiyoosaa yuushuwan bookkiis.

English Sentences: And he put the wood in order, and cut the bullock in pieces, and laid him on the wood, and said, Fill four barrels with water, and pour it on the burnt sacrifice, and on the wood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan yarshshiyoosaa bolli mittaa giigissi wottidi, korimaa ashuwaa a qommuwan qommuwan qanxxerettidi, mittaa bolli wottiis. Wottidi asata, "Oiddu baattatun haattaa kunttidi, xuuggana yarshshuwaa bollinne mittaa bolli gussite" yaagiis; yaagin eti gussidosona.

English Sentences: And he said, Do it the second time. And they did it the second time. And he said, Do it the third time. And they did it the third time.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Eelaasi asata, "Naa77anttuwaakka gujjite" yaagiis; yaagin eti naa77anttuwaakka gujjidosona. Qassikka Eelaasi asata, "Heezzanttuwaakka gujjite" yaagiis; yaagin heezzanttuwaakka gujjidosona.

English Sentences: And the water ran round about the altar; and he filled the trench also with water.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haattai yarshshiyoosaa yuushuwan goggiis; goggidi ollan haattai kumiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass at the time of the offering of the evening sacrifice, that Elijah the prophet came near, and said, LORD God of Abraham, Isaac, and of Israel, let it be known this day that thou art God in Israel, and that I am thy servant, and that I have done all these things at thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Omarssa yarshshuwaa shiishshiyo wodee gakkin, hananabaa yootiya Eelaasi yarshshiyoosaa shiiqidi hagaadan yaagidi woossiis; "Abeet GODAU, Abrahaama Xoossau, Yisaaqa Xoossau, Israa7eela Xoossau, neeni Israa7eela biittan Xoossa gidiyoogeenne, taanikka ne ashkkara gidiyoogeenne, qassi taani hagaa ubbaa ne qaalan oottiyoogee hachchi eretto.

English Sentences: Hear me, O LORD, hear me, that this people may know that thou art the LORD God, and that thou hast turned their heart back again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, koya! Neeni GODAI Xoossaa gidiyoogaanne neeni eta wozanaa neekko zaaraidda de7iyoogaa ha asati eranaadan neeni taayyo koya!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then the fire of the LORD fell, and consumed the burnt sacrifice, and the wood, and the stones, and the dust, and licked up the water that was in the trench.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin GODAA tamai wodhdhidi, xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa, mittaa, shuchchaanne biittaa miis; ollaa giddon de7iya haattaakka laacciis.

English Sentences: And when all the people saw it, they fell on their faces: and they said, The LORD, he is the God; the LORD, he is the God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ubbai hegaa be7ido wode, bantta som77uwan gufannidi, "GODAI Xoossaa! GODAA xalaalai Xoossaa!" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Elijah said unto them, Take the prophets of Baal; let not one of them escape. And they took them: and Elijah brought them down to the brook Kishon, and slew them there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Eelaasi eta, "Ba7aala sunttan hananabaa yootiyaageeta oiqqite. Etappe issi asinne kessi ekkidi booppo" yaagiis. Yaagin eta oiqqidosona; Eelaasi eta Qiishoona SHaafaa efiidi woriis.

English Sentences: And Elijah said unto Ahab, Get thee up, eat and drink; for there is a sound of abundance of rain.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eelaasi Akaaba, "Kiyada ba; baada ma uya. Aissi giikko, wolqqaama iraa gunttai siyettees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Ahab went up to eat and to drink. And Elijah went up to the top of Carmel; and he cast himself down upon the earth, and put his face between his knees,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Akaabi maanaunne uyanau biis. SHin Eelaasi Qarmmeloosa Deriyaa xeeri kiyiis; kiyidi ba som77uwaa ba gulbbatatu giddo duge gelissidi gufanniis.

English Sentences: And said to his servant, Go up now, look toward the sea. And he went up, and looked, and said, There is nothing. And he said, Go again seven times.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Eelaasi ba ashkkaraa, "Ba; pude kiyada ane abbaakko zaarada xeella" yaagiis. Yaagin a ashkkarai biidi xeelliis; xeellidi ayyo, "Aibinne baawa" yaagiis. Eelaasi ba ashkkaraa laapputon, "Qassikka ane xeella" yaagiis. Yaagin ashkkarai laapputoo xeelliis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass at the seventh time, that he said, Behold, there ariseth a little cloud out of the sea, like a man's hand. And he said, Go up, say unto Ahab, Prepare thy chariot, and get thee down, that the rain stop thee not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laappuntto xeelan, "Be7a, asa kushe keena shaarai abbaappe kiyiis" yaagiis. Yaagin Eelaasi ba ashkkaraa, "Ba; baada Akaaba, Irai nena beettaa diggennaadan, ne paraa gaariyan uttada, duge ne soo wodhdha yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass in the mean while, that the heaven was black with clouds and wind, and there was a great rain. And Ahab rode, and went to Jezreel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Guutta keenaa gam77ishin, saloi shaaraa dulkkiis; carkkoikka carkkiis; wolqqaama iraikka bukkiis. Akaabi paraa gaariyan uttidi Iziraa7eela katamaa biis.

English Sentences: And the hand of the LORD was on Elijah; and he girded up his loins, and ran before Ahab to the entrance of Jezreel.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA wolqqai Eelaasa bolli wodhdhiis; Eelaasi kaabbaa qabattuwan pude sirqqidi, Iziraa7eela katamaa gakkanaashin Akaabappe sinttatidi woxxiis.

English Sentences: And Ahab told Jezebel all that Elijah had done, and withal how he had slain all the prophets with the sword.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eelaasi oottidobaa ubbaanne Ba7aala sunttan hananabaa yootiyaageeta ubbaa bisuwan i waati woridaakko Akaabi Elzzaabeeliyyo yootiis.

English Sentences: Then Jezebel sent a messenger unto Elijah, saying, So let the gods do to me, and more also, if I make not thy life as the life of one of them by to morrow about this time.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yootin Elzzaabeela, "Neeni he hananabaa yootiyaageeta oottidoogaadan, wontto hannoode taani nena oottana xayikko, xoossati tana worona" yaagada Eelaasassi kiittaasu.

English Sentences: And when he saw that, he arose, and went for his life, and came to Beersheba, which belongeth to Judah, and left his servant there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Eelaasi ba shemppuwau yayyidi, Yihudaa biittan de7iya Berssaabeha yiis. Ba ashkkaraa hegan yeggiis;

English Sentences: But he himself went a day's journey into the wilderness, and came and sat down under a juniper tree: and he requested for himself that he might die; and said, It is enough; now, O LORD, take away my life; for I am not better than my fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: yeggidi barkka issi gallassa ogiyaa bazzuwan hemettiis. Hemettiiddi biidi issi sankkaaraa kuwan uttidi, "Abeet GODAU, taayyo gidana; taani ta maizza aawatuppe kehikke. Ta shemppuwaa ekka" yaagidi haiqqanau woossiis.

English Sentences: And as he lay and slept under a juniper tree, behold, then an angel touched him, and said unto him, Arise and eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan sankkaaraa kuwan zaqqullidi xiskkiis; xiskkidaashin issi kiitanchchai a bochchidi, "Dendda; denddada ma" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he looked, and, behold, there was a cake baken on the coals, and a cruse of water at his head. And he did eat and drink, and laid him down again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin denddidi i xeelliyo wode, ho77o shuchchaa mishuwan uukettida komppo oittainne oto haattai a huuphessan de7iyaagaa be7iis. Be7idi miidi uyiis; yaatidi guyye zin77iis.

English Sentences: And the angel of the LORD came again the second time, and touched him, and said, Arise and eat; because the journey is too great for thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA kiitanchchai naa77anttuwaakka yiidi Eelaasa bochchidi, "Neeni baana ogee daro adussa gidiyo gishshau, denddada ma" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he arose, and did eat and drink, and went in the strength of that meat forty days and forty nights unto Horeb the mount of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Eelaasi denddidi miisinne uyiis. He i miido kattaa wolqqan Xoossaa deriyaa Siinaa gakkanaashin, oitamu gallassaanne oitamu qammaa hemettiis.

English Sentences: And he came thither unto a cave, and lodged there; and, behold, the word of the LORD came to him, and he said unto him, What doest thou here, Elijah?
Wolaitta Sentences: He sohuwan de7iya gonggoluwaa giddo gelidi aqiis. GODAI a, "Eelaasaa; hagan ai oottai?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, I have been very jealous for the LORD God of hosts: for the children of Israel have forsaken thy covenant, thrown down thine altars, and slain thy prophets with the sword; and I, even I only, am left; and they seek my life, to take it away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Eelaasi, "Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAAYYO Xoossaayyo taani daroppe mishettaas. Aissi giikko, Israa7eela asai nenaara maacettido maachchaa kanttiis; neeyyo yarshshiyoosaakka qoliis; ne sunttan hananabaa yootiyaageetakka bisuwan woriis. Yaatin, taani tarkka attaas; ha77i eti ta shemppuwaakka ekkanau koyoosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, Go forth, and stand upon the mount before the LORD. And, behold, the LORD passed by, and a great and strong wind rent the mountains, and brake in pieces the rocks before the LORD; but the LORD was not in the wind: and after the wind an earthquake; but the LORD was not in the earthquake:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin GODAI a, "Hegaappe kiyada baada, deriyaa huuphiyan ta sinttan eqqa" yaagiis. Yaagin Eelaasi eqqidaashin GODAI a mataara kanttiis. He wode mino wolqqaama carkkoi deriyaa phalqqerettiis; zaallatakka kinchcherettiis; shin GODAI he carkkuwaa giddon baawa. Carkkuwaappe simmin biittai qaaxxiis; shin GODAI he biittaa qaattankka baawa.

English Sentences: And after the earthquake a fire; but the LORD was not in the fire: and after the fire a still small voice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittaa qaattaappe simmin tamai kiyiis; shin GODAI tamaa giddon baawa. Tamaappe simmin saasukettai siyettiis.

English Sentences: And it was so, when Elijah heard it, that he wrapped his face in his mantle, and went out, and stood in the entering in of the cave. And, behold, there came a voice unto him, and said, What doest thou here, Elijah?
